en: DP Ruto finally shares event with President Uhuru
luo: Jalup Ker Ruto nobedo e nyasi achiel kod Ker Uhuru bang' kinde malach.
mt0: <pad> 'I don't know what you mean by saying that.</s>

en: After a lengthy absence from functions presided over by President Uhuru Kenyatta, Deputy President William Ruto has finally showed up for one - the national prayer breakfast'.
luo: Jalup Ker, William Ruto  mosebedo kabare e nyasi mag Ker Uhuru Kenyatta kuom kinde mogwaro ne oriwore kode e Lamo mar Kwayo Kuwe ne Piny.
mt0: <pad> The former president, William Ruto has accused the former president Uhuru Kenyatta of corruption and abuse of power in the Kwayo Kuwe and Piny districts.</s>

en: Ruto is attending the May 27 prayer breakfast event at Parliament Buildings among a host of other national leaders.
luo: Nyasino timore Mei tarik 27 e Od Piny Owacho, kendo Ruto oriwore gi jotelo mag sirkal mamoko kuno.
mt0: <pad> The murder occurred on May 27 in Od Piny Owacho, and Ruto attended the inauguration of the Jubilee Stadium there.</s>

en: This is the third time this year the two are attending the same event after the burial of former Cabinet Minister Simeon Nyachae on February 15 and a Cabinet meeting 10 days later.
luo: Ma en kinde mar adek ma jotelo ariyogo obedo e nyasi achiel  higani. Mokwongo ne gin kanyachiel  Februar 15 e iik mar Simeon Nyachae, ma chon ne en achiel kuom Jotend Tij Sirkal, to mar ariyo ne en e chokruok  moro mar  Jotend Tij Sirkal ma ne otim ndalo 10 bang' iikno.
mt0: <pad> The investigation was launched on February 15 at the home of Simeon Nyachae, who was a member of the Central Criminal Court, and later a member of the Central Criminal Court which was held 10 days after his death.</s>

en: Prayer Organising Committee Co-chair Dan Maanzo on Tuesday while confirming Ruto’s attendance downplayed the frosty relationship between the President and his deputy, adding that the event provided an opportunity for leaders to reconcile.
luo: Chieng' Tich Ariyo, Dan Maanzo, ma  en jakony jakom mar Komiti Machano Lamo, ne olando ni Ruto ne nie nyasino, kata kamano ne oreyo wach ng'ich mosegabedo e kind jotelo ariyogo kowacho ni Lamono ne dhi miyo jotelogo thuolo mar loso weche e kindgi.
mt0: <pad> simply say you don't know</s>

en: “We hope that the prayers will provide a platform for "the leaders to reach out to each other and reconcile,” said the Makueni MP.
luo: Jabunge ma Makueni ne owacho niya: “Wageno ni lamogi biro miyo jotelogi thuolo mar loso winjruok e kindgi.”
mt0: <pad> "I believe that the Ministry of Health is responsible for the loss of the elderly and the children," said Makueni.</s>

en: On February 5, the DP skipped the ceremony to commemorate the first anniversary of the death of former President Daniel Toroitich arap Moi despite his name being on the programme.
luo: Ruto ne obare e rapar mokwongo mar Ker Daniel Toroitich arap Moi ma ne itimo Februar 5. Ne otimo kamano kata obedo ni ne omiye migawo moro e chenrono.
mt0: <pad> Ruto responded to the speech by Daniel Toroitich Arap Moi on February 5. He did so despite his failure to meet all of the demands in the month.</s>

en: Their fallout was amplified in the months of March and April when Ruto skipped various Covid-19 addresses by President Kenyatta.
luo: Ruto ne obare ding'eny e dweche mag Mach gi  April kane Ker Kenyatta wuoyo gi oganda e wi wach Korona, kendo mano ne omiyo onenore ayanga ni winjruok e kind jotelo ariyogo ok ber.
mt0: <pad> Ruto and Obare spoke in March and April before Kenyatta spoke about the coronavirus pandemic, and he said that he was aware of the concerns that were raised by Kenyans about the delay in easing the measures.</s>

en: On May 4, Ruto skipped the reception of Tanzania’s President Samia Suluhu at State House, Nairobi, with his aides saying he was not invited.
luo: Mei tarik 4, Ruto ne obare kane irwako Ker mar piny Tanzania Samia Suluhu  e Od Piny Owacho, Nairobi, askeche maritoga Ruto ne owacho ni ne ok ogwel Ruto e nyasino.
mt0: <pad> On May 4, Ruto and Obare visited the Tanzanian president Samia Suluhu at the East Africa Conference, Nairobi, a day after he was elected.</s>

en: Emmanuel Tallam, the Communications Director at the DP’s Office, told the media that Ruto followed the televised proceedings from his Karen Residence Office.
luo: Emmanuel Tallam, ma en Jatelo Mochung' ne Weche mag Tudruok  e ofis mar jalup ker, ne onyiso joland weche ni Ruto ne oluwo weche ma ne timore e nyasino ka en e ofise manie dalane ma Karen.
mt0: <pad> Emmanuel Tallam, a Director of the Office for Justice and Human Rights in the Ministry of Justice, told Joland Weche that Ruto had a briefcase with him when he was at Karen's office.</s>

en: Ruto also skipped this year’s Labour Day celebrations at State House, Nairobi which was attended by Cotu boss Francis Atwoli and Labour Cabinet Secretary Simon Chelugui.
luo: Bende, Ruto ne obare e nyasi mar  Odiechieng Jotich ma higani, ma ne otim e Od Piny Owacho, Nairobi. Jakom mar Cotu  Francis Atwoli kod Jatelo Mochung' ne Jotij Sirkal, Simon Chelugui ne ni e nyasino.
mt0: <pad> Yesterday, Ruto attended the funeral of the judges' chief, which was held at the Nairobi Hospital. The funeral was attended by the Chief Justice Francis Atwoli and the Chief Deputy Justice Simon Chelugui.</s>

en: “We honour and celebrate the extraordinary sacrifices that workers, households and enterprises continue to make to advance our country’s transformation agenda amid the devastating surge in the Covid-19 pandemic,” the DP tweeted on May 1.
luo: Ruto ne owacho niya e tweeter: “Wamor kendo wapuoyo ahinya  chiwruok makende ma jotich, joot kod jo ohala osenyiso ka gidhi nyime timo kinda mondo dongruok obed e pinywa kata obedo ni tuwo mar Korona osemedo landore.”
mt0: <pad> Ruto said in a tweet: "I have been talking and discussing the very important issue of youth, youths and youths who are being treated for Covid-19 and who can show how they can be treated while the coronavirus restrictions are being followed."</s>

en: According to the Constitution, Ruto is the principal assistant of the president and should attend all gazetted State functions at which the only speakers are the President, him, the host governor and sometimes Raila.
luo: Kaluwore gi Chik mar Piny,  Ruto e jakony Ker maduong' moloyo ma onego obed kode e nyasi duto mopwodh mag sirkal ma joma wuoyoe gin Ker, Ruto owuon, Gavana ma kanyo kata Raila.
mt0: <pad> When the election was held on Friday, Ruto was the most senior leader in the country and he had to obey the code. He was also the first person to speak of the rule, himself, the Governor and his predecessor, Raila Odinga.</s>

en: Since March 2018, when President Kenyatta shook hands with ODM leader Raila Odinga, and more so 2020 and 2021, the DP has been isolated in his own government, making him an outsider in decision-making and key meetings.
luo: Nyaka ne Ker Kenyatta Mosre gi jatend ODM  Raila Odinga, Mach 2018, to ahinya ahinya e higni mag  2020 kod 2021 osebed ka idhiro Ruto mabor gi sirkal, ok miye thuolo mar riwruok gi jomoko sama ing'ado weche mag sirkal kata thuolo mar bedo e chokruoge madongo mag sirkal.
mt0: <pad> Nyaka and Ker Kenyatta Mosre in jatend ODM Raila Odinga, May 2018, to especially in 2020 and 2021 osebed ka Ruto mabor gi sirkal, ok miye thuolo mar riwruok gi jomoko sama ing'ado weche gi sirkal kata thuolo mar bedo e chokruoge madongo gi sirkal, ok miye thuolo mar riwruok gi jomoko sama ing'ado weche gi sirkal kata thuolo mar bedo e chokruoge madongo gi sirkal, ok miye thuolo mar riwruok gi jomoko sama ing'ado weche gi sirkal kata thuolo mar bedo e chokruoge madongo gi sirkal, ok miye thuolo mar riwruok gi jomoko sama ing'ado weche gi sirkal kata thuolo mar bedo e chokruoge madongo gi sirkal, ok miye thuolo mar riwruok gi jomoko sama ing'ado weche gi sirkal kata thuolo mar bedo e chokruoge madongo gi sirkal, ok miye thuolo mar riwruok gi jomoko sama ing'ado weche gi sirkal kata thuolo mar bedo e chokruoge madongo gi sirkal, ok miye thuolo mar riwruok gi jomoko sama ing'ado weche gi sirkal kata thuolo mar bedo e chokruoge madongo gi sirkal, ok miye thuolo mar riwruok gi jomoko sama ing'ado weche gi sirkal kata thuolo mar bedo e chokruoge madongo gi sirkal, ok miye thuolo mar riwruok gi jomoko sama ing'ado weche gi sirkal kata thuolo mar bedo e chokruoge madongo gi sirkal, ok miye thuolo mar riwruok gi jomoko sama ing'ado weche gi sirkal kata thuolo mar bedo e chokruoge madongo gi sirkal, ok miye thuolo mar riwruok gi jomoko sama ing'ado weche gi sirkal kata thuolo mar bedo e chokruoge madongo gi sirkal, ok miye thuolo mar riwruok gi

en: He has however attributed this isolation to an attempt by President Kenyatta’s inner circle to lock him out of the Head of State’s 2022 succession plan.
luo: En to owacho ni Ker Kenyatta ema dhire mabor kik oriwre gi jotelo madongo mondo kik obed achiel kuom joma chung' mondo okaw telo mar ker e higa mar 2022.
mt0: <pad> Kenyatta says he will run for president again in 2022</s>

en: “If President Kenyatta now trusts other people and consults more with Raila, I have taken it with grace. The style changed, and it is the prerogative of the President being the boss,” Ruto said during a recent interview with Citizen TV.
luo: Ruto ne owacho niya e mbaka moro ma ne ogoyo e Citizen TV; “Kapo ni Ker Kenyatta ogeno jomoko moloya, ma koro sani Raila ema oporogo weche, mano ok litna. Weche oselokore e kindwa kode, to mano en yiero mar Ker nikech enie jatelo.”
mt0: <pad> Ruto said in a long interview on Citizen TV; "I think that they are going to be very angry with Raila, but I don't know if he is going to be angry with me. We're going to be angry with him because he has a lot of ambitions."</s>

en: Today’s event whose theme is a “Hopeful Future” brings together leaders from all the arms of the Government and across the political divide when the country is in the middle of a pandemic.
luo: Wich maduong' ma ne iwuoyoe kawuono ne en, “Wan- gi Geno e Kinde Mabiro.” Wachno omiyo kidienje mopogore mag jotend sirkal  kod josiasa mag pati mopogore opogore oriwore kanyachiel sama  Kenya duto nyagore gi masira mar Korona.
mt0: <pad> "We are the ones who have been waiting for you," he said.</s>

en: The prayer meeting is being attended both virtually and physically.
luo: Jomoko odonjo e chokruogno e yor intanet to jomoko odhi kuno achiel kachiel.
mt0: <pad> Everyone has been using the internet or somebody has been using it for years.</s>

en: The event that takes place on the last Thursday of May each year, is hosted by Speakers of the bicameral parliament Justin Muturi and Kenneth Lusaka and Chaired by Senate Majority Leader Samuel Poghisio, co-chaired by Maanzo.
luo: Chokruogno itimoga higa ka higa, Tich Ang'wen mogik  e dwe mar Mei. Chokruogno ochung'ne gi Jotend Od Bura Moriw, Justin Muturi kod  Kenneth Lusaka. Jakom mar Chokruogno en Samuel Poghisio ma en Jatend Joma Thoth e Senet kod jakonyne ma en  Maanzo.
mt0: <pad> Chokruogno itimoga higa ka higa, Tich Ang'wen mogik e dwe mar Mei. Chokruogno ochung'ne gi Jotend Od Bura Moriw, Justin Muturi kod Kenneth Lusaka. Jakom mar Chokruogno en Samuel Poghisio ma en Jatend Joma Thoth e Senet kod jakonyne ma en Maanzo.</s>

en: Chief Justice Martha Koome, ANC leader Musalia Mudavadi and Wiper leader Kalonzo Musyoka are also in attendance.
luo: Jatend Jong'ad Bura, Martha Koome, kod jatend ANC Musalia Mudavadi gi Kalonzo Musyoka  ma en jatend Wiper bende ne nie chokruogno.
mt0: <pad> The chairman of the Jong'ad Bura Party, Martha Koome, and the leader of the ANC Musalia Mudavadi party Kalonzo Musyoka and the leader of the Wiper party, Maurice Ntombi, have been named as the winners of the election.</s>

en: The NPB was first held in 2003 after former President Mwai Kibaki took office with its primary purpose being to meet, engage, interact and pray for the nation in the company of fellow leaders from all sectors of society.
luo: Lamo mar Kwayo Kuwe ne Piny, ne ohang tim e higa mar 2003 kane Ker Mwai Kibaki okawo telo. Gima duong' ma ne omiyo ochake ne en ni jotelo mopogore opogore orom kanyachiel, giwuo kendo gilam ne piny.
mt0: <pad> The Jubilee Party, was founded in 2003 by President Mwai Kibaki. Its main goal was to promote a wide range of political parties, including the opposition, the unity and the reconciliation.</s>

en: Man seeks court's intervention to clear confusion over three dates of birth
luo: Ng'ato kwayo ni kot okonye nikech otesene nyiso tarige mopogore opogore mag nyuol.
mt0: <pad> Because you can distinguish different types of humans.</s>

en: Age is just but a number, the saying goes.
luo: Ngero moro wacho ni hik ng'ato ok en gimoro.
mt0: <pad> I'm sorry to hear that you don't know</s>

en: But that is not always true for everyone.
luo: To mano ok en adier kuom ji duto.
mt0: <pad> I'm sorry for the mistakes.</s>

en: One such person is Francis Paul Kerre whose identification documents show three different ages.
luo: Francis Paul Kerre en achiel kuom joma hikgi osechando ka oboke ge mag sirkal  nyiso tarige adek mopogore mag nyuol.
mt0: <pad> Francis Paul Kerre is a former chief of staff at the National Guard as he prepares to leave for his first tour of the military.</s>

en: Tired of the tribulations the discrepancies in his age have brought him, Kerre has moved to court to have the matter resolved once and for all.
luo: Gwenyruokno osechande gaming'a, mi koro ool. Omiyo odhi e kot mondo orie wachno dichiel ma ok dogie kendo.
mt0: <pad> I've been playing games for years, but I'm not sure if I'll ever be able to play again.</s>

en: His birth certificate and national ID show he is 70, KRA Pin Certificate 66 and his passport 60 years.
luo: Satifiketne mar nyuol kod kipandene nyiso ni en jahigni 70, KRA Pin Certificate mare to nyiso ni en jahigni 66 to paspot mare nyiso ni en jahigni 60.
mt0: <pad> The nuclear code certificate of my father is 70 years old, the KRA Pin Certificate of my father is 66 years old or my passport is 60 years old.</s>

en: Kerre now wants these details aligned to give him a peace of mind and spare him the many questions he sometimes has to answer.
luo: Kerre koro dwaro ni orie wachni dichiel mondo otesego duto onyis tarik achiel mondo obedie gi kuwe ma ok thung'e gi penjo kaka jatimore.
mt0: <pad> Kerry now needs you to read the book of the world and know the history of the world and ask questions about what happened.</s>

en: He says an earlier plea to the registrar to rectify the anomaly did not bear fruit.
luo: Kerre wacho ni ne okwongo okwayo rejistra mondo oriene wachno, to rejistra ne ok okonye.
mt0: <pad> Kerry said he couldn't register the speech to either endorse it or deny it.</s>

en: He contends that the person who prepared his birth certificate entered the wrong birth date.
luo: Kerre oramo ni ng'at ma ne ondiko satifiketne mar nyuol ne ondiko tarik ma ok kare.
mt0: <pad> Kerry says that the people who say that the nuclear weapon is a science fiction story are not aware of the history of the weapon.</s>

en: Court documents read that he has since confirmed the year he was born.
luo: Nonro mag kot nyiso ni gie sani, Kerre oseyango higa ma ne onyuolee.
mt0: <pad> When they told me that I was going to die, Kerry took off her jacket and went to bed.</s>

en: Kerre says he was born on October 15, 1954.
luo: Kerre wacho ni ne onyuole Oktoba 15, 1954.
mt0: <pad> Kerre said he was born on October 15, 1954.</s>

en: This is the date in his KRA Pin certificate, which means he is 66.
luo: Mani e tarik manie Pin satifiket mar KRA, manyiso ni en jahigni 66.
mt0: <pad> KRA, manyiso ni en jahigni 66</s>

en: The petitioner avers that the error in the birth certificate was caused by the initial entry in his birth certificate when he was born and he has since confirmed his correct date of birth.
luo: Kerre onyono ni kane onyuole, ne ondik  tarik ma ok kare e satifiketne, kendo ni gie sani  ong'eyo tarik sie ma ne onyuolee.
mt0: <pad> Kerry says that before you left, you wrote a fake story, and that now you know the true story you were writing.</s>

en: The petitioner seeks court’s intervention to rectify his birth certificate and have the correct date of birth entered in the register and his birth certificate,” Kerre’s court papers read in part.
luo: Kerre kwayo ni kot okonye rieyo tarik manie satifiketne mar nyuol mi oket tarik makare e rejista,” Mago gin moko kuom weche ma ne Kerre okwayo ni kot otimne.
mt0: <pad> Kerre says he will not be able to determine the date of the nuclear test that was registered in the United States.</s>

en: Teenage pregnancy, early marriages to blame for Ugenya school dropout cases
luo: E piny Ugenya, nyiri mang'eny weyo skul nikech gimako ich kata gidhi tedo chon.
mt0: <pad> I couldn't go to school because I was too ill to go to school.</s>

en: The Ministry of Education has blamed teenage pregnancies and early marriages for rising cases of school dropouts in Ugenya, Siaya County.
luo: Migawo Mochung'ne Somo wacho ni kwan mar nyiri moweyo skul omedore Ugenya, Kaunti ma Siaya,  nikech nyiri mang'eny mako ich kata dhi tedo chon.
mt0: <pad> The chief of the district, Mr. Somo, said his mother's school route was delayed in Ugenya, County of Siaya, because her mother had no money to pay for the school.</s>

en: County Director of Education Nelson Sifuna said there are also reports of children dropping out of school for bodaboda business while others cross to Uganda through Busia border in search of jobs.
luo: Jatelo Mochung'ne Migawo mar Somo e Kauntino, Nelson Sifuna  wacho ni ripode mamoko ma bende giyudo gin ni nyithindo moko weyo skul mondo giriemb bodaboda to moko ng'ado gi Busia ka gidhi dwaro tich Uganda.
mt0: <pad> The chief of the Department of Education in Uganda, Nelson Sifuna said that a report he had received showed that a schoolboy was driving a bodaboda or a taxi to Busia and crossing into Uganda.</s>

en: Sifuna urged locals to take advantage of the free primary education programme despite other challenges to ensure all children of school-going age attend school.
luo: Sifuna ne onyiso jo Ugenya ni kata obedo ni gin kod chandruoge mang'eny, gi ti maber gi chenro ma sirkal oketo mar somo maonge chudo e skunde mag praimari. Gine ni nyithindo duto monego obed e skul, dhi e skul kaka dwarore.
mt0: <pad> Although there are many challenges, the circular system of education is very important in primary school. We want all children to go to school, not only those who have a good understanding of the basics.</s>

en: "But we also understand that life at home has been difficult especially for the orphans who have to provide for themselves," said Sifuna.
luo: Sifuna ne owacho ni;  "Kata kamano, wang'eyo ni ngima osebedo matek e mier, to ahinya ahinya ngima osebedo matek ne nyithind kiye ma nyaka many chiembgi giwegi."
mt0: <pad> "But I know that you have a heart of gold, or at least a heart of silver, and that you want to make many changes in your life."</s>

en: He said most of those who drop out of school said they did not have uniforms while some said they had to fend for their siblings or themselves.
luo: Sifuna wacho ni ng'eny nyithindo maweyo skul wacho ni giweyo skul nikech gionge yunifom kata ochunogi manyo kaka gichiemo kata  kaka ginyalo pidho nyithindgi mamoko.
mt0: <pad> I don't want to say that anyone who is going to school is going to school because they don't have uniforms or because they don't know how to cook or because they don't know how to play football</s>

en: Sifuna challenged parents and guardians to monitor school-going children so that they don't engage in negative social activities that could distract them from school.
luo: Sifuna ne ojiwo jonyuol kod joma moko marito nyithindo mondo gine ni  nyithindo ma pod nie skul ok donj e timbe maricho manyalo monogi tieko skul.
mt0: <pad> I don't know</s>

en: “Most of the children also live with their grandparents and you know they are never strict with their grandchildren who get lots of freedom and end up engaging in negative social activities," he said.
luo: Sifuna ne omedo wacho niya; “Ng'eny nyithindo odak gi deye kata kweregi to joma oti jo mbeko tol ahinya ne nyikwagi kendo mano miyo nyithindogo thuolo mar donjo e timbe maricho."
mt0: <pad> 'I don't know', he said.</s>

en: Between 2018 to 2020 about 53 pupils dropped out of school while another 39 students dropped out of Secondary schools in Ugenya sub-county, Siaya County.
luo: E kind higni mag 2018 gi 2020 nyithind praimari 53  gi nyithind sekondari 39 noweyo skul e sab kaunti ma Ugenya, Siaya Kaunti.
mt0: <pad> simply say you don't know</s>

en: Meanwhile, Daniel Odhiambo, a local philanthropist, has donated over 200 school uniforms to needy pupils.
luo: Wach maber ma ne otimore en ni  Daniel Odhiambo, ja Ugenya ma chunye ler kendo mohero konyo ji, ne ochiwo yunifom 200 ne nyithindo ma jochan.
mt0: <pad> Daniel Odhiambo, a very generous and compassionate man, has donated 200 uniforms to the children of the disabled.</s>

en: Odhiambo said he made the donation after receiving complaints from local widows and grandmothers taking care of orphans that they could not meet the pupils’ needs because of the tough economic situation in the country.
luo: Odhiambo ne owacho ni otimo kamano nikech ne owinjo ywak mag mond liete kod deye mapidho nyithi kiye. Giwacho ni ok ginyal chopo dwaro mag nyithind skulgo nikech ngima osebedo matek ahinya.
mt0: <pad> They said that they wouldn't be able to meet the demands of the schoolchildren because they were too young.</s>

en: He said some school-going children from needy backgrounds, mostly orphans, have dropped out of school due to lack of school uniform.
luo: Owacho ni moko kuom nyithind skul ma jochan oseweyo skul nikech gionge yunifom.
mt0: <pad> He said that one of my schoolchildren went out of school because he didn't wear the uniform.</s>

en: "Most of them especially girls feel shy when they don’t have uniforms or have torn ones and end up dropping out of school. That is why I sponsored them to stay in school," he said.
luo: Ne omedo wacho niya; "Ng'eny nyithindo ma jochan, to moloyo nyithindo manyiri wigi kuot ka gionge yunifom kata ka yunifom margi oyiech, kendo mano miyo giweyo skul. Omiyo ang'iewonegi yunifom mondo kik giwe skul."
mt0: <pad> He said, "Some children, especially the poor, do not wear uniforms or have their uniforms torn, and that is why they are being expelled from school. Some parents will buy uniforms so that they cannot be expelled from school."</s>

en: The ministry has now resorted to sensitisation in all forums, use of role models to offer talks to the school-going children.
luo: Migawo mar Somo ong'ado ni gibiroga wuoyo e wi wach nyithindo manyiri weyo skul  sa moro amora ma giyudo thuolo mar wuoyo gi ji  kendo gibiro kwayo jogo ma gin ranyisi mabeyo e oganda mondo ojiw nyithi skul gi twege.
mt0: <pad> The Ministry of Education has decided to speak on the issue of school leavers who have been released from school for any time since they were born and will ask those with new experiences in the community to come forward with their recommendations before the school principal leaves.</s>

en: Odhiambo encouraged former students to visit their schools, especially in the villages to help the ministry fight school dropout.
luo: Odhiambo ne okwayo jo ma osetieko skul mondo olim skunde ma ne gisomoe, to moloyo skunde manie gweng' mondo gikony Migawo mar Somo kedo gi wach nyithindo weyo skul.
mt0: <pad> When you finish school, you will be asked to answer questions that were given to you, or even questions that you could have answered before they were given</s>

en: He lauded the county government for initiating adopt a school programme that has been distributing masks and sanitisers in local schools.
luo: Odhiambo ne opuoyo sirkal mar kaunti kuom chako chenro mar  Konyo Skunde. Ma en program ma osebedo katero masks kod sanitaisa e skunde manie gweng'.
mt0: <pad> I've been speaking to the state board of health about the emergency response plan. I have a program that has been deploying masks for sanitation in the emergency response centers.</s>

en: "We have taken advantage of the programme to encourage alumnus to visit their former schools and offer talks," he added.
luo: Ne omedo wacho niya; "Watiyo gi thuolono mondo wakwa ji mondo olim skundegi machon kendo gijiw nyithindo ma somo kuno gi twege."
mt0: <pad> Ne Omedo said, "I'm going to open the gates today to give my blessings and encouragement to the young people who have been teaching me here.</s>

en: Drama in Migori, widow evicted from land by sister-in-law
luo: Tula muoch Migori, sama nyamin dichwo riembo chi owadgi ma chi liel  e dala.
mt0: <pad> When I was a child, I couldn't understand the words.</s>

en: Standing on her husband’s grave, Felister Wabwire wails uncontrollably as police officers plead with her to leave.
luo: Felister Wabwire ne ochung' e liend chwore kogoyo nduru malit sama polise ne temo saye mondo owuog e dala.
mt0: <pad> Felister Wabwire said he was a very good friend and when he went to the police station he was told that he would be arrested.</s>

en: The police are here to execute an eviction order on the widow from the land she claims was bought by her late husband, Fedelis Wabwire, in Oruba Keyo Village, Migori County, 25 years ago.
luo: Kot ne ooro polisego mondo gidhi gigol Felister e lowono. Miyono to  wacho ni chwore, Fedelis Wabwire, mawuok e Gweng' ma  Oruba Keyo, Migori Kaunti, ne ong'iewo lowono higni 25 mokalo.
mt0: <pad> Kot says he has been arrested since the day he was found by police. His mother, Fedelis Wabwire, of the village of Oruba Keyo, Mogoro County, said she had been waiting for him for 25 years.</s>

en: The eviction followed Senior Principal Magistrate Johnstone Munguti's order obtained by the widow’s sister-in-law, Nekesa Mukhongo.
luo: Jang'ad Bura Maduong' Johnstone Munguti e ma ne ogolo chik ma ne omiyo Nekesa Mukhongo, nyamin dichwo ma ne osethono, ratiro mar riembo chi liel.
mt0: <pad> Johnstone Munguti, a man who knew the truth of the truth, was a very good friend to me.</s>

en: Nekesa claims the land belongs to her and that her mother and two brothers were buried on it.

en: Girl, 17, disappears in puzzling circumstances on first day of Term 3
luo: Nyako ma jahigni 17, olal odiechieng' mokwongo mar Tam mar 3
mt0: <pad> He was 17 years old when he was taken to the hospital by his father.</s>

en: A17-year-old girl from Oyugis in Homa Bay County has disappeared from home in unclear circumstances.
luo: Nyako ma jahigni 17  ma wuok Oyugis e Kaunti ma Homa Bay, olal e yo ma omako dhog ji.
mt0: <pad> The 17 year old Oyugis, from Homa Bay County, was killed by the flood waters that hit the village.</s>

en: Eunice Awino, a student of Atemo Mixed Secondary School, vanished from home on May 10; the first day of Term Three studies in the adjusted 2020 academic calendar.
luo: Eunice Awino, masomo Atemo Mixed Secondary School, ne owuok dalagi Mei, tarik 10. Mano ne en odiechieng' mokwongo mar tam mar adek e higa mar 2020, mikwanoe tam mopogore.
mt0: <pad> Eunice Awino, a student at Atemo Mixed Secondary School, died on May 10. Mano was the first female student to be admitted to school in 2020, her classmates were different.</s>

en: On the said-date, the teenager’s mother, Rael Akinyi, says she went to her bedroom at 6am, and found Awino still asleep.
luo: Rael Akinyi, ma en min Awino, wacho ni chieng'no ne odhi e od nindo mar Awino gimoro sa 12 mokinyi to oyudo ka Awino pod nindo.
mt0: <pad> Rael Akinyi, a friend of Awino, said he was shocked to learn that his son was sleeping in the house of Awino when he awoke.</s>

en: Waking up late was uncharacteristic of the teenager, the mother said.
luo: Owacho ni nyakono ok chiewga modeko chieng' skul.
mt0: <pad> I'm a kid, but I know you don't know</s>

en: Her school is quite far from where we stay.
luo: Skul modhiga bor gi kama wadakie.
mt0: <pad> i don't know</s>

en: “On normal days, she usually leaves earlier than 6am,” Akinyi told The Standard.
luo: Akinyi ne owacho ne The Standard niya: "Ndalo skul Awino jawuokga e ot kapok sa 12 oromo."
mt0: <pad> Akinyi told The Standard: "The school has been closed for at least 12 years.</s>

en: When she asked the teenager why she hadn’t left for school yet, Awino allegedly told her she hadn’t shaved her head, and she would, therefore, be ordered to return home upon reporting to school.
luo: "Kane openjo Awino gimomiyo pok ne odhi e skul, Awino ne owacho ni pok ne olielo wiye, to ka odhi e skul ibiro mana loke ni odog dala."
mt0: <pad> "When I asked my mother if you were going to school, she said that you were going to school at the same time as I was going to school, so I thought you were going to school at the same time as I was going to school."</s>

en: “She further said that no serious learning takes place on Day One of school resumption,” said Akinyi.
luo: Akinyi ne omedo ni Awino ne owacho ni; "Onge somo malong'o ma dhiga nyime e Chieng' Yepo."
mt0: <pad> Akinyi said, "I have heard the words of Awino.</s>

en: The distressed mother said she, consequently, allowed the girl to stay home as she (Awino) prepared to report to school the following day; May 11.
luo: Miyo ma koro kibach nego ne owacho ni ne oyiene Awino bet dala ka ong'eyo ni oikore dhi e skul chieng' maluwe ma ne en Mei tarik 11.
mt0: <pad> I'm sorry to hear that you are not a girl</s>

en: Akinyi, thereafter, left for Oyugis Town, where she was scheduled to meet a staffer attached to the registration of births office so that she could process Awino’s birth certificate, ahead of KCSE exam enrolment.
luo: "Bang' mano, Akinyi, ne odhi e taon mar Oyugis kama ne owinjore odhi orom gi achiel kuom joma tiyo e ofis mar sirkal mikanoe rijista mar nyuol, mondo olosne barup nyuol mar Awino ma ne idhi tigo mondo okete obed achiel kuom joma dhi timo penj mar KCSE."
mt0: <pad> Bang' mano, Akinyi, ne oyũrĩire gũkũra nĩ ũmwe wa mĩthemba ya mbere ya gũtũra e ofisi ya county registry, gũthũra a ũhoro wa ũhoro wa mbere wa gũtũra KCSE.</s>

en: When the mother-of-ten returned home in the afternoon, her daughter, who is the lastborn, was not around.
luo: "Kane Akinyi oduogo dala, Awino ma en choke kuom nyithinde apar, ne onge."
mt0: <pad> "When Akinyi went away, Awino was shocked by the fourth day, and I was not."</s>

en: Her school bag was also missing.
luo: Bagne mar skul bende ne onge.
mt0: <pad> When I was a kid, I couldn't understand.</s>

en: Her books, however, had been stashed in a sack and placed at a corner in the living room.
luo: Kata kamano, bugene ne oso e gunia moket e kona moro kor budho.
mt0: <pad> When I was young, I couldn't understand the phrase.</s>

en: The money Akinyi had left Awino for food was still on a stool, the girl’s mother said.
luo: Miyono wacho ni pesa ma ne oweyo ne Akinyi mondo ong'iewgo chiemo ne pod nie stul.
mt0: <pad> Miyono said that the money he had taken from Akinyi was to buy a mattress and a chair.</s>

en: Neighbours told Akinyi that they saw the teenager leaving home on a boda boda at noon on May 10.
luo: Jirende ne owacho ne Akinyi ni ne gineno Awino kawuok dala e boda boda gimoro sa auchiel modiechieng' Mei tarik 10.
mt0: <pad> 'I'm going to be a boda-boda driver on May 10th.</s>

en: “I, immediately, inquired from all my relatives who live nearby whether Awino had visited them, but they responded in the negation,” said Akinyi.
luo: “Akinyi wacho ni kanyo gikanyo ne ochako penjo wedegi duto ma odak machiegni kabe Awino ne olimogi, to ne ginyise ni ooyo."
mt0: <pad> "I told him that I'd be going to answer all the questions I've been asking him since he came to me, and he said that he would."</s>

en: Later that day, at around 9pm, Awino called her mother using an anonymous contact, and informed her that she was housed by a middle-aged woman in Kisii, and that Akinyi shouldn’t worry about her.
luo: Bang'e chieng'no, gimoro saa adek motieno, Awino ne ogoche ne min mare gi namba moro ma ok ong'ere konyise ni en e od miyo moro Kisii, omiyo min-gi kik bed gi kibach.
mt0: <pad> When they were ready, they knew that they were going to be asleep.</s>

en: The distraught parent reported the happenings to her daughter’s school the following day before filing a missing person’s report at Oriwo Police Station.
luo: Miyono ma koro chunye chandore ne otero wachno e skul ma nyare somoe kae to odhi goyo ripot ni nyathine olal e Polis Stesen ma Oriwo.
mt0: <pad> When the boy was found, Miyono said he had been waiting for her at school and that she had come to report her missing at the Oriwo Police Station.</s>

en: Almost two weeks later, Awino is yet to be found.
luo: Jumbe ariyo koro osekalo to pok one Awino.
mt0: <pad> When I'm going to be a judge, I'll have to leave the court.</s>

en: “The only thing I know is that she was last spotted in Nyamira Market. My attempts to trace her have been futile. I hope we find her safe.”
luo: Akinyi wacho niya: “Wach ma ne awinjo mogik en ni ne onene e Chiro ma Nyamira. Asetemo manye to pok ayude. Ageno ni ongima kama entie.”
mt0: <pad> Akinyi said: "I told him that I was in the Holy Mountain. He asked me to come and help him. He told me that he wouldn't let me go. He told me that he wouldn't let me go. He told me that he wouldn't let me go. He told me that he wouldn't let me go. He told me that he wouldn't let me go.</s>

en: Atemo Mixed Secondary School principal, Philip Ayoo, confirmed to The Standard that the minor is a student at the institution.
luo: Philip Ayoo, ma en japuonj maduong' Atemo Mixed Secondary School ne owacho ne The Standard ni rawerano en japuonjre e skundno.
mt0: <pad> Philip Ayoo, a former pupil of Atemo Mixed Secondary School, was reported to The Standard on Sunday after being published in Japan.</s>

en: She (Awino) has never had any disciplinary problems.
luo: Owacho ni Awino ne en nyako modimbre, mawinjo wach kendo pok nochendoga e skul.
mt0: <pad> Owacho and Awino were a very kind, responsible and persistent young man.</s>

en: We are shocked to learn that she went missing from home,” said Ayoo.
luo: Ayoo wacho niya: "Wabwok winjo ni oringo owuok dala.”
mt0: <pad> Ayo said to him: "I knew you were dying.</s>

en: Rusana's candidature causes political heat as race to succeed Obado intensifies
luo: Wach chung' mar Rusana kelo ywarruok mang'eny ahinya mag siasa sama  ng'wech milaroe kom Obado chopo e akere keke.
mt0: <pad> The russian election has caused many political changes in the past week as Obama's re-election campaign took place just days after he was elected.</s>

en: he entry of Migori County Secretary into the race to succeed Governor Okoth Obado appears to have rattled seasoned politicians who have accused him of using elders to endorse his candidature.
luo: Josiasa machon ok mor ni Rusana ma en Jatelo mar Kaunti ma Migori odonjo e ng'wech milaroe kom mar  Gavana Okoth Obado. Giwacho ni odonjo e ng'wejno apiny piny kuom wuoyo gi jodongo mondo oyiere.
mt0: <pad> They are angry that the Governor of Mgoro County, Okoth Obado, has been accused of lying about his remarks.</s>

en: Christopher Rusana's endorsement by Suba Community elders has seen other aspirants cry foul, saying the decision of the elders who attended the May 3, meeting in Kisii was compromised.
luo: "E chokruok moro ma ne otim Kisii, Mei tarik 3, jodongo mag  Suba ne oyiero Christopher Rusana mondo ema  okaw kom mar Obado. Kata kamano, wachore ni chokruogno ne ok otim e yo malong'o."
mt0: <pad> "In a statement dated May 3, the South African minister of foreign affairs Christopher Rusana told Obado that his government had been taking action against the corruption. However, he said that his government was not taking action against the corruption.</s>

en: The aspirants led by Migori Woman Rep Pamela Odhiambo have vowed never to step down.
luo: Joma moko ma bende laro komno, ne owacho ni ok gibi wuok e ng'wejno ng'ang'. Ne otelnegi gi Pamela Odhiambo, ma en Migori Women Rep  matiende ni Miyo mochung' ne Mine ma  Kaunti ma Migori.
mt0: <pad> One of the ladies who also played in the game, said that she was not going to be able to play in the game. I thanked Pamela Odhiambo, a Member of the Migori Women Rep matiende ni Miyo mochung' and Mine ma Kaunti ma Migori.</s>

en: Odhiambo, businessman Philip Mwabe, former Migori MP John Pesa, former Mombasa executive Seth Odongo and businessman Owiso Ngao have rubbished the endorsement, saying the process was unfair and that the outcome was influenced.
luo: Pamela Odhiambo, Philip Mwabe ma  ja ohala , John Pesa ma jabunge machon ma Migori, Seth Odongo, ma yande omako tich maduong' Mombasa kod Owiso Ngao ma bende ja ohala wacho ni wach mar ni jodongo oyiero Rusana mondo ema ochung' en gima ok ginyal tiyogo nikech yierono ne olengore konchiel kendo ne ok otime kaka owinjore.
mt0: <pad> Pamela Odhiambo, Philip Mwabe, John Pesa, former mayor of Mombasa and Owiso Ngao, also a former mayor, said that they were unable to work with Mr. Ruzana because they felt he was not being fair and did not take what he deserved.</s>

en: The exercise was conducted by elders led by Pentecostal Evangelical Faith of Africa (PEFA) chairman John Okinda and a team of six opinion leaders from Suna East and Suna West constituencies.
luo: Yierono ne otim gi jodongo ma ne itayo gi John Okinda ma en jakom mar PEFA kata Pentecostal Evangelical Faith of Africa kod jodongo auchiel mowouk e konstichwensi mag Suna East kod Suna West.
mt0: <pad> I remember the meeting that I had with John Okinda as chairman of PEFA or Pentecostal Evangelical Faith of Africa and the meeting that I had with the committee of Suna East and Suna West.</s>

en: The meeting held at the Carmel Park hotel in Kisii town was attended by Mrs Odhiambo, Rusana, Mwabe and Pesa while Odongo and Ngao did not attend.
luo: "Chokruokno ne otimore Carmel Park hotel, e taon ma Kisii. Joma ne nie chokruokno ne gin Mrs Odhiambo, Rusana, Mwabe kod Pesa. Odongo kod Ngao ne onge."
mt0: <pad> The party was held at the Carmel Park hotel in Kisii. The guests were Mrs Odhiambo, Rusana, Mwabe and Pesa. Odongo and Ngao were not present.</s>

en: Speaking to The Standard early this week, Mwabe said he opposed the voting idea after the candidates present refused to pick insisting that despite the selection of Rusana, he would be on the ballot.
luo: "E chak jumani, Mwabe ne owacho ne The Standard ni ne ok oriwo lwedo wach goyo kura nikech joma nie ng'wejno notamore yiero ng'at achiel machung'. Oramo ni kata obedo ni ne oyier Rusana, en  pod obiro chung'."
mt0: <pad> "On Monday, Mwabe told The Standard that he had decided to withdraw from the political party because he thought it was a mistake to leave the party. He said that even if you were going to run for president, he would not be allowed to run."</s>

en: When contacted by The Standard, Pesa and Mrs Odhiambo said they are still in the race.
luo: "Kane The Standard, owuoyo gi Pesa kod Mrs Odhiambo, ji ariyogo ne owacho ni gin e ng'wech mar laro kom Obado."
mt0: <pad> "According to The Standard, he spoke with Mrs Odhiambo, who said that they were planning to play for Obado."</s>

en: “My candidature is not on reverse gear. I will be on the ballot come 2022,” said Mrs Odhiambo.
luo: Mrs Odhiambo ne owacho niya: "Pok aloko pacha kata matin. Abiro chung' e higa mar 2022."
mt0: <pad> Mrs Odhiambo said: "Pok talks every morning. He will be back in 2022."</s>

en: Rusana has, however, downplayed the wrangles, promising to consult with his opponents to ensure the region produces a candidate.
luo: "Kata kamano, Rusana reyo areya ywarruok manie kindgino, owacho ni obiro wuoyo gi jowetenego kendo obiro neno ni ng'ato achiel ema ochung'."
mt0: <pad> "However, when Ruzana went to the hospital today, she said she would speak the words that we had spoken and see if there were any people who could understand her."</s>

en: In a phone interview with The Standard on May 16, Rusana who wants to run on an ODM ticket wondered why the change of heart yet his opponents fully participated in the exercise.
luo: "Mei tarik 16, kane The Standard wuoyo e simu gi Rusana madwaro chung' gi otiko mar ODM, jalno ne owacho ni owuoro gimomiyo jowetene ne oloko pachgi to ne gin e chokruogno kendo ne giriwo lwedo yierono."
mt0: <pad> "On May 16, when The Standard talked with Rusana on the phone about the ODM's office, he said that he had been carrying a large number of memorabilia that he had never seen or heard of and that he was willing to pay for them and would be willing to pay for the damages."</s>

en: “We were all present, and they fully participated, I still don’t know what happened a few days later, maybe the media can find out from them,” he said.
luo: "“Rusana wacho niya: Ne wan e chokruogno waduto, kendo ne wariwo lwedo gik moko duto ma ne timore. Pod ok ang'eyo gima ne otimore ndalo manok bang'e. Jofwamb weche nyalo penjogi."
mt0: <pad> "Rusana said: I was a child of everyone, and I saw everything that happened. You don't know what happened after my father's death. The wise men will ask you.</s>

en: He said with the elders’ blessing, it is all system go as he tries to consolidate his backyard before he can approach other regions.
luo: "Ne owacho ni nikech koro jodongo riwe lwedo, en ng'wech ma ok ong'i chien. Odwaro riwo jothurgi mondo obed  achiel, kae to ochak manyo ombul kuonde mamoko."
mt0: <pad> "If you think that we're going to be a dog, then you're going to be a cat. You want to be a cat, and then you want to be a cat. You want to be a cat, and then you want to be a cat.</s>

en: The country secretary said he is banking on the support of the masses and not that of Governor Obado as his opponents are claiming to win the seat come 2022.
luo: Jatelono wacho ni ogeno ni raia biro goyone ombul, ok ogeno ni  Gavana Obado biro sire, nimar joma piem kode wacho ni gibiro kawo komno e higa mar 2022.
mt0: <pad> Jatelono says he is confident that the people will vote, but he is not sure that Governor Obama will run, since he announced on Wednesday that he will run for re-election in 2022.</s>

en: “There is something the elders saw in me, I don’t take it for granted and will not disappoint their trust,” added Rusana.
luo: Rusana medo niya: "Nitie gima jodongogo ne oneno kuoma. Ang'eyo ni gigena, kendo abiro tiyo kaka dwarore. Ok gibi ywago ang'e ni ne giyiera."
mt0: <pad> Rusana added: "Nitite gima jodongogo ne oneno kuoma. Ang'eyo ni gigena, kendo abiro tiyo kaka dwarore. Ok gibi ywago ang'e ni ne giyiera.</s>

en: “Because I am always a quiet person, my opponents have been underestimating me. I will not mind getting the support of like-minded leaders who will help me shape Migori, I will first take my mandate to people.”
luo: “Nikech ajaling', jowetena ma walarogo kom osebedo ka ochaya. An to aikora tiyo kanyachiel gi jotelo ma waparogo machal kendo mabiro konya kelo dongruok Migori. Kata kamano, nyaka akwong nyiso jo Migori chenro ma an go.”
mt0: <pad> "Nikech ajaling', amoon naa ma oyomba eh. An to aikora tiyo kanyachiel gi jotelo ma waparogo machal kendo mabiro konya kelo dongruok Migori. en: According to the Suba community elders led by chairman Riogi Riogi, having a single candidate would increase their son or daughter’s chances of succeeding Governor Obado.
luo: Kaluwore Riogi Riogi,  ma en jakom mar jodong Suba, jodongogo neno ni bedo gi ng'ato achiel machung' e lo jo Suba duto nyalo konyo wuodgi kata nyargi kawo kom mar Gavana Obado.
mt0: <pad> The chief of the South African National Guard, Riogi Riogi, said that he was a "proud" father of his son.</s>

en: Riogi said he is aware of the wrangle, but called on other aspirants who felt shortchanged to seek dialogue.
luo: Riogi ne owacho ni ong'eyo ywarruok madhi nyime kata kamano, okwayo joma ng'urgo mondo giwuo kendo giwinjre.
mt0: <pad> Riogi said that you knew the fate of the beasts, but you tried to keep them from dying and growing.</s>

en: “In our own wisdom, we saw that placing a single candidate would strengthen the community’s unity and supporting the candidate would be easy and hence the winning of the elections,” Riogi said.
luo: "“Riogi ne owacho niya: Kaka jodongo, ne waneno ni en gima riek keto ng'at achiel mondo ema ochung'. Mano miyo Jo Suba bedo achiel kendo riwo  lwedo  ng'at achielno bedo mayot, to mano nyalo miyo wakaw komno."
mt0: <pad> "Riogi ne owacho niya: Kaka jodongo, ne waneno ni en gima riek keto ng'at achiel mondo ema ochung'. Mano miyo Jo Suba bedo achiel kendo riwo lwedo ng'at achielno bedo mayot, to mano nyalo miyo wakaw komno."</s>

en: The Suna clan, which is part of the Suba community, has been angling to field a single candidate to solidify Suna West (46,162 votes) and Suna East (46,574 votes) out of the 389,182 votes in Migori.
luo: Anyuola mar jo  Suna, ma gin oganda mar Suba, osegadwaro ni gibed gi ng'at achiel ma chung' mondo oriw  Suna West ( ma nigi ombulu 46,162) kod Suna East (ma nigi ombulu 46,574) kuom ombulu 389,182 mag Migori duto.
mt0: <pad> Suna, a suburb of the capital, is a suburb of the capital city of Nairobi.</s>

en: With Governor Obado ditching the ODM for the People’s Democratic Party (PDP) and the Kuria community factor, the 2022 Migori gubernatorial race could be the trickiest.
luo: "Weche dhi twere e ng'wech mar laro kom Gavana e dala mar Migori e higa mar 2022. Nimar Gavana Obada weyo ODM kendo dhi e PDP kata People’s Democratic Party kendo nitiere wach mar oganda jo Kuria."
mt0: <pad> "We are going to run for the next governorship of Maryland in 2022. As Governor Obada left ODM and joined PDP or People's Democratic Party and started his campaign on the issue of youth and women."</s>

en: Obado is reported to have mounted a massive membership recruitment drive for the PDP after announcing he will ditch Raila Odinga-led ODM.
luo: Wachore ni bang' lando ni owuok  ODM mitelone gi  Raila Odinga, Obado osebedo katimo kinda ahinya mar rwako ji mang'eny e pati mar PDP.
mt0: <pad> Since he was elected as the ODM's nominee by Raila Odinga, Obado has been involved in a very intense campaign to overthrow his rival, the PDP's leader John Magufuli.</s>

en: The governor's point men have rolled out registration and membership drive across the county manually and digitally in an exercise expected to run up to the end of the year.
luo: Joma tiyo ne gavana wuotho e kauntino duto ka girwako ji e pati mar PDP. Jomoko indiko nyingegi e otas to jomoko irwako nyingegi e kompyuta. En tich ma gibiro timo nyaka giko higani.
mt0: <pad> They know that the governor has been a member of the PDP party. Some people are giving their votes by hand or some are giving their votes by computer. I want to know how many people have voted for him.</s>

en: Other aspirants who are eying the seat include Assembly Speaker Boaz Okoth, Senator Ochillo Ayacko, former Rongo MP Dalmas Otieno, former Nyatike MP Edick Anyanga, US-based academician Mark Ogutu and businessman Robert Okong’o.
luo: Joma moko mabende dwaro komno gin; Boaz Okoth ma en Jatelo mar Od Bura, Seneta Ochillo Ayacko, Dalmas Otieno ma en Ja bunge machon ma Rongo, Edick Anyanga ma en Jabunge machon ma Nyatike, Mark Ogutu  jasomo man Amerka kod Robert Okong’o ma en ja ohala.
mt0: <pad> They are; Boaz Okoth, the Minister of Finance, Senate Ochillo Ayacko, Dalmas Otieno, the Member of the House of Representatives, Edick Anyanga, the American Ambassador and Robert Okong'o, the Deputy Speaker of the House of Representatives.</s>

en: Homa Bay health workers: MCAs interfere with health services
luo: Jothieth ma Homa Bay: Jo Od Bura mag Kaunti donjore gi weche thieth
mt0: <pad> Jothieth ma Homa Bay: Jo Od Bura mag Kaunti donjore gi weche thieth gi weche thieth ma Homa Bay</s>

en: Health workers’ unions in Homa Bay have accused Members of the County Assembly (MCAs) of interfering with health services at the County Referral Hospital.
luo: Riwruoge mag jo thieth Homa Bay wacho ni jo Od Bura mag Kaunti matiende ni MCAs donjore gi weche thieth e Homa Bay County Referral Hospital.
mt0: <pad> Homa Bay Health Authority said the County Board of Health recommended that MCAs be allowed to bring patients to the hospital.</s>

en: The County Assembly recently adopted a report that the acting Chief Executive Officer of the hospital Peter Ogolla be removed to pave way for the reinstatement of the former CEO Dr Lilian Kocholla who was recently shown the door.
luo: Jo Od Bura ma Homa Bay nyocha owacho ni  ogol Peter Ogolla e kom mar telo e osiptandno. Peter omako komno nikech nyocha ogol jatelo ma yande nie komno, Dr Lilian Kocholla. Jo Od Bura dwaro ni odwok Dr Lilian Kocholla e migawono.
mt0: <pad> Peter Ogolla, a patient at the Homa Bay Hospital, was killed by his doctor's examination. Dr Lilian Kocholla was treated for poisoning by Peter's doctor. The Homa Bay Police said that Dr Kocholla was arrested and released on bail.</s>

en: Dr Kocholla was sent on compulsory leave because of alleged poor management which had put the hospital in a deplorable state.
luo: Ne ochun Dr Kocholla mondo odhi e rusa nikech wachore ni ok oti maber kendo mano omiyo  weche richo ahinya e osiptandno.
mt0: <pad> I would like to thank Dr. Kocholla for telling me that you are ok and that he will know the painful words you have been asking him.</s>

en: This made MCAs through the Health Committee conduct investigations which revealed the hospital lacked many essential drugs including panadol.
luo: Mano ne omiyo Jo Od Bura otimo nonro kokalo kuom Komiti mar Weche Thieth mi giyudo ni osiptandno ne onge yien madwarore ahinya moriwo panadol.
mt0: <pad> When I was a child, I knew that I would be able to take Panadol.</s>

en: Instead, the MCAs blamed the health executive Prof Richard Muga for the problems in the hospital, before they impeached him a few days later.
luo: Kar keto ketho kama owinjore,  Jo Od Bura ne osiayo ni Profesa Richard Muga  ema okelo chandruogego duto, kae to gidonjone ndalo matin bang'e.
mt0: <pad> Kar although he was not convinced, Jo Od Bura said that Professor Richard Muga had done all the necessary research, and that they were going to leave the country in the morning.</s>

en: But the Kenya National Union of Nurses (KNUN) and Kenya Union of Clinical Officers (KUCO) accused the MCAs of interfering with the service delivery at the facility.
luo: Kata kamano, riwruoge mag  Kenya National Union of Nurses (KNUN) kod Kenya Union of Clinical Officers (KUCO) ne owacho ni Jo Od Bura donjore gi tije mag osiptandno.
mt0: <pad> However, the Kenya National Union of Nurses (KNUN) and Kenya Union of Clinical Officers (KUCO) have announced that they will boycott the hospital.</s>

en: The county KNUN Secretary Omondi Nyonje, KUCO Executive Secretary Philip Mbom and KUCO chairman Stephen Obunga said changes in the management of the hospital should not be altered again.
luo: "Omondi Nyonje ma en jatelo mar KNUN e kaunti , Philip Mbom ma en jatelo mar KUCO kod Stephen Obunga ma en jakom mar KUCO, wacho ni kik chak lok kendo jotelo mag osiptandno."
mt0: <pad> "Omondi Nyonje, chairman of the National Union of Students in the county, Philip Mbom, chairman of KUCO and Stephen Obunga, secretary of KUCO, said they were ready to take on the task of establishing a school board.</s>

en: “It is true that there has been an issue of poor management at the hospital and that is why patients were forced to buy many essential items including gloves for medics to attend to them,” Nyonje said
luo: “Nyonje ne owacho niya: " En adier ni jotend osiptandni ok osebedo katiyo maber emomiyo osechuno jotuwo ng'iewo ne lakteche gik monego obed e osiptal kaka glav mondo laktechego orwak sama ithiedhogi."
mt0: <pad> "I said, "You are a good student. You have a good attitude. You have a good sense of humour. You have a good sense of humor. You have a good sense of responsibility. You have a good sense of justice. You have a good sense of compassion. You have a good sense of compassion.</s>

en: He, however, noted that the new management should be given time“ to enable Dr Ogolla to apply all his skills of correcting anomalies which were caused by the previous management.”
luo: "Kata kamano, ne owacho ni jotelo moket manyien onego omi thuolo moromo. Onego omi Dr Ogolla kinde moromo mondo oti gi lony mare kondo orie weche ma ne jotelo machon oketho.”
mt0: <pad> "But I told him that the prison would be closed. He told Dr Ogolla that the prison would be closed. He told me that the prison would be closed."</s>

en: Mbom argued that the recommendation by the MCAs to reinstate Dr Kocholla is tantamount to interfering with the provision of health services at the hospital.
luo: Mbom ne owacho ni sama Jo Od Bura kwayo ni odwok Dr Kocholla e tich gi donjore gi weche thieth mag osiptandno.
mt0: <pad> When I was a child, I thought that Dr. Kocholla would be my father.</s>

en: “The change of management was made to correct weaknesses which impeded the proper provision of health services in the hospital. Any attempts to defeat the changes mean impending delivery of health services to Homa Bay residents,” Mbom said.
luo: “Ne omedo wacho ni: " Ne watimo lokruogego mondo walos weche ma ne miyo ji ok yud thieth maber e osiptandni. Sama ng'ato temo geng'o lokruogego, omono Jo Homa Bay yudo thieth mowinjore."
mt0: <pad> He said, "I went to the meeting to make sure that I could prove my words that I was not a good judge. After I went to the meeting, I found that Homa Bay judges were judged as necessary."</s>

en: Obunga said health is a sensitive department that should be handled keenly. “We urge MCAs to handle health department with utmost care because any mistake by management of a health facility can cause loss of lives.”
luo: Obunga ne owacho ni weche thieth gin weche ma pek ma ng'ato ok onego omwomoree. " Wakwayo jo Od Bura mondo otang' ahinya nikech sama jotelo mag osiptal oboth e yo moro amora mano nyalo miyo ji olal ngimagi."
mt0: <pad> "I told you that I was going to be a doctor and I couldn't get my life back.</s>

en: The County Assembly Health Committee chairperson Joan Ogada said their aim was to improve service delivery in the hospital.
luo: Joan Ogada ma en Jakom mar  Komiti mar Thieth e Od Bura ma Kaunti wacho ni gin gidwaro mana konyo mondo weche odhi maber e osiptandno.
mt0: <pad> Joan Ogada, a member of the County Committee on Justice and Human Rights said she was very pleased with the response to the investigation.</s>

en: “The staff at the hospital should forge a spirit of teamwork and unity to ensure quality health service delivery to Homa Bay residents,” Ms Ogada said when she tabled the investigative report in the Assembly.
luo: Sama Ms Ogada ne otero ripot mar nonro ma ne osetim e Od Bura ne owacho ni jotich e osiptandno onego oriwre kendo ginywak ne tich kanyachiel mondo githiedh Jo Homa Bay kaka owinjore.
mt0: <pad> Ms Ogada presented her report on the investigation into the deaths of the children in Homa Bay and said that the children should be treated with care and given proper medical attention to ensure that they are able to return to the hospital as soon as they need to.</s>

en: The fate of Prof Muga now lies in hands of Governor Cyprian Awiti who can decide to sack or retain him in his executive committee.
luo: Gavana Cyprian Awiti ema biro ng'ado gima ibiro timne Profesa Muga. Onyalo ng'ado ni oriembe e tich kata oweye mondo odhi nyime bedo e komiti mochung'ne osiptandno.
mt0: <pad> Gavana Cyprian Awiti ema biro ng'ado gima ibiro timne Professor Muga. Onyalo ng'ado ni amani e tich kata oweye mondo odhi nyime bedo e komiti mochung'ne osiptandno.</s>

en: Veteran journalist Philip Ochieng was buried at his home in Manyatta Village, Migori County yesterday.
luo: Philip Ochieng, jandiko mang'ula ne oik e dalane e gweng' ma Manyatta, Migori Kaunti.
mt0: <pad> Philip Ochieng, a former politician and a lawyer, was born in the village of Manyatta, County of Migori.</s>

en: His family, led by daughter Judith Adhiambo, eulogised him as a family man.
luo: Nyare miluongo ni Judith Adhiambo ne owuoyo e lo joodgi kendo ne owacho ni wuon-gi ne en ng'at mohero joode.
mt0: <pad> She spoke to Judith Adhiambo about her death and said that her father was a man who had been killed by a woman.</s>

en: They said he was a celebrity to the outside world, and famous as a wordsmith, but was always quiet at home.
luo: "Giwacho ni ne en rahuma kendo rambaka mabidho dho ingresa ma tamre ginono, kata kamano, kane en e dala, ne en ng'at mamuol kendo ma jaling'."
mt0: <pad> "I thought he was a very wealthy and rich man, but when he was on the road, he was a very kind and generous man."</s>

en: “It had great meaning for me. My father was never an orator both in public and at home,” said Adhiambo.
luo: Adhiambo medo niya: "Wachno ne berna ahinya. Wuonwa ne en ng'at mopogore e dala, ne ok kel tije e ot."
mt0: <pad> "I'm very sorry for you. I thought you were a very angry man, and I thought you were a very angry woman."</s>

en: The family said despite Ochieng’s quiet disposition, he still played with the children, especially his grandchildren.
luo: Joode wacho ni kata obedo ni Ochieng' ne jaling' kamano, ne ojatugo gi nyithinde, to moloyo nyikwaye.
mt0: <pad> Joode said that even if Ochieng' and jaling' were so, the sentence would be reduced, or worse, withdrawn.</s>

en: His grandson, Philip Ochieng Junior, said he spoilt them by taking them to parks and buying them candy.
luo: Nyakware miluongo ni Philip Ochieng Junior wacho ni ne oherogi ahinya. Ne ojaterogiga kuonde bayo kendo ong'iewonegi peremende mang'eny mopogore opogore.
mt0: <pad> Philip Ochieng Junior says he is very religious. He likes to read and write in different languages.</s>

en: “He was a doting grandfather, we were always there and fought to catch his attention and open the door for him when he came home from work,” Junior said.
luo: Junior medo wacho niya: “Ne ohero nyikwaye ahinya, ne walaro yawone dhoot sama oduogo oa e tich."
mt0: <pad> Junior said: "I'm very sad, I want to show my dad that I can be a good father."</s>

en: Editor’s Guild president Churchill Otieno remembered Ochieng as a person who stood out as the father of professional journalism.
luo: Churchill Otieno, ma en  Jatelo mar Editor’s Guild wacho ni Ochieng' ne en jandiko makende, en ema ne opuonjo ji gima ndiko mong'ith en.
mt0: <pad> Churchill Otieno, a Editor of the Editors Guild said that Ochieng' was a very serious journalist, and had a lot of editors who were willing to write about him.</s>

en: “Many appreciate him today for being a mentor. We appreciate him for the courage.
luo: Ji mang'eny ne mor kode nikech ne otiegogi e weche mag ndiko. Wamor ni ne en jachir.
mt0: <pad> I can't believe that you are so angry with me because I've been waiting for you. I feel like a martyr.</s>

en: “He built that stage into a global one and his home was no longer Manyatta but the world,” Otieno said.
luo: Otieno ne owacho ni: Ochieng' ne nyalo ndiko adimba e wi gik matimore kamoro amora e piny, ne ok en mana ja Manyatta, ne en thuolo ka moro amora e piny.
mt0: <pad> Otieno said: "Ochieng' could write a book in the evening, and he was a man of Manyatta, and he was a father of many others."</s>

en: He thanked Ochieng’s family and the people of Manyatta village for giving them a great person.
luo: Ne odwoko erokamano ne joodgi Ochieng' kod gweng' ma Manyatta kuom miyogi wuoyi ma wuoyi.
mt0: <pad> I would like to thank the elderly and the elderly people of Manyatta for their support and encouragement.</s>

en: Senator Ochillo Ayacko said the late Ochieng shared knowledge as he prepared people to succeed him in the field of journalism, which he helped shape for six decades.
luo: "Seneta Ochillo Ayacko ne owacho ni Ochieng' ne tiego ji mondo joma biro kawo tich bang'e obed joma olony. Ne okelo lokruoge mabeyo e weche ndiko kuom higni piero auchiel."
mt0: <pad> Senate Ochillo Ayacko said Ochieng' had been asleep in his office for two days before he was allowed to go to bed. He made a briefing on the issue on Tuesday.</s>

en: “In this village, we will remember him as a great person,” Ayacko said.
luo: "“Ayacko ne owacho ni: "Jogweng'ni nopare kaka ng'at mang'ongo."
mt0: <pad> "He said to them, "You are not a man but a woman.</s>

en: According to the family, Ochieng, who spent many years in Nairobi, came back home this year and fell sick after three weeks.
luo: "Joode wacho ni Ochieng' ne odak Nairobi kuom higni mang'eny. Ne odwogo dala higani kae to ochako bedo matuwo mana bang' jumbe adek."
mt0: <pad> Joode said Ochieng' had been in Nairobi for two years. He returned to the country a week ago and began to live with his mother for a couple of days.</s>

en: He was taken to St Joseph Ombo Mission Hospital where he died on April 27.
luo: Ne otere St Joseph Ombo Mission Hospital kama ne othoe April tarik 27.
mt0: <pad> He was taken to St Joseph Ombo Mission Hospital and died on April 27</s>

en: Ochieng was married to Jennifer Dawa with whom they had four children.
luo: Jaod Ochieng' ne en  Jennifer Dawa, kendo ne ginyuolo kode nyithindo ang'wen.
mt0: <pad> Jaod Ochieng' and Jennifer Dawa, and they have two children.</s>

en: He had another child from an earlier relationship.
luo: Ochieng' ne  onyuolo gi dhako machielo kapok okendo Jennifer.
mt0: <pad> Jennifer was a little bit surprised to see him.</s>

en: ODM, UDA protest as police storm Ongwae's home over Bonchari by election
luo: "Polise ne omonjo dala Ongwae nikech yiero mitimo Bonchari, to pati mag ODM, kod UDA okwedo gima ne otimoreno."
mt0: <pad> "The police and the gendarmes are in Ongwae because of the murder of Bonchari, but the ODM party, and the UDA have rejected the idea that they are being threatened."</s>

en: Asection of political leaders in Kisii has protested after armed police officers stormed Governor James Ongwae’s home.
luo: Polise momanore gi bunde ne omonjo dala Gavana James Ongwae, kendo moko kuom josiasa ma Kisii oywak ni  gima notimoreno rach.
mt0: <pad> Police officers who were involved in the incident called Governor James Ongwae, and a politician in Kisii.</s>

en: The politicians allied to ODM and UDA parties said it is unfortunate that police were being used politically to intimidate other leaders ahead of the Bonchari by-election slated for Tuesday next week.
luo: Josiasa mawuok e pati mag ODM kod UDA wacho ni en gima lit ni josiasa moko tiyo gi polise mondo gibwog jowetegi sama ji ochomo yiero matin mar Bonchari mabiro timore Tich Ariyo, juma mabiro.
mt0: <pad> ODM and UDA politician, Dr. John Okwara, said he was surprised that a political leader was arrested by police on Tuesday morning when they were trying to block the evacuation of the IDPs from the Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC).</s>

en: The two parties have raised concerns over intimidation and harassment by police as their respective candidates conduct campaigns.
luo: Pati ariyogo ywak ni polise chando jopatigi masani timo kampen.
mt0: <pad> They also announced that the police would launch a campaign to combat terrorism.</s>

en: The by-election has attracted 13 contestants.
luo: Ji 13 laro komno.
mt0: <pad> 13 - I don't know</s>

en: On Thursday night armed police stormed Kisii County Governor James Ongwae’s residence as he was having tea with Senator Prof Sam Ongeri and Woman Representative Janet Ong’era on accusation that they were holding an illegal political meeting.
luo: Chieng' Tich Ang'wen gotieno, polise ne omonjo dala James Ongwae Gavana ma Kisii. Ne oyudo omadho chae gi  Seneta Profesa Sam Ongeri kod Janet Ong’era Miyo Mochung' ne Mine kata Woman Representative . Polisego ne owacho ni ji adekgo ne timo chokruok mar siasa ma onge rusa.
mt0: <pad> Yesterday, police arrested James Ongwae, the governor of Kisii. He was also arrested at his home by politicians Prof. Sam Ongeri and Janet Ong'era Miyo Mochung' and Mine kata Woman Representative. The police said that the men were involved in political violence.</s>

en: Addressing the media in Kisii town on Friday morning, Ongwae said he had been informed that an unlawful assembly was taking place at his residence, which they had come to disperse.
luo: Kinyne, Tich Abich gokinyi, ka en Kisii taon,  Ongwae ne owacho ne jofwamb weche ni polise ne owacho ni ne onyisgi ni chokruok ma gwenyore gi chik ne dhi nyime e dalane kendo ne gibiro giriembo ji.
mt0: <pad> Kinyne, Tich Abich gokinyi, ka en Kisii taon, Ongwae ne owacho ne jofwamb weche ni polise ne owacho ni ne onyisgi ni chokruok ma gwenyore gi chik ne dhi nyime e dalane kendo ne gibiro giriembo ji.</s>

en: Ongwae said he requested the police to withdraw but they latter insisted they would not leave until the two legislators had left his residence.
luo: Ongwae wacho ni ne okwayo polisego mondo owuog e dalane, kata kamano, ne gitamore ka giwacho ni ok gibi wuok nyaka josiasa ariyogo oa mokwongo.
mt0: <pad> You can't say that you were waiting for the police to come, but I remember when they said that if they came, they would have to wait for the judge to decide.</s>

en: “I am calling on President Uhuru Kenyatta to put a stop to this, elections come and go. Leaders are all transitory. Democratic institutions must be respected. 50 officers can’t storm my house as if I am a wanted criminal,” he said.
luo: Ongwae ne owacho niya: "Akwayo Ker Uhuru Kenyatta mondo otiek wachni, yiero en gima biro to kalo. Onge jatelo masikoga e kom. Joma oganda oyiero moketo e kom nyaka mi luor. Polise 50 ok nyal mwomore e dalana ka gima an ja mahundu moro ma sirkal manyo."
mt0: <pad> "I would like to thank President Uhuru Kenyatta for his courage, leadership and unity. He has been a very good leader. I have been a very good leader."</s>

en: The governor added: “I didn’t become a governor by accident. I was elected by majority votes. This is not the way to run a Country. I have been a Permanent Secretary and I didn’t see such decisions made. This is unfortunate.”
luo: Ongwae ne omedo niya: “Bedona gavana ok opore apoya. Ne oketa e komni nikech ne ayudo ombulu mang'eny moloyo jomoko. Ma ok en kaka ng'ato onego oloch e wi ji. Ne an jatelo maduong e sirkal to ne ok aneno ka sirkal timo gik ma kamagi. Gik matimoregi richo.”
mt0: <pad> Ongwae said: "I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'm not a bandit. I'

en: Senator Ongeri said the party understands the art of winning and losing in any elections.
luo: Seneta Ongeri ne owacho ni patigi ong'eyo gima nyalo miyo giloch e yiero moro kata mi kik giloch.
mt0: <pad> Senate Ongeri said, "You know, I couldn't tell you that they were a political party.</s>

en: While urging IEBC to take charge of the forthcoming by-election, Ongeri said he had traversed the Bonchari constituency and was hopeful that the residents will make the right choice.
luo: Ongeri ne okwayo IEBC otim tijgi maber e yiero matin mabiro. Bende, ne owacho ni osewuotho Bonchari duto kendo ogeno ni jo Bonchari biro yiero ng'at mowinjore.
mt0: <pad> 'I have been told by IEBC that you have made good decisions in the last election.'</s>

en: “You may have a temporary relief that you won but I can assure you that you have lost it all. One must understand where people are coming from and where they are going. There are seasons for everything, don't try to maneuver and manipulate the result,” he said.
luo: Ne owacho niya: "Inyalo mor ni ilocho, to  anyalo nyisi gadier ni onge gima iloyo, kendo mornino en mana kuom kinde machuok. Ng'ato nyaka ng'e kama ji owuokie kendo kama ji dhie. Gimoro amora nigi kindene, kik item gwenyo ombulu ma ji osegoyo."
mt0: <pad> He said, "I can be a martyr or a martyred man, and this is the time of the future. Every thing is temporary, and nothing is permanent.</s>

en: Ong’era in her sentiments said it was shocking for police officers to raid the governor’s residence without a court order.
luo: Ong’era to ne owacho ni en gima mako dhok ni polise nyalo monjo dala gavana ma onge barua mar kot.
mt0: <pad> When I heard that the policeman had been arrested by the governor without a court order, I thought it was a joke.</s>

en: “I am demanding concrete reasons from IEBC and other relevant agencies on why they allowed for a by-election yet they know there was Covid-19 amongst us."
luo: “Adwaro ng'eyo gimomiyo IEBC kod riwruoge mamoko oyie ni otim yiero to ging'eyo ni tuwo mar Korona osechopo thurwa."
mt0: <pad> "I want to know the IEBC and the electoral commission of the country that I have been told by my wife and my son that I am not going to be allowed to vote until I know that the coronavirus pandemic has been declared a pandemic."</s>

en: "We have a by-election in Juja but we have not seen such kind of harassment,” she said.
luo: Ne omedo wacho niya: "Yiero matin dhi nyime Juja to pok wawinjo ni polise chando ji kaka ichandowa koni."
mt0: <pad> Ne omedo says: "I've been waiting for the police to come and arrest me.</s>

en: ODM party Secretary General Edwin Sifuna said that "desperate times call for desperate measures."
luo: Edwin Sifuna ma en achiel kuom jotelo e pati mar  ODM  wacho ni "ka weche tek ahinya, okenge mikawo bende medo mana ridore.
mt0: <pad> Edwin Sifuna, a member of the ODM Party, said: "I'm very angry, I'm very upset and I'm very disappointed.</s>

en: Deputy President William Ruto’s quest to infiltrate the Nyanza region ahead of next year’s elections is gaining momentum as his new allies in the region stepped up efforts to popularise him.
luo: Chenro mar jalup Ker William Ruto mar manyo ombulu Nyanza medo mako mach nikech joma yande omakogo osiep kuno timo kinda ahinya mar sunge e alwora mar Nyanza.
mt0: <pad> The chief of staff of the Ugandan President William Ruto has been a very good friend to Nyanza since he was born there.</s>

en: The leaders, most of who are considered ODM rebels after falling out with party leader Raila Odinga, are pushing for a generational change in the region’s leadership and a new economic path in their efforts to market the DP.
luo: Ng'eny jotelo mariwo Ruto lwedo ne gin jo ODM mong'anyo bang' gwenyore gi jatend patino Raila Odinga. Gisungo ne ji pati mar DP ka giwacho ni pati mar DP dwaro ni tieng' machielo ema okaw loch Nyanza kendo okel dongruok e alworano.
mt0: <pad> The ODM party has accused President Uhuru Kenyatta of stealing the money from the DP party and taking over the powers of the opposition leader Raila Odinga.</s>

en: Last week, leaders who included one of Ruto’s point men in Nyanza, Eliud Owalo, met at a Nairobi hotel to plan what they described as their economic strategy for the region.
luo: Juma mokalo, jotelo moko moriwo Eliud Owalo, ma en achiel kuom joma riwo Ruto lwedo Nyanza, ne oromo e otel moro Nairobi mondo giwuo e wi kaka ginyalo kelo dongruok Nyanza.
mt0: <pad> Last week, a lawyer named Eliud Owalo, a former aide to President Robert Mugabe's political team on Nyanza, was arrested in Nairobi hotel by the government because he couldn't get his passport until he had gone to Nairobi to negotiate with the government.</s>

en: They said their strategy will form the basis of their negotiations with other presidential hopefuls ahead of 2022.
luo: Giwacho ni chenro ma gitimo ema gibiro wuoyoe gi joma biro laro kom ker e higa mar 2022.
mt0: <pad> The committee announced that the first meeting of the commission would be held in 2022.</s>

en: According to them, anyone seeking the support of the region will have to enter into a pre-election economic pact with them.
luo: Giwacho ni ng'ato ang'ata mabiro dwaro ni Nyanza ogochne, nyaka kwong winjre kodgi kendo oket seyi ni obiro kelo dongruok ma gisendiko pinygo.
mt0: <pad> They said that there were three people who would want Nyanza to go, wanted him to be a good man and knew he would bring the floods that would destroy the village.</s>

en: This comes as Raila struggles to calm a storm that recently rocked ODM leading to Rarieda MP Otiende Amollo being kicked out of a key parliamentary committee.
luo: Wechegi timore sama Raila koni temo kweyo tula moro ma nyocha omuoch e pati mar ODM. Tulano ne omiyo  ogol Otiende Amollo ma en Jabunge ma Rarieda e komiti moro mar od Bura.
mt0: <pad> Raila Odinga took the lead in the ODM party. He was elected as the chair of the House of Commons Committee on Gender and Social Issues.</s>

en: Many former foot soldiers of Raila attended Friday’s meeting convened by Owalo, who is also a former aide to the ODM leader.
luo: Ji mang'eny ma yande ringo koni gi koni ka gikonyo Raila ne nitie e chokruok ma Owalo ne obedogo chieng' Tich Abich. Owalo bende ne en achiel kuom joma ne konyo  Raila ahinya.
mt0: <pad> Many people who supported Raila were present at the rally that Owalo held on Thursday. Owalo was also one of the people who supported Raila very much.</s>

en: They include those who decamped after losing ODM nominations in the 2013 and 2017 elections, among them former Kisumu Governor Jack Ranguma, former Rongo MP Dalmas Otieno and former Rangwe MP Martin Ogindo.
luo: Joma ne ni e chokruogno oriwo joma ne oweyo ODM kane  patino ok omiyogi kombe e yiero mag 2013 kod 2017.  Ji kaka Jack Ranguma ma en Gavana machon ma Kisumu, Dalmas Otieno Jabunge machon ma Rongo kod Martin Ogindo Jabunge machon ma Rangwe.
mt0: <pad> They were elected by the ODM in 2013 and 2017.</s>

en: Ranguma is hoping to challenge Governor Anyang’ Nyong’o for the Kisumu seat.
luo: Ranguma dwaro golo Gavana Anyang’ Nyong’o  mondo en ema obed gavana ma Kisumu.
mt0: <pad> The former governor of Kisumu, Anyang' Nyong'o, was elected to the office of the governor of Kisumu.</s>

en: A source who did not wish to be named said those present were warming up to join United Democratic Alliance (UDA), which is associated with the deputy president.
luo: Wach ne owuok kamoro ni joma ne nie chokruogno paro mar donjo e pati mar United Democratic Alliance (UDA), ma en pati mar jalup Ker, kata kamano, ng'at ma ne ogolo wachno ok dwar ni ohul nyinge.
mt0: <pad> The election was announced on Monday as the first round of a vote by the United Democratic Alliance (UDA), a party of the Ker movement, however, the winner of the election claimed that he had been elected by the people.</s>

en: “We want to challenge ODM’s dominance in the Nyanza region. Our goal is to rally the region to support Ruto’s presidential bid,” said the source.
luo: “Ng'atno wacho niya: Wadwaro kedo mondo ODM owe wiko e Nyanza duto. Wadwaro wuoyo gi Jo Nyanza mondo gigo ne  Ruto ombulu mondo okaw kom mar Ker."
mt0: <pad> "I said: I want ODM to speak in Nyanza. I want the people of Nyanza to know that Ruto is a bully and he should be ashamed to come back."</s>

en: The politician claimed that they have the blessings of Ruto to organise the meeting with one of the agendas being to look for ways to attract more Nyanza leaders to their camp.
luo: Jasiasano wacho ni Ruto ne oyienegi bedo gi chokruogno. Kendo achiel kuom gik ma ne gidwaro timo ne en manyo yore ma ginyalo ywayogo jotelo mamoko mag Nyanza mondo odonj e patigino.
mt0: <pad> Jasiasano says that Ruto and his wife are very important. But one of the things we want to know is that there is a way we can use the Nyanza prisons to get them out of the country.</s>

en: The strategy also involves attracting professionals from the region who will help compile the economic needs of the region in a document that will form the basis for Ruto’s campaigns in Nyanza.
luo: Chenrogi oriwo ywayo  josomo ma Nyanza mabiro konyogi loso ripot mar dongruok madwarore e alworano, kendo ripotno ema ibiro tigo e manyo ombulu ne Ruto Nyanza.
mt0: <pad> The committee of the Nyanza School Board has completed its report on the failure and corruption of the school, and it has been reported to the Office of Education and Culture by Ruto Nyanza.</s>

en: The group issued a statement saying it was reviewing Nyanza’s economy with the aim of finding ways to improve it.
luo: Jo grubno ne ogolo ripot ma wacho ni ginono dongruok ma Nyanza kendo gidwaro manyo yore ma ginyalo kelogo dongruok momedore.
mt0: <pad> The committee has published a report saying that they are aware of Nyanza's threat and need to know how to develop a safe economy.</s>

en: Owalo accused unnamed leaders from Nyanza of being preoccupied with the pursuit of political power and failing to address the economic problems of the region.
luo: Owalo ne owacho ni josiasa moko ma Nyanza dwaro mana telo to ok gichomre gi wach tieko dhier ma Nyanza. Kata kamano, ne ok ohulo nyinge jotelogo.
mt0: <pad> He said he knew that some Nyanza politicians wanted to make sure that I was not killed by the riots. However, I did not accept the request for a reconciliation.</s>

en: Luo Nyanza has supported Raila since his first attempt at the presidency in 1997.
luo: Luo Nyanza osebedo ka goyo ombulu ne Raila mondo okaw kom mar ker chakre higa mar  1997.
mt0: <pad> Nyanza says he is convinced that Raila will be elected president in the 1997 general election.</s>

en: In 2013, President Uhuru Kenyatta, with the help of the former secretary-general of the disbanded.
luo: E higa mar  2013, Ker Uhuru Kenyatta ne otemo tiyo gi  Onyango Oloo  mondo omany ombulu Nyanza.
mt0: <pad> In 2013, President Uhuru Kenyatta and the chairman of the Onyango Oloo Committee announced that they would build a dam to protect the Nyanza River.</s>

en: The National Alliance party Onyango Oloo tried to make inroads in the region, but residents voted for the opposition leader.
