mt0: <pad> The National Alliance party does not have a majority. However, Jo Nyanza is closely linked to Raila.</s>

en: Lecturer awarded Sh 416,000 for breach of contract
luo: Kot ong'ado ni ochul japuonj kolej siling 416,000 nikech kolej  ne ok orito winjruok ma ne gitimo kode
mt0: <pad> The Ministry of Education has announced that the school will receive 416,000 silings from the state government.</s>

en: Apart-time lecturer has been awarded Sh416,000 after his employer breached his contract by refusing to pay him salary for eleven months.
luo: Kot ne ong'ado ni ochul japuonj kolej siling 416,000. Japuonjno ne puonjo mana kuom seche matin e kolejno, kendo kolej ne ok otimo kaka ne giwinjre mi ne ok ochule kuom dweche apar gachiel.
mt0: <pad> Kot ong'ado ni ochul japuonj kolej siling 416,000. Japuonjo no puonjo mana kuom seche matin e kolejno, kendo kolej no ok otimo kaka ne giwinjre mi ne ok ochule kuom dweche apar gachiel.</s>

en: The court ruled that the evidence by the E-Smart Technical College lecturer Tobias Andhala would be fully adopted as the college failed to step in court even after being served with a notice.
luo: Kot ne owacho ni gibiro tiyo gi weche ma Tobias Andhala ne owacho nikech weg kolej ne ok obiro e kot kata obedo ni kot ne omiyogi barua manyiso ni idwarogi kuno.  Tobias Andhala en japuonj e  E-Smart Technical College.
mt0: <pad> The court says that Tobias Andhala's case was dropped because the school didn't report him to the court despite the court having sent him a letter indicating his arrest.</s>

en: “Andhala testified on March 4, 2021, and his testimony was not challenged or rebutted, and the court will enter a judgment for him in the sum of Sh416,000 that he demanded from the College,” said Justice Stephen Radido of Kisumu Labour Court on Friday.
luo: Stephen Radido ma en Jang'ad Bura ma  Kisumu Labour Court, ne owacho niya Tich Abich, "Mach Tarik 4, 2021, Andhala ne olero ywakne e kot to onge ng'at ma ne okwedo gik ma ne owacho. Omiyo kot chiko ni ochule siling 416,000 ma ne okwayo ni kolejno ochule.”
mt0: <pad> Stephen Radido, a judge of the Kisumu Labour Court, ne owacho niya Tich Abich, "Mach Tarik 4, 2021, Andhala ne olero ywakne e kot to onge ng'at ma ne okwedo gik ma ne owacho. Omiyo kot chiko ni ochule siling 416,000 ma ne okwayo ni kolejno ochule.”</s>

en: Andhala was employed as a part-time lecturer at the College on June 28, 2015, and by May 27, 2016, the College had not fully paid his salary.
luo: Ne ondik Andhala tich e kolejno Jun tarik 28, 2015, to chop Mei 27, 2016, ne pok ochule msache duto.
mt0: <pad> Andhala started on June 28, 2015 and ended on May 27, 2016, and I've been able to reach both the levels.</s>

en: On September 5, 2017, he escalated the dispute at the Labour Court after efforts to compel his employer to pay him.
luo: Septemba tarik 5, 2017, ne otero ywakne e  Labour Court   bang' temo wuoyo gi jo kolej mondo ochule.
mt0: <pad> On September 5, 2017, he appeared in the Labour Court after a dispute over his employment with the university.</s>

en: “The college was served the court papers through its secretary on October 26, 2017, but it did not file a response,” said Radido.
luo: Radido ne owacho niya: "Jandiko mar kot ne otero ne kolejno barua Oktoba tarik 26, 2017,  to jo kolej ne ok obiro e kot."
mt0: <pad> Radido dijo: "Mi esposo me escribió una carta el 26 de octubre de 2017, y yo no he podido abrir mi puerta.</s>

en: This prompted the court to direct that the case proceeds without the party that had defied court summons.
luo: Mano ne omiyo kot ong'ado ni kesno odhi adhiya nyime kata obedo ni joma odonjnegigo onge, nimar gifwayo ote mar kot.
mt0: <pad> simply say you don't know</s>

en: At the close of the hearing of the case, the court was convinced that Andhala had a contract with the college which was abused.

mt0: <pad> Bang's speech is very brief, but he doesn't know that Andhala has been a student at the university since the age of eight.</s>

en: Justice Radido further ordered that the award would accrue interest from September 5, 2017, when the case was filed.
luo: Radido ne omedo owacho ni pesago ne ochako nyuolre chieng' ma ne ohang ter wachno e kot, Septemba tarik 5, 2017. Omiyo ne ochiko ni ochul Andhalo pesago duto.
mt0: <pad> Radido told the audience that he had been awaiting the release of his book on September 5, 2017. He said he decided to cancel all his books.</s>

en: The court directed Andhala to settle all the legal costs in the suit.
luo: Kot ne onyiso Andhala ni obiro chulo kot ne tije duto  ma odhi e kesno.

en: Police in Kisumu have arrested a 63-year-old woman in connection with theft of mosquito nets which were stolen from government stores.
luo: Polise ma Kisumu omako miyo moro ma jahigni 63. Miyono otudre gi kuo net mag suna ma ne okwal kuonde keno mag sirkal.
mt0: <pad> Police in Kisumu have arrested a 63-year-old man.</s>

en: Police said they recovered 19 bales of nets suspected to be part of those stolen from Rabuor and Nyang’ande two weeks ago.
luo: Polise wacho ni ne giyudo miyono gi bel 19 mag net. Gichich ni gin moko kuom net ma ne okwal  Rabuor kod Nyang’ande jumbe ariyo mokalo.
mt0: <pad> Police said they found the suspected murderer on 19 internet sites. He is believed to be one of the sites that were attacked on Wednesday and Thursday.</s>

en: Officers from Obunga Police Station, working on a tip-off from the public, raided a house at USAID Estate on Friday and nabbed the woman.
luo: Raia ne okwalo wach ne polise ma Obunga  kendo polise ne odhi e od miyono USAID Estate Tich Abich mi gimako miyono.
mt0: <pad> Raia reported the incident to the Obunga police and the police said he went to USAID's State of Abich office where they found the money.</s>

en: She was taken to Obunga Police Station after failing to explain the source of the nets, then transferred to Central Police Station where she was booked.
luo: Nikech ne ok onyisogi kama ne ogoloe netgo ne gitere Obunga Polis Stesen kae to gitere  Central Police Station kama ne okawie nonrone kendo ondik kuo ma ne ichich ni otudrego.
mt0: <pad> When you are going to the police station, you will be called to the Central Police Station or the Obunga Police Station.</s>

en: The woman was later moved to Ahero Police Station in Ntyando, where the initial report about the loss of the nets was made.
luo: Bang'e ne oter miyono  Ahero Polis Stesen, Nyando, kama ne ohang terie ripot mar net ma ne olal.
mt0: <pad> Bang'e ne oter miyono Ahero Polis Stesen, Nyando, kama ne ohang terie ripot mar net ma ne olal.</s>

en: Kisumu Central sub-county police commander James Ng’etich said they are investigating the matter.

mt0: <pad> James Ng'etich, the police commissioner of Kisumu Central county, said they were investigating the incident.</s>

en: “We decided to hand the suspect to officers in Ahero since the theft had been reported there and they had also arrested other suspects,” said Ng’etich
luo: Ng'etich ne owacho ni, " Ne wang'ado mar keto miyono e lwet polise ma Ahero nikech kuno ema ne oterie ripot mar kuo net kendo  gisemako jomoko kuno bende."
mt0: <pad> Ng'etich said, "I decided to take my cases to the Ahero Police Station because it is here that I heard about the incident and there are also other people who have been arrested here."</s>

en: The county launched the distribution of treated mosquito nets to residents two weeks ago in an exercise that will see at least 790, 000 nets given to 1.2 million people.

en: The nets had been kept in various stores, mostly hospitals and schools within Kisumu’s seven sub-counties.

en: A 77-year-old woman from East Kolwa in Kisumu East Sub-County has been taking care of abandoned teenage mothers and widows for 25 years now.
luo: Miyo moro ma jahigni  77 modak East Kolwa, Kisumu East Sab-Kaunti osebedo karito nyiri matindo mosenyuol kendo ojwang' kod mond liete ma bende ojwang'. Osebedo ka otimo kamano kuom higni 25.
mt0: <pad> Miyo, 77, a resident of East Kolwa, Kisumu East Sub-County, has been making bread and tea for the past year.</s>

en: Florence Otieno says the initiative has enabled her to “give a second chance to a vulnerable group of women”.
luo: Florence Otieno wacho ni chenrono osemiye thuolo mar konyo joma mine ma jochan mondo ochak ngimagi manyien.
mt0: <pad> Florence Otieno said she was very happy to be able to play four games in the first round of the tournament.</s>

en: Otieno first put up the rescue centre at her home in 1996 after being involved in a road accident, which left her partially paralysed.
luo: Florence ne oyawo dalane ne mine ma kamago e higa mar 1996 bang'  hinyore e masira mar  ndara ma ne omiyo dende konchiel otho.
mt0: <pad> Florence and I got married in 1996 after a long-term relationship with my father who was a politician.</s>

en: “The crash made me discover that life can be lost within a second. Due to that fact, I pledged to make the society I live in a better place by helping the vulnerable. In this case, it is majorly teenage mothers and the widows,” she told The Standard.
luo: Ne onyiso The Standard niya: "Masirano ne omiyo afwenyo ni kare ng'ato nyalo lalo ngimane ka diemo wang' nono. Nikech mano, ne asingora ni abiro timo kar nyalona mondo ngima obed maber matin e oganda madakie. Omiyo ne achako konyo nyithindo ma nyiri monyuol kod mond liete."
mt0: <pad> He told The Standard: "I am very sad that I have been able to see my own life being destroyed. Therefore, I think I will do what I can to make my family's life better. I know I will be able to reconcile my son's and my daughter's marriage. I know I will be able to reconcile my son's and my daughter's marriage."</s>

en: The septuagenarian has thus far rescued 38 teenage mothers, and at least 12 widows.
luo: Nyaka chop sani, miyo ma koro hike oseniang'no osereso nyithindo manyiri 38 kod mond liete 12.
mt0: <pad> When I was a child, I couldn't understand the sentence.</s>

en: As the number of girls increased in her rescue centre, so did her financial responsibility.
luo: Kaka kwan nyiri ne medore e kaka bende ne dwarore ni oti gi pesa momedore.
mt0: <pad> i don't know</s>

en: Otieno said she, consequently, had to devise new survival methods.
luo: Florence wacho ni ne ochune manyo yore mamoko mag yuto, nono ne ok odhi nyalo.
mt0: <pad> Florence said that she would like to see her mother again, but she said no.</s>

en: “I set aside a parcel of land for farming. The widows and the teenage mums would farm commercial crops, which we’d sell and use the proceeds to feed and clothe ourselves,” she said.
luo: Florence medo niya: "Ne aketo tenge puodho moro ma ne wabiroga puro. Mond lietego kaachiel gi nyirigo ne puro gik ma wauso. Ne wauso gigo kae to pesa ma wayudo wang'iewogo chiemo kod lewni."
mt0: <pad> Florence said: "I'll never forget the words you used to say. I'll never forget the letters you wrote. I'll never forget the money you paid me. I'll never forget the time you spent with me and with my family."</s>

en: Other girls diversified into sandal, shoe and handbag-making business.

en: Five suspected terrorists arrested in Kisumu on Sunday have been transferred to Nairobi as detectives move to finalise investigations.
luo: Jomahundu abich ma ne omak Kisumu chieng' Jumapil oter Nairobi mondo polise otiek nono wechegi kuno.
mt0: <pad> When I was born in Kisumu on June 1st, I went to Nairobi where the police refused to let me go.</s>

en: On Monday, a Kisumu court granted the police 10 more days to continue holding the suspects for interrogation.
luo: Chieng' Wuok Tich, kot moro Kisumu ne omiyo polise rusa mar keto jogo e sel kuom ndalo 10 momedore mondo gimed yudo weche kuomgi.
mt0: <pad> Chieng' Wuok Tich, a Kisumu resident, was arrested by the police on Tuesday for allegedly being one of 10 suspects who were arrested in connection with the murder of a former Ugandan soldier.</s>

en: Yesterday, detectives from the Anti-Terror Police Unit drove the suspects to their headquarters at the Directorate of Criminal Investigations for further questioning.
luo: Nyoro, polise ma jonon wach matiyo gi  Anti-Terror Police Unit ne otero jogo e mtoka nyaka ofisgi maduong' man  Directorate of Criminal Investigations mondo omed non-gi.
mt0: <pad> Yesterday, the Anti-Terror Police Unit and the Directorate of Criminal Investigations asked the director general of the Directorate of Criminal Investigations to come to the scene to investigate the incident.</s>

en: The suspects are Jamal Muhamud, Abdul Razzaq, Nadeed Muhammad, Amin Muhammad and Younas Muhammad, all of Pakistani origin.
luo: Jomahundugo ne gin Jamal Muhamud, Abdul Razzaq, Nadeed Muhammad, Amin Muhammad kod Younas Muhammad, giduto gin jo Pakistan.
mt0: <pad> The players are Jamal Muhammad, Abdul Razzaq, Nadeed Muhammad, Amin Muhammad and Younas Muhammad, all of them from Pakistan.</s>

en: A detective privy to the investigations said that the suspects had travelled in two groups through the Kenya-Uganda border.
luo: Polis moro mong'eyo wechego wacho ni jogo ne owuotho e grube ariyo kendo ne gidonjo Kenya ka gikalo boda ma Kenya gi Uganda.
mt0: <pad> Police officers said the man was a two-year-old boy and was traveling from Kenya to Uganda when he crossed the border from Kenya to Uganda.</s>

en: The suspects had done their best to shake off police officers before hawk-eyed officers nabbed two of them in Kombewa in Kisumu following a tip-off.
luo: Jomahundugo ne osetemo ahinya pondo ne polis, kata kamano, polise ma akicha ma ne oyudo osekwalnegi wach ne omakogi Kombewa, Kisumu.
mt0: <pad> However, the police said he was arrested at Kombewa, Kisumu.</s>

en: An interrogation of the suspects established that another group had also made its way in to Kenya and was on its way to Kericho.
luo: Nonro ma ne otim kuom jomahundugo ne ofwenyo ni grup machielo bende ne odonjo Kenya kendo ne gin e yo ka gidhi Kericho.
mt0: <pad> I knew from the news that the group of four had also left Kenya and were on their way to Kericho.</s>

en: This prompted police officers to mount a roadblock at Ahero and searched all vehicles from Kisumu.
luo: Mano ne omiyo polise odino ndara  Ahero  kendo goyo peksen mtokni duto mawuok Kisumu.
mt0: <pad> Mano alikuwa na polisi or ndara Ahero na gũtwarithia peksen mtokni duto mawuok Kisumu.</s>

en: “They were keen on escaping and even alighted at Ahero and started walking back when they learnt officers were on their trail,” said a detective privy to the investigations.
luo: Polis machielo mong'eyo wechego wacho ni jogo ne otemo ahinya mondo kik makgi. Sama ne gifwenyo ni polise luwogi, ne gilor Ahero kae to gichako wuotho ka gidok Kisumu.
mt0: <pad> Police officers said the man was very ill and that he had been treated with a lot of pain. The Sama family, when they realized the police were not being faithful, decided to flee Ahero and go to Kisumu.</s>

en: The detectives are also probing some of the people they might have contacted.
luo: Polise bende nono joma nyalo bedo ni ne giwuoyogo.
mt0: <pad> Police also tried to arrest the man who was lying.</s>

en: It is  unclear whether they had intentions of carrying out attacks but the police indicated that their behaviour and some of the items they had aroused suspicion
luo: Ok ong'ere maber kane gidwaro timo timbe mag mahundu.  Kata kamano, polise wacho ni timbegi kod moko kuom gik ma ne oyudgigo, miyo gichich kodgi.
mt0: <pad> Ok spoke well when he was arrested. However, the police said his statements were not related to what they had learned, so they decided to release him.</s>

en: A detective involved in the case said the suspects were found with "many" telephone gadgets and military regalia.
luo: Polis moro ma ne onono jogo wacho ni ne oyudgi gi gik simu mang'eny kod yunifom mag jolweny.
mt0: <pad> Police sources said the suspect stole several cell phones and a police uniform.</s>

en: Yesterday, Kisumu County Commander Samuel Anampiu confirmed the suspects had been transferred to Nairobi.
luo: Nyoro, Samuel Anampiu ma en Kamanda mar Kisumu Kaunti ne owacho ni oseter jogo Nairobi.
mt0: <pad> Samuel Anampiu, a former chief of Kisumu County, said he was going to Nairobi to attend the annual conference.</s>

en: “We transferred them to Nairobi for ease and convenience of processing,” said Anampiu.
luo: Anampiu ne omedo niya: “Waterogi Nairobi mondo nonogi obed mayot."
mt0: <pad> Anampiu ne omedo niya: "Waterogi Nairobi mondo nonogi obed mayot."</s>

en: The changing face of Siaya town thanks to devolution
luo: Nikech sirkal moter e Kaunti, lokruoge mabeyo timore Siaya.
mt0: <pad> Nikech sirkal moter e Kaunti, lokruoge mabeyo timore Siaya.</s>

en: The face of Siaya town has tremendously changed thanks to devolution that has not only attracted investors in the once sleepy, dusty town but seen the initiation of a number of projects.
luo: Siaya taon osegerore nyowuoyo nikech sirkal moter e kauntino. Kuom higni mang'eny  Siaya taon oseng'ere kaka taon motimo buru kendo monindo aninda. Kata kamano, nikech oter sirkal kuno, mano oseywayo jo ohala kendo osemiyo ochak chenro mang'eny mag dongruok.
mt0: <pad> Siaya county nĩ acio e ũrĩa ũna gĩtũmĩre nĩ gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa motor. Nĩ gĩtucĩrĩire gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa motor gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩria gĩa gĩtucĩrĩ

en: Development projects are slowly changing the fortunes of the town that has struggled to find a footing despite it being the headquarters of the county but questions have been raised on the amount spent on some of the projects.
luo: Mos mos chenro mag dongruok konyo e yore mag yuto e taondno. Kata kamano, ji chich gi kwan mar pesa miwacho ni otigo e chenro mamoko mag taondno.
mt0: <pad> However, the financial crisis has created a new opportunity for growth. However, the wealthy man who sent his money to me doesn't mean he is going to be able to afford the necessary infrastructure for growth.</s>

en: Siaya town has grown from a market formally known as Ahindi years ago to the district headquarters and now to county headquarters.
luo: Siaya taon osetimo dongruok mang'eny. Higni machon ne en mana chiro miluongo ni Ahindi, kae to obedo taon maduong' mar distrikt, sani to en taon maduong' mar Kaunti.
mt0: <pad> Siaya is the seventh largest city in China. Higni was born in a village called Ahindi, then became the capital of the district, and then the capital of the county.</s>

en: Among the projects changing the face of Siaya is the Sh340 million Siaya High Court building that is nearing completion.
luo: Achiel kuom dongruoge madongo maloko kit Siaya en od Kot Maduong' ma Siaya migero sani. Odno igero gi milion 340  kendo ochiegni rumo.
mt0: <pad> Achiel kuom dongruoge madongo maloko kit Siaya en od Kot Maduong' ma Siaya migero sani. Odno igero gi milion 340 kendo ochiegni rumo.</s>

en: Judiciary Chief Registrar Ann Amadi inspected the building last December and gave it a clean bill of health saying the works were almost complete.
luo: Ann Amadi ma en  Judiciary Chief Registrar ne onono Odno Desemba mokalo. Ne owacho ni tich otire maber kendo ni odno chiegni rumo.
mt0: <pad> Ann Amadi, Judiciary Chief Registrar, visited Odno last December. She said that the wife was well and that the trial was nearing its end.</s>

en: The county government also recently spent Sh43 million on Ahindi Gardens and the governor’s park that were commissioned by Devolution Cabinet Secretary Eugene Wamalwa.
luo: Sirkal ma kaunti nyocha otiyo gi milion 43 e loso Ahindi Gardens kod kar bayo mar gavana. Eugene Wamalwa ma en Jatelo Maduong' e Weche Sirkal mag Kaunti ema ne oketo seyi mondo chenrogo odhi nyime.
mt0: <pad> Sirkal ma kaunti e n'a sikka 43 million dollars e loso Ahindi Gardens kod kar gavana. Eugene Wamalwa ma en Jatelo Maduong' e Weche Sirkal ma kaunti e ma ne oketo seyi mondo chenrogo odhi nyime.</s>

en: Wamalwa also commissioned the new Sh75 million county headquarters.
luo: Wamalwa bende ne oketo seyi mondo oger ofis manyien mar kaunti madhi kawo milion 75.
mt0: <pad> i know you don't know</s>

en: The county government has also spent Sh165 million on renovating the Siaya County Referral Hospital.
luo: Sirkal ma kauntino bende osetiyo gi milion 165 e loso  Siaya County Referral Hospital.
mt0: <pad> Sirkal ma kauntino bende osetiyo gi milion 165 e loso Siaya County Referral Hospital.</s>

en: Governor Cornel Rasanga said another ongoing project is Sh400million ultra-modern stadium which is 90 per cent complete.
luo: Gavana Cornel Rasanga wacho ni gedo machielo moseger pasent 90 en stediam manyasani ma okawo milion 400.
mt0: <pad> Gavana Cornel Rasanga alisema kuwa nchini hiyo imekuwa ikitumia zaidi ya 90 percent of water in the state's water supply system.</s>

en: The Sh100 million street lighting project by National Government and tarmac roads within town that were part of the Siaya-Nyadorera highway project, have also contributed to the town’s new look.
luo: Gik moko ariyo ma bende osemedo loko kit taon ma Siaya gin: chenro mar Sirkal mar Kenya  mar keto stima e nderni. Chenrono ne okawo milion 100. Gimachielo en chenro mar Sirkal ma Kenya mar keto lam e nderni maringo e Siaya taon, chenrono otudore gi chenro mar ndara ma ne oger kowuok Siaya nyaka Nyadorera.
mt0: <pad> Two other sources of aid that have also been recognized as the city's kit: Kenyan National Aid for Childbirth. The aid is said to be around 100 million. The Kenyan National Aid for Childbirth in Siaya, the aid is a government aid that was supposed to come to Siaya by January.</s>

en: Kennedy Onyango, a resident of Siaya town said some of the projects such as the street lighting project were as a result of the goodwill that had been bolstered by the Handshake between ODM leader Raila Odinga and President Uhuru Kenyatta.
luo: Kennedy Onyango, modak Siaya wacho ni moko kuom dongruok mosebedoe kaka wach keto stima e nderni ma Siaya obiro nikech winjruok ma ne omedo bedoe e kind jatelo mar ODM Raila Odinga kod Ker Uhuru Kenyatta bang' Mosruok.
mt0: <pad> Kennedy Onyango, a Siaya activist, said that the meeting was only a reflection of the political divisions that have been taking place between the ODM and the President after the election.</s>

en: John Odhiambo, also a resident, noted there was a big improvement on the face of Siaya but raised concerns on the cost of most of the projects, especially those done by the county government.
luo: John Odhiambo, ma bende odak Siaya oyie ni osetim dongruok mang'eny Siaya kata kamano, ochich gi pesa mang'eny mokalo miwacho ni otigo e chenro moko, to ahinya ahinya e chenro mag sirkal ma kaunti.
mt0: <pad> John Odhiambo, who is also a Siaya, has said that he has taken the initiative to establish a political party in Siaya. However, he has spent so much money that he can't be called a member of any party, or especially a party of the provincial assembly.</s>

en: Walter Okello, the Lands chief officer said the county government has also started demolishing temporary structures to create order and improve the image of the town.
luo: Walter Okello, ma en Jatelo mar Lowo, wacho ni sirkal ma kaunti osechako muko udi maricho richo manie taon mondo gikel chenro maber e taon kendo gi med bero taondno.
mt0: <pad> Walter Okello, a mayor of Lowo County, said the district council had taken steps to help poor people in the town to get a new road and to make it easier for them to get to work.</s>

en: He added that there is need for residents with old buildings within the town to renovate them so they conform with the standards of a town.
luo: Owacho ni dwarore ni jokanyo ma nigi udi moti e taon olos udigigo mondo ginen maber kaka udi mamoko e taon.
mt0: <pad> I think it's necessary for the player to be a good player in the year, but you're not going to be a good player in the year.</s>

en: We have currently stopped renewing leases of those with old buildings unless they are renovated.
luo: Gie sani, ok wami joma udigi oti lease (ratiro ma sirkal miyo ji kinde ka kinde mar tiyo gi lowo) mak mana ka gigero udigigo maber.
mt0: <pad> Okay, ok I'm going to give you a lease (I'll be giving you water every day until you get enough) so that I can learn the proper way to drink.</s>

en: “Those with temporary structures that will be demolished have also been showed a trading area within town where they are required to put up their business structures,” Okello said.
luo: Okello ne owacho ni Joma nigi ute maricho richo mibiro muk osesiemnegi kar ohala e alwora mar taon ma onego gigerie ute ohala.
mt0: <pad> i don't know</s>

en: Professor Paul Achola, who is the chair of the municipality board in the county, says several years ago, Siaya was just a market and social centre but it has grown.
luo: Profesa Paul Achola, ma en jakom mar munisipal mar bod ma kaunti wacho ni higni mang'eny mokalo Siaya ne en mana chiro kod kama ji ne biro bayoe, to gie sani, Siaya osedongo.
mt0: <pad> Professor Paul Achola, a member of the municipal board of governors said that Siaya was a very good employee at the office where he worked, and now he is a successful businessman.</s>

en: He said in 1940s, the current Siaya town was only known as Ahindi market where people came to purchase food and household products.
luo: Owacho ni e higni mag  1940 Siaya taon masani, ne en mana chiro ma Ahindi. Ji ne biro ng'iewo chiemo kod gik ot.
mt0: <pad> In 1940, Siaya was a successful soldier, meaning the Indian army. People were going to bring food and supplies to the troops.</s>

en: It was also a social centre for sporting activities before it became the district headquarters.
luo: Kae to obedo kar tuke kaka spot kapok obedo taon maduong' mar distrikt.
mt0: <pad> Kae is a small town in the district of Kapuk.</s>

en: Rasanga said that the development projects are sufficient evidence that devolution is working.
luo: Rasanga wacho ni dongruok matimore sani nyiso maler ni wach tero sirkal e kaunti tiyo maber.
mt0: <pad> I would like to say that the flooding that happened today is a very bad sign that the government has been trying to stop the spread of the virus.</s>

en: “Evidently, the county government of Siaya continues to implement projects with a view of improving the socio-economic well-being of the citizens and changing the landscape of Siaya town,” Rasanga noted.
luo: Rasanga wacho ni, "Nenore ni sirkal ma kaunti mar Siaya dhi nyime kelo dongruok ma konyo e yore ohala kendo medo bero ngima ji e oganda. Lokruogego loko kit Siaya taon."
mt0: <pad> Rasanga said, "We see that the Siaya District Council is taking measures to improve the quality of water and sanitation in the gardens. We are planning to visit Siaya this month."</s>

en: “My government’s partnership with the World Bank through Kenya Devolution Support Programme and Kenya Urban Support Programme have since seen us implement some key projects in the county.”
luo: “Riwruok ma sirkanda osebedogo kanyachiel gi  World Bank kokalo kuom Kenya Devolution Support Programme kod Kenya Urban Support Programme osekonyowa timo dongruok madongo e kauntini.”
mt0: <pad> "The initiative to promote the sustainable development of Kenya has been supported by the World Bank through its Kenya Devolution Support Programme and Kenya Urban Support Programme.</s>

en: Siaya Governor Cornel Rasanga was put in a spot for allegedly spending more money from the county emergency fund than the initial budget in the fight against Covid-19.
luo: Ne openj Gavana ma Siaya, Cornel Rasanga gimomiyo ne otiyo gi pesa mang'eny moloyo ma ne owal ni otigo e kedo gi masira mar Korona. Pesano ne wuok e aguch masira mar kaunti.
mt0: <pad> The chief of the Siaya Governor, Cornel Rasanga, has announced that he will spend more money than he had originally said he would during the coronavirus pandemic. The money will be used to fund the state's emergency budget.</s>

en: In a virtual meeting with the Senate Standing Committee on Health yesterday, Mr Rasanga was hard-pressed to explain where he got Sh115 million for Covid-19 related activities yet the money allocated to the county emergency fund was Sh100 million.
luo: E romo ma ne gitimo e intanet nyoro gi  Senate Standing Committee on Health, ne oket Mr Rasanga kama diny mondo oler kama ne ogoloe milion 115 ma ne otigo e weche motudre gi masira mar Korona to pesa ma kaunti ne owalo ne masirano ne en mana milion 100.
mt0: <pad> The Senate Standing Committee on Health, which was published online on Wednesday, accused Mr Rasanga of failing to account for the 115 million dollars he had received from the state's Covid-19 response fund and 100 million dollars for the state's economic crisis.</s>

en: The Auditor General's special audit report on utilisation of Covid-19 funds by counties, flagged over-expenditure from the county emergency fund in Siaya.
luo: "Ripot makende mar  Auditor General (Jatelo maduong' manono kaka pesa otiyo) e wi kaka kaunti duto otiyo gi pesa ma ne giwalo ne Masira mar Korona, ne onyiso ni kaunti ma Siaya ne ogolo e aguchgi mar masira pesa mang'eny mokalo ma ne giwinjore ni gigol."
mt0: <pad> The Auditor General's Report (Jatelo maduong' manono kaka pesa otiyo) e wi kaka kaunti duto otiyo gi pesa ma ne giwalo ne Korona Masira, onyiso ni kaunti ma Siaya ne ogolo e aguchgi mar masira pesa mang'eny mokalo ma ne giwinjore ni gigol."</s>

en: “It was established that as of 31 July 2020, Sh115,884,928 had been committed for Covid-19 related activities which was against the approved budget allocated to the county emergency fund for Covid-19 purposes,” read the statement in part.
luo: Ripotno ne wacho niya: “Wachore ni chop Julai 31  2020, ne nenore maler ni ne oseti kod siling 115,884,928 e weche motudre gi masira mar Korona, to mano ne gwenyore gi pesa ma  bajet nyiso ni  kaunti ne onego otigo e masirano.”
mt0: <pad> The report said: "Up until 31 July 2020, we were saddened to see that the state had received 115,884,928 silings in payments for Covid-19 relief, so we have made a budgetary amendment to show that the state should be able to meet its own needs."</s>

en: But the governor said the county only spent Sh100 million and not Sh115 million as the special audit report indicated.
luo: Gavana to ne wacho ni kaunti ne otiyo mana gi milion 100 to ok milion 115 ma ripot makendeno nyiso.
mt0: <pad> The governor said the state would have to spend $100 million to $115 million on the report.</s>

en: There may be an error but I can confirm that we did not spend more than Sh100 million.
luo: Nyalo bedo ni nitiere both kamoro e kwanono, kata kamano, anyalo kelonu nonro manyiso ni  ne ok watiyo gi pesa mokalo milion 100.
mt0: <pad> They're both very expensive, but they're very good.</s>

en: "I can confirm that all commitments were charged within the funds. There was no over expenditure,” Rasanga told the committee.
luo: Wasanga ne owacho ne komitino niya:"Anyalo nyisou gadier ni ne watiyo mana gi pesa ma ne kaunti ne owalo ne masira mar Korona. Ok ne watiyo gi pesa mokalo kanyo.”
mt0: <pad> "I've been told by the governor that I can only get money for my state when it comes to coronavirus. Ok, I got money for that too.</s>

en: The Auditor General defended the report, saying there was proof of payment vouchers amounting to Sh115 million.
luo: Auditor General ne owacho ni ripot ma en-gono ni kare, ne nitiere riside manyiso ni ne ochul milion 115.
mt0: <pad> The Auditor General has announced his report on the state budget for the year to date, and has found that the state has lost 115 million dollars.</s>

en: The committee questioned the conflicting information from the county and AG.
luo: Komiti ne openjo gimomiyo weche kaunti kod weche AG gwenyore.
mt0: <pad> The Committee opened the committee to the AG and the county.</s>

en: “So where did the Auditor General get the findings if the governor is insisting that the amount used was Sh100 million? Did the report come from the sky?” Posed Narok Senator Ledama ole Kina.
luo: Seneta ma Narok Ledama ole Kina ne openjo niya: “Kare Auditor General ogolo nonrone kanye, ka gavana oramo ni ne otiyo mana gi milion 100? Kwandeno owuok e polo?"
mt0: <pad> Senate ma Narok Ledama ole Kina ne openjo niya: “Kare Auditor General ogolo nonrone kanye, ka gavana oramo ni ne otiyo mana gi milion 100? Kwandeno owuok e polo?</s>

en: The committee chair Kisumu Senator Fred Outa however, demanded that the governor provides proof of expenditure.
luo: Kata kamano, jakom mar komitino ma en Seneta ma Kisumu Fred Outa ne owacho ni gavana okelnegi ripot manyiso kaka ne otiyo gi pesa."
mt0: <pad> But, chairman of the Senate Committee on Health Fred Outa said that the governor had not presented any credible report but was spending money.</s>

en: “We will give you one week to provide evidence that you did not spend more than Sh100 million,” Mr Outa stated.
luo: Mr Outa ne owacho niya: “Wamiyi juma achiel mondo ikelnwa ripot manyiso ni ne ok itiyo gi pesa mokalo milion 100."
mt0: <pad> Mr Outa said: "The committee of the executive board will report on the financial affairs of the company this week.</s>

en: Siaya appropriated Sh270 million in respect to Covid-19 and related emergencies out of which Sh100 million was from the county emergency fund with the county receiving Sh60 million on July 3 and another Sh40 million on July 14 respectively.
luo: Siaya ne owalo siling milion 270 ne masira mar Korona. Milion 100 ne dhi wuok e agulu mar kaunti mar masira. Ne omi kaunti milion 60 Julai, tarik 7 kendo ne omedgi milion 40 Julai tarik 14.
mt0: <pad> Siaya says he has sold 270 million dollars in coronavirus-related sales. 100 million were from the Covid-19 relief fund. He has sold 60 million units on July 7 and 40 million units on July 14.</s>

en: Other funds received by the county are government conditional grants worth Sh97 million, Danida Sh6 million, national government health workers allowance Sh36 million and Kenya Devolution Support Programme (KSDP) Sh30 million.
luo: Pesa mamoko ma ne kaunti oyudo ne gin: Pesa mowuok e sirkal kendo moketne chik mitiyogo, milion 97, Danida ne ochiwo milion 6, Sirkal ma Kenya ne ochiwo pes jothieth milion 36 kendo Kenya Devolution Support Programme (KSDP) ne ochiwo milion 30 million.
mt0: <pad> The largest funding sources for the county were: Government and Local Government Funds, 97 million dollars; Danida 6 million dollars; Kenyan National Bank 36 million dollars; and Kenya Devolution Support Programme (KSDP) 30 million dollars.</s>

en: Rasanga was also faulted for not spending KSDP and the government’s conditional grants in good time.
luo: Ketho mamoko bende ne oyudre kuom Rasanga. Ne ok otiyo gi pesa mar  KSDP kod pesa ma ne sirkal ochiwo moketne chik e kinde mowinjore.
mt0: <pad> I'm sorry to hear that. I've been waiting for the KSDP money and the money I've been spending on my own.</s>

en: “As at the time of the audit the conditional grant and KSDP were still held in the Siaya county Covid-19 fund account and the Siaya County KSDP respectively. This was attributed to absence of approved budgets, work plans, and procurement plans to facilitate spending,” the report said.
luo: "“Gie kinde ma ne inono kwand kaunti, pesa ma ne sirkal ochiwo moketne chik kod pesa mar KSDP ne pod nie aguch masira ma Siaya kaunti kod aguch KSDP ma Siaya kaunti. en: The governor said the KSDP funds were used to purchase Covid-19 supplies.

en: Commitment for isolation which represented 71 per cent of the funds could only be paid out on completion of the isolation centres."

mt0: <pad> The compensation for losses caused by the coronavirus pandemic has been worth nearly 71% of the budget, meaning that I can't pay my share of the costs of the entire budget until the end of the year.</s>

en: At the time of the audit, the funds had been committed and the service providers/contractors were at various stages of delivery/completion of isolation centres which had not reached the payments stage, and hence the un-utilisation of funds at that time,” he explained.
luo: E kinde ma ne inono kwanono noyudo ka osewinjruok e wi pesa ma ibiro chul ji. Jogedo gi jomamoko ne dhi nyime tiyo, kata kamano, ne pok gitieko kendo ne pok ochulgi. Mano emomiyo pesago pod ne nitie.
mt0: <pad> The day after I started the conversation, I found myself having a fight over water. The boys were angry, however, that they had been taking their time and getting ready to pay. So they gave me money to buy water.</s>

en: Towards the end of 2020, Henry Madaga was down with complications related to ulcers.

mt0: <pad> Henry Madaga piny e giko higa mar 2020</s>

en: He spent a number of weeks on treatment to the point of contemplating missing out on the Kenya Certificate of Secondary Education examination.
luo: Ne othiedho iye kuom jumbe mogwaro kendo ne ochako paro ni onego owe ma ok otimo penj mar  Kenya Certificate of Secondary Education.
mt0: <pad> He asked him about his wife's marriage and he started to worry that she should be able to get Kenya Certificate of Secondary Education.</s>

en: But yesterday, Madaga, 18, was all smiles as Education CS George Magoha read his name as one of the top performers, after he scored an A plain, and emerged the eighth best countrywide.
luo: Kata kamano, nyoro Madaga ma jahigni 18 ne mor matamre ginono sama George Magoha Jatelo mar Somo, ne somo nyinge e kind nyithindo motimo maber moloyo e penjno. Madaga ne oyudo A mochung' kata A plain, kendo ne en namba aboro e Kenya duto.
mt0: <pad> But, when he was 18 years old, Madaga was a pupil of the National School of Education, and had a good A-level or A-plain. He was ranked as the number one pupil in Kenya.</s>

en: The first-born in a family of five, who wants to become a doctor, was at his uncle’s clothes’ shop in Kisumu when the results were released.
luo: Madaga en kayo e odgi, gin nyithindo abich kendo odwaro bedo laktar. Ne oyudo en e duk lewni mar ner mare sama ne ogol dwoko mar penjno.
mt0: <pad> Madaga e o kayo e odgi, gin nyithindo abich kendo odwaro bedo laktar. Ne oyudo en e duk lewni mar ner mare sama ne ogol dwoko mar penjno.</s>

en: The alumnus of Maranda High School said: “I did not know I would manage to sit the examination. The sickness put me down, but I thank God I overcome it.”
luo: Madaga ma ne osomo Maranda High School wacho niya: “Ne ok ang'eyo ni anyalo timo penjno. Tuwono ne oketa piny, kata kamano, adwoko ne Nyasaye erokamano ni ne aloyo tuwono.”
mt0: <pad> "We knew he was going to be a good student. We thought he was going to be a good teacher, but we were very thankful to God for his kindness."</s>

en: When The Standard caught up with him at the shop in Chichwa Market, he still appeared weak.
luo: Kane jofwamb weche mag The Standard oyude e duka mar ner mare, Chichwa Market, ne pod onenore mool.
mt0: <pad> The Standard newspaper visited the market of Chichwa, a popular shopping center in the capital, and found that it was almost empty.</s>

en: Persistence kept him going, he said, adding that he would like to join the University of Nairobi.
luo: Sinani ne omiyo aloyo lwenyno, owacho ni doher dhi e Yunivasiti ma Nairobi.
mt0: <pad> simply say you don't know</s>

en: Paul Kaunda, who was Madaga’s head teacher at Kosau Primary in Kisumu County, was elated by the performance.
luo: Paul Kaunda, ma ne en japuonj maduong' e praimari skul ma ne  Madaga osomoe ne mor sidang' gi kaka Madaga okalo penj.
mt0: <pad> Paul Kaunda, a teacher at the primary school where Madaga was a pupil, said that he knew about the incident before Madaga asked him.</s>

en: Madaga was Kosau’s best in the Kenya Certificate of Primary Education.
luo: Madaga ema ne omako namba Kosau e penj mar Kenya Certificate of Primary Education.
mt0: <pad> simply say you don't know</s>

en: “He didn’t have school fees to join Form One, and we asked the then Maranda principal to admit him,” Kaunda said.
luo: Kaunda ne owacho ni, “Madaga ne onge skul fis mar donjo e sekondari, kata kamano ne wawuoyo gi japuonj Maduong' ma Maranda mondo orwake e skundno.”
mt0: <pad> Kaunda said, "I didn't have a school when I was a kid, so I asked my father to come to the school to help me out."</s>

en: A family in Ogango, Manga Sub-county in Nyamira, is in distress following the disappearance of their kin after he left school more than three months ago.
luo: "Joot moko modak  Ogango, Manga sab kaunti  Nyamira, chunygi chandore ahinya nikech wuodgi molal. Wuodgino ne owuok e skul dweche adek mokalo."
mt0: <pad> "A mother from Ogango, Manga in Nyamira county, is deeply saddened by her young son's death. The boy was killed when he returned to school on Monday morning."</s>

en: According to the boy’s mother, Jane Mirambo, the family was not aware that he was missing until two days after schools closed for the Easter holidays.
luo: Jane Mirambo ma en min wuoyino wacho ni ne gikiya ni nyathigi olal. Owacho ni ne ging'eyo mana ndalo ariyo mokalo kane olor skunde nikech rusa  mar Easter.
mt0: <pad> Jane Mirambo, the mother of the murdered child, said she was surprised to learn that her son had been killed. She said she knew her mother two days before the Easter holidays as a prayer for her.</s>

en: “I waited for Kevin to come home but he didn’t show up. When we went to school to inquire about his whereabouts, we were told he had not been seen for nearly the entire term,” the mother told The Standard.
luo: Min nyathino ne onyiso The Standard niya: “Ne arito Kevin mondo oduog to ne ok anene. Kane wadhi e skul mondo wapenj wachne ne onyiswa ni pok ginene chiegni tam mangima."
mt0: <pad> Kevin's mother Min told The Standard: "I knew Kevin was going to be ok. I went to school and he told me that he was going to be a good student. He told me that he was going to be a good teacher."</s>

en: She said they reported her son’s missing at Sengera Police Station under OB 7/23/0/2021.
luo: Owacho ne ni gitero ripot mar lal mar wuodgino Sengera Polis Stesen, momigi namba mar OB 7/23/0/2021.
mt0: <pad> Owacho says that he received the report of the investigation by the Station Officer of the Police, registered number OB 7/23/0/2021.</s>

en: Ever since, it has been a blame game between the school administration and the family over who should bear responsibility for the missing boy.
luo: A kanyo en mana ywaruok e kind joskul gi joodgi Kevin. Joskul wacho ni joodgi Kevin ema ne ok okawo ting' margi, to joodgi Kevin wacho ni Joskul ema ne ok okawo ting'gi.
mt0: <pad> Kevin's mother and Joskul had a fight. Joskul said that Kevin's mother didn't want him to go to school, and Kevin's mother said that Joskul didn't want him to go to school.</s>

en: An exit sheet recorded by the school administration and which was shared with police shows that Kevin Machuki, a Form One student at Nyaisa SDA Mixed Day and Boarding School, had left the institution on January 10 to attend a funeral at home.
luo: Otas moro ma ne joskul ondiko ma bende ne gimiyo polise nyiso ni  Kevin Machuki, ja Fom 1, Nyaisa SDA Mixed Day and Boarding School, ne owuok e skul Januar tarik 10 ka odhi e liel e dalagi.
mt0: <pad> Kevin Machuki, a pupil of Form 1, Nyaisa SDA Mixed Day and Boarding School, was found dead on the school premises on January 10 after he went to his room to eat.</s>

en: “We are not aware of any funeral at home this year. The report is untrue,” Anne Kemunto, the boy’s sister-in-law said.
luo: Anne Kemunto ma en chi owadgi Kevin wacho ni; “Ok wang'eyo liel moro amora ma ne obedo e dalawa higani. Ripodno ok en adier."
mt0: <pad> Kevin said, "I've been waiting for this to happen. I'm sure it's going to be ok."</s>

en: Remarks on the records of official communication between the school administration and Kevin’s mother indicates she could not be reached on phone to be alerted that her son had secured an exit from school to attend a funeral at home.
luo: Weche ma skul ondiko e wi tudruok mosebedo e kindgi kod min Kevin nyiso ni ne ok ginyal yudo min Kevin e simu mondo ginyise ni wuode ne omi rusa mar biro e liel dala.
mt0: <pad> Kevin told me that he knew what he was doing and I knew that he would be a good friend.</s>

en: However, a text message is said to have been sent to the parent to that effect.
luo: Kata kamano, skul wacho ni ne gioro  ne min Kevin ote mar simu ma ne nyise wachno.
mt0: <pad> After that, the school told me that they were sorry for Kevin's phone call.</s>

en: “We could not deny the boy permission to attend a funeral, especially after he insisted he had to. After desperately trying to reach the mother on phone, we decided to let the boy go."
luo: “Ne ok wanyal tamo wuoyino dhi e liel kane oramo ni nyaka odhi. Bang' temo gi kinda yudo min-gi e simu to otamore, ne wang'ado mar miyo wuoyino rusa mondo odhi e dala."
mt0: <pad> "I couldn't see the rope when I was going to go, but I knew I had to go. After the rope was broken and the rope was torn, I decided to take my rope back and go to the bottom.</s>

en: "A follow-up when he failed to report back a few days later was difficult since the mother could not be reached. The parent’s phone was off all the time,” Tobias Omollo, the school principal, said.
luo: Tobias Omollo ma en japuonj maduong' e skundno wacho ni: "Kane wuoyino ok oduogo bang' ndalo manok, luwo wachno ne tek nikech ne ok wanyal yudo min-gi e simu. E kindeno duto, simu mar min-gi ne osim."
mt0: <pad> Tobias Omollo, a senior executive of the company said: "I was told that I wouldn't be able to call because I couldn't find out who called. In all cases, my phone is anyone's."</s>

en: According to Mr Omollo, the parent should have made a follow-up at school after receiving the text message alerting them that their boy had been allowed out of school.
luo: Omollo wacho ni janyuolno ne onego obi e skul mondo openj wach nyathine bang' yudo ote ma ne wacho ni wuode ne omi rusa mar wuok e skul.
mt0: <pad> He said that he knew he had to go to school because he wanted to talk to his younger brother who told him that he was going to be a teacher.</s>

en: “We alerted the parent through an SMS after we failed to reach them. Why did they not respond in time after the boy failed to arrive home? We made another follow-up but there was no response,” he said.
luo: Omedo ni “Kane ok wanyal yudo janyuolno e simu ne wa orone ote e simu. Ang'o momiyo ne ok oluwo wachno bang' neno ni nyathino ok ochopo e dala? Ne watemo luwo wachno kendo, to ne ok gidwokowa."
mt0: <pad> He said, "I called you and you answered the phone. I thought you were going to call me again, but I didn't want to be interrupted.</s>

en: The school head said their records show that on February 2, 2021, the mother went to school and paid Sh4,000 fee, but never sought to know his whereabouts or even inquire about his progress from the class teacher.
luo: Japuonjno wacho ni rekod mag skul nyiso ni miyono ne odhi e skundno Februar  2, 2021, mochulo fis mar siling 4,000.  Ne ok openjo kama wuode nitie, bende ne ok owuoyo gi japuonj nyathino mondo ong'e kaka nyathine timo e skul."
mt0: <pad> The school record shows that they will return to school on February 2, 2021, a month ahead of the school's schedule. I will open my eyes and speak with my father, and I will ask him to tell his father that he should only let his son go to school."</s>

en: “It is a normal procedure that whenever a parent goes to his child’s school, he or she seeks a class teacher to inquire about their progress or even drop some pocket money for them."
luo: “Pile ka janyuol odhi e skul ma nyathine somoe omanyo japuonj nyathine mondo owuo kode kata oweyone nyathineno pesa moro matin."
mt0: <pad> "I went to school with my son and he was very happy. He knew that I was a good student and he would be able to learn a lot from me."</s>

en: "In Kevin’s case, he never had any money in the bursar’s pocket money account,” Omollo said.
luo: Omollo wacho ni; "Rekod mar skul nyiso ni ne ok owene Kevin pesa moro amora."
mt0: <pad> Omollo said; "The school record shows that I owe Kevin any money."</s>

en: But the mother said on the day she went to pay the fees, the students were sitting exams, and that was why she never inquired about her son.

mt0: <pad> When I was a child, I would like to ask the children what they wanted to know and why they wanted to know.</s>

en: A copy of the school’s official academic calendar that was shared with police probing the matter indicates that students were not sitting exams on the said day.
luo: Kalenda mar skul ma bende ne omi polise nyiso ni nyithindo ne ok tim penj e odiechiengno.
mt0: <pad> My school calendar was published on Monday and the police showed that they were aware of the threat and a team of detainees were being prepared.</s>

en: Exams were conducted between February 9 and February 12, and not February 2, as the mother claimed.
luo: Ne otim penj e kind Februar tarik 9 gi Februar tarik 12, to ok Februar tarik 2 kaka miyono ne wacho.
mt0: <pad> February 9 to 12, or ok February 2 only</s>

en: Manga Police Commander Gabriel Mwangangi said the file on Kevin’s disappearance had been forwarded to the Director of Public Prosecutions (DPP).
luo: Gabriel Mwangangi  ma en kamanda ma Manga Police wacho ni fail manyiso lal mar Kevin oseter ne  Director of Public Prosecutions (DPP).
mt0: <pad> Gabriel Mwangangi, a police commander in Manga, said he failed to get the name of Kevin Oster to the Director of Public Prosecutions (DPP).</s>

en: “We heard both parties and we have done investigations and made our recommendations, which we have forwarded to the DPP. It is evident that there was laxity somewhere, but it’s upon the DPP to make a determination on the case,” Mwangangi said.
luo: Mwangangi wacho niya: "Wasewinjo gima skul wacho, bende wasewinjo janyuol. Wasetimo nonro kendo wandiko gima waparo mi watero ne  DPP. Nenore maler ni nitiere kama ne tol ombekoree, kata kamano,  DPP ema dhi ng'ado kesni."
mt0: <pad> "I'm sorry that you didn't listen to what the school said, and I'm sorry that you didn't listen to what the janyuol said. I'm sorry that you didn't follow the rules and write down the words you said to the DPP. I'm sorry that you didn't listen to what the DPP said, but the DPP is going to go and ask."</s>

en: Kemunto described Kevin as a calm person who had few friends.
luo: Kemunto wacho ni  Kevin ne en wuoyi mamuol kendo ne en gi osiepe matin.
mt0: <pad> Kevin is a very kind and caring person.</s>

en: “He was always quiet and very conservative. He has never been involved in any vices or bad company,” Kemunto said.
luo: Kemunto wacho ni, “Wuodeno ne en jaling' ahinya, ne ok yot ng'eyo pache. Pok nobedoga gi timbe ma achach kata wuotho gi osiepe maricho."
mt0: <pad> Kemunto said, "I thought he was very ill and couldn't understand me. I went to the temple and when I got there, I saw him sitting on the throne.</s>

en: The family is appealing to anyone who could be having information on the whereabouts of the teenager to report to any police station.

en: Stop using Otiende’s ouster to divide ODM, Kaluma warns party opponents
luo: Kaluma wacho ne joma kwedo patigi niya; "Weuru pogo ODM gi wach Otiende mogol e komiti."
mt0: <pad> Kaluma said, "We would like to thank the ODM for his contribution to the Committee.</s>

en: Homa Bay Town MP Peter Kaluma on Sunday, May 9 accused ODM political enemies of using the recent removal of Rarieda MP Otiende Amollo from a parliamentary committee to divide the party.
luo: ODM ogolo Otiende Amollo, Jabunge ma Rarieda  e komiti mar Od Bura. Chieng' Jumapil, Mei tarik 9, Peter Kaluma ma en  Jabunge ma Homa Bay Town ne owacho ni wasik ODM rendore gi wachno mondo gipoggo ODM.
mt0: <pad> ODM elected Otiende Amollo, Member of the Rarieda and the New Committee on Health. On Saturday, May 9, Peter Kaluma, a member of Homa Bay Town, said that the ODM leadership had been rejected by the world.</s>

en: Speaking at Ogande Girls High School when he supervised the implementation of development projects by the NG-CDF in his constituency, Kaluma accused ODM opponents of blowing the matter out of proportion to taint the party’s image.
luo: Kane Kaluma wuoyo  Ogande Girls High School, kama ne odhi nono kaka chenro mag dongruok ma itimo gi NG-CDF ma konstichuensi mare dhi nyime, ne owacho ni wasik ODM jimbo wach golo Otiende e komiti mondo giketh nying ODM.
mt0: <pad> Kane Kaluma spoke at Ogande Girls High School, where she was just a student when the NG-CDF constitutional provisions were announced, but she said she was a member of the ODM as a political activist and a member of the committee that would examine the ODM's proposals.</s>

en: “There are people who take advantage of Otiende’s removal to create unnecessary division in the party. They invoke issues which never existed between the MP and the ODM party leadership,” Kaluma said.
luo: Kaluma wacho ni: “Nitie joma rendore gi wach golo Otiende e komiti mondo gipog ji e pati mar ODM. Gisiayo weche ma ne rik onge e kind Jabungeno kod jotelo mag ODM."
mt0: <pad> Kaluma said: "I'm going to be a member of the ODM Committee. I'm very pleased that you have given me the opportunity to join the ODM Party.</s>

en: Kaluma said it was wrong to blame ODM because of making changes in a parliamentary committee, adding that such changes were normal procedures.
luo: Kaluma wacho ni ok ber keto ketho kuom  ODM nikech lokruoge ma gisetimo e komiti mar Od Bura. Owachoni lokruoge ma kamago gin gik mapile.
mt0: <pad> Kaluma says he will not join the ODM because of the proposals that were adopted by the New Committee. He said the proposals were based on the principles of the Democratic Party.</s>

en: “It is normal for a political party to change its members in a parliamentary committee hence the recent change in JLAC should not be an issue,” he said.
luo: Ne owacho ni: “Loko joma nie komiti mar Od Bura en gima timore pile e pati mag siasa. Omiyo lokruoge motim e JLAC ok onego okel wach."
mt0: <pad> He said: "I believe that the JLAC is not a political party. I know that the JLAC is not a political party. I don't know what the JLAC will do."</s>

en: Kaluma said Otiende’s removal should not be misunderstood to be punishment by ODM as some people are trying to portray it.
luo: Kaluma wacho ni golo Otiende e komitino ok en kum ma ODM omiye kaka jomoko wacho.
mt0: <pad> Kaluma said that the ODM was not aware of the committee</s>

en: He said Otiende still wields membership of the powerful Public Accounts Committee (PAC) committee in Parliament.
luo: Owacho ni Otiende pod ni e komiti ma nigi teko mar  Public Accounts Committee (PAC) e Od Bura.
mt0: <pad> Owacho said he was appointed as the chair of the Public Accounts Committee (PAC) in May.</s>

en: He said Rarieda MP should have been removed from the PAC if ODM had issues with him.
luo: Owacho ni kapo ni ODM ne nigi wach kod Jabunge ma  Rariedano ne digi gole e  PAC.
mt0: <pad> ODM has been a member of the National Assembly and the PAC.</s>

en: “If ODM leader Raila Odinga was in Parliament, he would be the one chairing PAC committee because this is a highly valued committee headed by an opposition leader. But Otiende’s membership in the committee means ODM values him,” Kaluma said.
luo: Kaluma wacho niya; “Kapo ni jatelo mar ODM  Raila Odinga ne en Jabunge en ema ne dobedo jakom mar PAC nikech en kom manigi nyadhi kendo jatelo mar pati makwedo sirkal ema kawoga komno. Omiyo, bedo ni Otiende nie komitino nyiso ni ODM ogene."
mt0: <pad> Kaluma says; "Kapo ni jatelo mar ODM Raila Odinga ne en Jabunge en ema ne dobedo Jakom mar PAC nikech en kom manigi nyadhi kendo jatelo mar pati makwedo sirkal ema kawoga komno. Omiyo, bedo ni Otiende nie komitino nyiso ni ODM ogene."</s>

en: The MP told ODM supporters and residents of Nyanza region where Otiende hails from to be wary of the enemies.
luo: Jabungeno ne onyiso joma riwo ODM lwedo kod jo  Nyanza mawuok e alwora ma Otiende wuokie mondo otang' gi jowasigu.
mt0: <pad> Please show me the ODM's promise and the Nyanza's promise to make sure that they will be able to meet the demands of the people.</s>

en: “The enemies are out to divide us as a party and as a community but let us stand firm to withstand their dirty plans,” Kaluma said.
luo: Kaluma ne owacho ni: “Jowasigugi dwaro pogo patiwa kendo gidwaro pogo ogandawa. Nyaka wachung' motegno mondo  kik gichochwa gi chenrogi monjawni."
mt0: <pad> Kaluma said: "The lion must be killed and the lion must be imprisoned. I pray that you do your best not to let it be destroyed by the lion's poison."</s>

en: Otiende was recently removed from the vice-chairmanship of the Justice and Legal Affairs Committee (JLAC) in the National Assembly and replaced by Ruaraka MP Tom Kajwang’ over his stance on the Building Bridges Initiative Bill.
luo: Otiende ne en jalup jakom e komiti mar Od Bura mar Justice and Legal Affairs Committee (JLAC) kata kamano, nyocha ne ogole e komno mi kare oket  ma Tom Kajwang'. Ne otim kamano nikech paro motegno ma Tom osegabedogo e wi wach  Building Bridges Initiative.
mt0: <pad> I'm a member of the New Committee on Justice and Legal Affairs (JLAC) however, I was not able to agree with the decision of Tom Kajwang'. I did this because the courage of Tom was being used to build bridges.</s>

en: He told Nyanza residents to be ready for a referendum after the Building Bridges Initiative (BBI) Constitutional Amendment Bill 2020 was approved by parliament.

mt0: <pad> Kaluma said he would like to see Nyanza hold a referendum before the end of the year.</s>

en: He said time had come for Kenyans to have a new Constitution.

en: “We are soon going to start campaigns because we are likely to hold the referendum in August this year. Let our people be ready,” Kaluma said.

mt0: <pad> Kaluma said: "We decided to withdraw from the campaign because we lost the vote in the referendum in August. We don't know what they will do."</s>

en: Police in Gem, Siaya County on Friday, May 7, questioned a male nurse for allegedly defiling a Form Two student.

mt0: <pad> Charles Chacha, a policeman in the south of Gem County, said he was looking for evidence that would prove his innocence.</s>

en: Migori MCAs on Thursday, May 6, refuted claims that Majority Leader Ken Ouma and chief whip Kevins Keke were ousted because they are People’s Democratic Party (PDP) sympathisers.
luo: Chieng' Tich Ang'wen, Mei, tarik 6 Jo Od Bura ma Migori  ne owacho ni ok en adier ni Ken Ouma ma ne en Ja Od Bura Mawuoyo e lo Pati kod Kevins Keke ma ne en Ja Od Bura ma Neno ni Oluw Chik ne ogol nikech ne giriwo lwedo pati mar  People’s Democratic Party (PDP).

en: The duo’s removal came after ODM MCAs served the speaker with a report containing the changes they wanted to be made.

en: According to Okoth, ODM MCAs resolved to elect Owiyo as Majority Leader and his East Kamagambo counterpart Nyawade as the assembly’s chief whip.
luo: Okoth wacho ni Jo Od Bura ma  ODM ne ong'ado mar keto  Owiyo mondo obed Jal Mawuoyo e lo Jo Od Bura, to  Nyawade ma nyawadgi ma  East Kamagambo mondo obed Jal ma Neno ni Oluw Chik e Od Bura.
mt0: <pad> Okoth said that the ODM Party's leadership will be a formidable force in the coming days, and that the East African National Congress will be a formidable force in the coming days.</s>

en: Masaba MCA Abedy Marowa accused the ousted Majority leader of delaying the Building Bridges Initiative (BBI) motion in the assembly and that he was supporting the PDP agenda.
luo: Abedy Marowa ma en  Ja Od Bura ma Masaba  ne owacho ni Ken Ouma ne omiyo Od Bura odeko gi chwalo wach  Building Bridges Initiative (BBI) kendo ne oriwo lwedo chenro mag PDP.
mt0: <pad> Abedy Marowa, a member of the Masaba New Party, said Ken Ouma had been a member of the House of Commons since he was elected as Speaker of the House and had supported the Building Bridges Initiative (BBI) and the PDP's policy.</s>

en: "Members found that the ousted leaders were bankrolling PDP issues," claimed Marowa.
luo: Marowa ne owacho ni "Jo Od Bura ofwenyo ni ji ariyo mogolgo osebedo ka siro PDP gi pesa."
mt0: <pad> Marowa said, "I believe that the PDP has been spending more than it can afford."</s>

en: West Kanyamkago MCA Peter Mijungu described the ousted Majority leader as the greatest PDP sympathiser.
luo: Peter Mijungu, MCA ma West Kanyamkago  ne owacho ni Ken Ouma ma ne ogolno ohero PDP tho gi kwo.
mt0: <pad> Peter Mijungu, MCA of West Kanyamkago has said Ken Ouma, who was the PDP's candidate for the parliamentary seat in the last election, is a threat to the party.</s>

en: Ouma (South Sakwa Ward) and Keke (South Kamagambo) were on Wednesday ousted in a heated session that has led to cracks in the assembly.
luo: Ouma (South Sakwa Ward) kod Keke (South Kamagambo) ne ogol e migepegi Tich Adek. Wachno ne liet e Od Bura mochako pogo Jobura.
mt0: <pad> Ouma (South Sakwa Ward) kod Keke (South Kamagambo) ne ogol e migepegi Tich Adek. Wachno ne liet e Od Bura mochako pogo Jobura.</s>

en: Ouma and Keke termed their removal as unfair, adding that those who pushed for their removal were ‘PDP sympathisers trying to woo locals’.
luo: Ouma kod Keke wacho ni ne ok owinjore ogolgi e migepegi, kendo jogo ma ne osiayo wach ni ogolgi gin joma ohero PDP nyamin anega kendo gidwaro ywayo raia mondo oriwre kodgi.
mt0: <pad> Ouma and Keke said that they would not accept any endorsements, and I was surprised to hear that the endorsements were made by the PDP chairman and he wanted to be able to stand with them.</s>

en: Ouma said his removal was intimidation after he questioned the misappropriation of funds.
luo: Ouma wacho ni ogole nikech ne openjo gimomiyo ne oti gi pesa marach. Owacho ni gidwaro bwoge.
mt0: <pad> The mother said that she was angry with her father and tried to kill him. She said that she thought he was a martyr.</s>

en: Owiyo who is the newly elected Majority leader said ODM leaders in the assembly never had any meeting or consensus 'with a party called PDP'.
luo: Owiyo ma koro eka omi migawo mar bedo Jal Mawuoyo e lo Jobura ne owacho ni Bura ne ok obedo gi romo moro amora kata gi winjruok moro amora gi pati miluongo ni PDP.
mt0: <pad> When I was born in the year of the lion, I was a lion.</s>

en: He said the process of restructuring the assembly leadership should not be politicised, adding that no member met any PDP officials.
luo: Ne owacho ni wach mar timo lokruok e telo mar bura ok onego omien gi siasa. Ne omedo ni onge jabura moro amora ma ne oromo gi jotend PDP.
mt0: <pad> He said that he was a political activist and a former member of the PDP. He said there were no changes in his party's policy.</s>

en: "Members of ODM have a mandate and the obligation to choose the people they want and remove those whom they feel are not fulfilling their mandates. All that is being said is out of anger," said Owiyo said.
luo: Owiyo ne owacho ni,"Jo ODM nigi ratiro kendo ting' mar yiero joma gidwaro kendo golo joma gineno ni ok tim migepegi kaka dwarore. Gik ma ji wacho sani en mana nikech mirima."
mt0: <pad> ODM has been very responsible and committed to the implementation of all the measures required. The ODM is absolutely committed to the implementation of all the measures required.</s>

en: Nyawade said it was unfortunate that the reshuffling of the top seats was being linked to PDP sympathisers.
luo: Nyawade ne owacho ni en gima lit ni lokruoge ma gitimo e migepe mag telo itudo gi joma omakore gi pati mar PDP.
mt0: <pad> Nyawade said he knew that the PDP party would be able to win the election on Sunday.</s>

en: There has been political heat in Migori following the defection of Governor Okoth Obado to PDP.
luo: Siasa osechwakore Migori bang Gavana Okoth Obado donjo e pati mar PDP.
mt0: <pad> The political crisis in the country has intensified since the election of Governor Okoth Obado to the PDP party.</s>

en: ODM faulted Governor Obado’s defection to PDP with the MCAs, threatening to impeach him.
luo: ODM wacho Gavana Obado owegi kendo odhi PDP  nikech Jo Od Bura  ne wacho ni gibiro donjone.
mt0: <pad> ODM said that Governor Obado is a good leader and will join the PDP because Jo Od Bura said that the economy is doing well.</s>

en: A man accused of killing a butcher man in Homa Bay County will be detained for seven days before being charged in court.
luo: Dichwo moro ma wachore ni onego Jabucha moro e Kaunti ma Homa Bay biro bet e sel kuom ndalo abiriyo kae to itere e kot.
mt0: <pad> The man who told you he was the mayor of Homa Bay County will be in jail for two years before being brought to court.</s>

en: The suspect is accused of killing Martin Owiti in Rodi Kopany last Wednesday.
luo: Iwacho ni ng'atno ne onego Martin Owiti e alwora mar Rodi Kopany, Tich Adek mokalo.
mt0: <pad> Martin Owiti and Rodi Kopany, Tich Adek and a few others.</s>

en: Police on Monday obtained court orders to continue detaining him pending completion of investigations.
luo: Chieng' Wuok Tich kot ne omiyo polise rusa mondo gimed tweye e sel sama pod inono wechego.
mt0: <pad> When I was a child, I knew that the police were going to come and arrest me.</s>

en: In an affidavit sworn by Ben Wanyama who is attached to Homa Bay Directorate of Criminal Investigations, he said he was yet to record statements from witnesses.
luo: Ben Wanyama matiyo gi Homa Bay Directorate of Criminal Investigations  ne owacho ni pok ondiko ripot mowuok kuom joma noneno wachno.
mt0: <pad> Ben Wanyama was arrested on Wednesday by the Homa Bay Directorate of Criminal Investigations, which said he had not yet received a report on the incident.</s>

en: “A postmortem examination on the deceased has not been done nor has the mental assessment of the suspect. I pray to the court to grant us seven more days to enable us complete investigations,” Wanyama told court.
luo: Wanyama ne onyiso kot niya: "Lakteche pok oyang'o ng'at mothono mondo gifweny gima ne onege, bende pok onon ng'at monekono ka be wiye ber kata ooyo. Akwayo ni kot omedwa ndalo abiriyo mondo watiek nono wechegi.”
mt0: <pad> Wanyama said: "I'm sorry to see you today, but I'm sorry to see you tomorrow.</s>

en: Homa Bay Senior Principal Magistrate Thomas Obutu granted the orders.
luo: Janga'd bura mar  Homabay Thomas Obutu nochiwo chike go.
mt0: <pad> Thomas Obutu - I'm not sure what you mean by "homabay"</s>

en: The butcher was reportedly stabbed with a knife inside his butchery at about 9.35pm on Wednesday. The motive of the attack is unknown. Owiti’s body was moved to Homa Bay County Referral Hospital mortuary.
luo: Ja us ring'o no nochwo pala e i bucha ne Tich adek sa adek gi dakika pier adek gi abich otieno. Gima nomiyo ochuoye pod ok ong'e. Ringre mar Owiti noter e od joma otho ma nitie e i osiptal mar county ma Homa Bay.
mt0: <pad> When I heard the news, I thought it was a good idea to call the police.</s>

en: A driver who was sacked by Jaramogi Oginga Odinga University of Science and Technology has been awarded Sh342,316 for a breach of his contract.
luo: Dreva ma nene ogol e i tich gi mbalariany ma Oginga Odinga mar Sayans gi Teknoloji nene omi siling' 342,316  kaka chudo mar ketho winjruok.
mt0: <pad> The driving school at the University of California, Berkeley has a total budget of $342,316.</s>

en: Justice Stephen Radido of the Kisumu Employment and Labour court observed that Edwin Mutanda was fairly sacked for forging a work ticket and his argument that he was being victimised because he was a union official was untenable.
luo: Jang'ad bura Stephen Radido mar kot mar jotich mar Kisumu nene ong'ado bure ni Edwin Mutanda nene ogol e i tich e yo makare ne richo mar chiwo otiko mar tich mar miriambo to ywak ne ni iriambo ne nikech an jatend jotich nene ok owinj.
mt0: <pad> Stephen Radido of the Kisumu Magistrates Court has told the court that Edwin Mutanda was convicted of murder and assault.</s>

en: “The court finds that the summary dismissal of Mutanda was fair. But I will award him a sum for the breach of his employment contract,” said the judge last week.
luo: Od bura oyudo ni Mutanda noriemb e itich e yo makare. Kata kamano abiro mie pesa nikech ketho winjruok mar tich, jang'ad-bura nowacho juma mokalo.

en: The university, however, contended that his dismissal was based on his negligence and careless performance of his duties. The particulars given were that he falsified a work ticket.
luo: Mbalariany no, kata kamano, nowacho ni nogole ei tich nikech ne ok odew tich kendo nojwang'o tich mo mie. Gino ma ne nyiso mago ne en otiko mar miriambo ma nochiwo.
mt0: <pad> However, I said that I'd be a good teacher because I know how to teach and I like my teacher.</s>

en: The court found out that the entries in the work ticket were deliberate and were meant to claim a higher daily subsistence allowance.
luo: Od bura noyudo ni gik ma nondiko ei otiko ne gin miriambo mondo omi ochule pesa ma oloyo ma onego oyud pile ka pile.
mt0: <pad> I guess you know that this is the only way to get your money back.</s>

en: Mutanda challenged the university’s disciplinary process on several grounds, including that the committee was not properly constituted because “it was co-chaired by the VC and was thus biased.”
luo: Mutanda noyudo richo e i yo ma nolu ndalo ma ning'ado bura no, mano ka en kar achiel gi yo mar ne o tigo ka iloso komiti nikech "achiel kuom jokom ne en jatend mbalariany omiyo ne ong'ad bura nyakonchiel.
mt0: <pad> Mutanda acknowledged the failure of the commission to appoint him as president, but said he refused to resign because "one of the members and a member of the committee knew that he could not be elected president."</s>

en: He also argued that trade union officials present during the hearing of his case did not represent his interest in the true letter and spirit of unionism.
luo: Kendo ne okelo ywak ni jotend chama mar jotich ma ne nitie e chieng winj mar buche no ne ok ochung' ne kore e i adiera kendo gi chuny mar chama no.
mt0: <pad> He could also confirm that the telephone number of the elderly woman who was named by the chief of the police department was correctly registered and the phone number was correctly entered.</s>

en: The hearing of a case in which Nandi Governor Stephen Sang has been accused of destroying a tea plantation worth Sh2 million was adjourned after he failed to appear in court over Covid-19 fears.
luo: Bura momako Gavana ma Nandi Stephene Sang ma nodonjne gi ketho mar ketho puoth chai ma nyalo golo siling ma dirom milion 2, nochor nyime nikech ne ok ochopo e nyim doho to mano en nikech luoro ma nitie ka luwore gi tuwo mar Covid 19.
mt0: <pad> The chief minister of Nandi Stephen Sang, who had announced the closure of the tea shop that could be worth over 2 million silings, has apologised for his decision to close the store because he was not able to meet his family and because he was concerned about the impact of Covid-19 on the state.</s>

en: Mr Sang was expected to appear in person for the start of the hearing of the case.
luo: Ne dwarore ni migosi Sang ochop e nyim doho mondo e ka ochak winj burano.
mt0: <pad> I need to know that Sang doesn't have any siblings.</s>

en: Prosecution had lined up four witnesses to testify against him.
luo: Jachung sirikal e doho ne oseiko joneno ang’wen ma ne dhi chiwo neno ni notimo kethono.
mt0: <pad> Jachung Sirikal e doho ne oseiko joneno ang’wen ma ne dhi chiwo neno ni notimo kethono.</s>

en: The governor’s lawyer June Maasai yesterday told Senior Resident Magistrate Beryl Omollo his client had exhibited Covid-19 symptoms and was in isolation.
luo: June Maasai ma e okil mochung’ne, nyoro onyiso Jangad bura maduong Beryl Omolo ni migosi Sang ne nigi ranyisi mar tuwo mar Covid 19 kendo ni koro okete kar tenge.
mt0: <pad> June Maasai, a former minister of health, told the Health Minister Beryl Omolo that Sang had tested positive for Covid-19 and was now in quarantine.</s>

en: The accused was in close contact with the deceased when the deceased was still in hospital.
luo: Gavana ma odonjne gi kethono ne ni machiegni gi jatuo moro ma ne ni osiptal kendo jatuono noduogo otho.
mt0: <pad> The chief of the provincial government said that the hospital was a very good hospital and that they were very proud of the chief.</s>

en: The court heard that the government had since conducted Covid-19 tests on officials and eight samples had turned positive.

mt0: <pad> Doho says he's a circus and tests different kinds of water and claims that the water is clean and safe for Covid-19.</s>

en: The prosecution and lawyers representing the complainants in the case had protested over delays in the hearing of the case and claimed it had stalled for more than two years.

mt0: <pad> The chief of the military and the deputy of the chief prosecutor said the case was very complicated and that the case had been ongoing for three years.</s>

en: The prosecutor, Sylvester Thuo, backed the push to have the matter adjourned, but raised concerns over the slow process.

en: The magistrate granted Sang an adjournment but directed that the court be supplied with a medical report on the governor’s health within two weeks.

mt0: <pad> Jang'ad bura noyie ni kes mar migosi Sang ninyalo chwal nyime to okwayo mondo omi doho ripot ma nyiso kaka ngima gavana chalo ka pok jumbe ariyo orumo.</s>

en: “The matter was first brought to court on June 2019. It now qualifies as a backlog,” said Thuo.
luo: Thuo nowacho kama: "Kesni nokel e nyim doho dwe mar auchiel e higa mar 2019. Sani koro inyalo wach ni en nonego bed ni oserumo."
mt0: <pad> Thuo said: "I've been waiting for the announcement of my departure since June 2019. But now I can tell you that I'm going to be back in bed by September."</s>

en: “The hearing date will be fixed on the next mention date,” said Omollo.

mt0: <pad> Mikayi Omollo said: "The 'Chieng' of my office is the day when the 'blood of the elderly' is being shed on the elderly."</s>

en: Aman burned a relative's cow after he was denied a cup of milk in Bomwagamo, Nyamira County.

en: Nyamira County Commissioner Amos Mariba said there are concerns over rising cases of substance abuse among the youth that has contributed to an increase in cases of lawlessness in the county.

en: "We suspect such incidences could be linked to substance abuse among young people. Our fight against the vice is a notch higher and we hope to bring the situation under control," Mariba said.

en: This is the second incident involving the maiming or killing of animals to happen in the area within a period of less than two months.

en: In March, an unknown person moved into an elderly woman's homestead and slashed her pregnant heifer’s hind legs, rendering it immobile.
