luo: Migosi Awan ma en achiel kuom jo ma ni e komiti miluongo ni National Committee of Chambers of Commerce  kendo en e ma ochung' ne jotim ohala ma Siaya nowacho  ni ok one ka weche dhi bedo maber kodgi.
mt0: <pad> simply say you don't know</s>

en: Agnes Achieng, a vegetable vendor who had a stall just opposite the college where several hostels are situated, said she had to move to the market centre to start all over again.
luo: Agnes Achieng ma ne nigi kibanda momanyore gi kama sikund nitie kendo ma ne ni machiegni gi kama nyithi skundno odakie, wacho ni nochune ni mondo odhi ochak ohandeno  e chiiro.
mt0: <pad> Agnes Achieng, who was a primary school teacher for the first time and a graduate of the University of Nairobi, said she thought she should go to bed and eat breakfast in the morning.</s>

en: “I stayed at home for two months trying to strategise. My vegetable business collapsed in 2019. I had a stall where most of the students were living and when all of them finally left, my business collapsed,” said Achieng.
luo: Achieng' wacho niya: "Nabedo pacho kuom dweche ariyo katemo omo fwa. Ohanda mar loko alot nopodho e higa mar 2019. Ne an gi kibanda machiegni gi kuma thoth nyithind skundo nodakie, to ka giduto ne giwuok, ohanda ne opodho.
mt0: <pad> Achieng' said: "I have been mourning for two days since his death. I will be back in the year 2019. And I will start my campaign when the youths come and go, or when they come and go, I will be back in the year 2019.</s>

en: The campus was launched in 2008 as a satellite campus with only 32 students.
luo: Skundno ne ochak e higa mar 2008 kaka bad mbalariany ma Moi ka en mana gi jopuonjre 32.
mt0: <pad> The investigation was launched in 2008 after the failure of the election of Moi.</s>

en: The college did not receive government-sponsored students from Moi University for some years, but managed to admit privately sponsored learners.
luo: Skundno ne ok oyudo nyithindo ma ne sirkal chudonegi kuom higni mogwaro koa e mbalariany ma Moi. Kata kamano, ne en gi nyithindo ma ne chudo kigin.
mt0: <pad> I'm sorry to see the children who were killed in the first half of the 20th century. However, there are still children who were killed in the first half of the 21st century.</s>

en: Before its closure, the college had received an ultimatum from the Commission of University Education that it risked closure if the management did not get 50 hectares of land for expansion after an inspection in 2016.
luo: Ka pok ne olore, ne oridne chik gi Commission of University Educaton
mt0: <pad> When I was younger, I couldn't understand the language.</s>

en: The Commission of University Education had given the campus a timeline of two years to ensure all the requirements were met by February 2018 when another inspection was to be conducted before a final decision was made.
luo: Bad sirikal ma ngiyo yore somo e Kenya - Commission of University Education -nomiyogi higni ariyo nyaka dwe mar a
mt0: <pad> The Commission of University Education in Kenya - which is the highest university education body in Kenya - has announced that it will not allow students to study in English.</s>

en: Odera Akang’o College campus, which currently sits on six hectares, had 1,142 privately sponsored students at the time of its closure.
luo: Odera Akang'o ma sani ni e lo ma romo heka 6, ne nigi nyithindo 1142 ma ne chudo kigin kane pok ochop kinde ma ne olore.
mt0: <pad> Odera Akang'o, whose height is 6 feet, has 1142 children who were born before he was born.</s>

en: In a bid to beat the closure warning, the college had received 90 hectares in Nyamininia near Yala.
luo: Ka gitemo kasore mondo kik tarigno owegi oko, sikundno noyudo lo heka 90 kama iluongo ni Nyamininia man machiegni gi Yala.
mt0: <pad> When I was a child, I couldn't understand the language of the world. I couldn't understand the language of the people.</s>

en: The county government committed Sh35 million two years ago to help improve, construct and refurbish the campus structures and it was to offer tuition scholarships to its staff in return.
luo: Serikal ma piny mar kauntino, noketo milion 35 tenge higni ariyo mokalo mondo okony e bero, gero, kendo loso  sikundno. Gi ma sikundno ne onego otim en yie ne jo kaunti osom e skundno nono.
mt0: <pad> The series, which was released in the United States in September, contains 35 million episodes, and a total of 35 million viewers. The second episode is called "The Lost Generation," and it is a compilation of the first four episodes of the series.</s>

en: However, Moi University administration pulled out, letting go all the workers who had remained at the campus, forcing it to close.
luo: Kata kamano, jo ma ochung' ne mbalariany ma Moi University nowere gi skundno kendo ne giyie mondo jo ma ne tiyo e sikundno owuogi to  mano nomiyo olore.
mt0: <pad> However, the university's medical school provided us with a referral and we were able to get a prescription for a vaccine that was supposed to be available in the next two days.</s>

en: But there have been plans by other higher learning institutions seeking to take over the college.
luo: To nitie chenro ma itimo gi mbalariany mamoko mondo gikaw sikundno.
mt0: <pad> When I was a child, I couldn't understand the words.</s>

en: Karachuonyo constituency ODM officials have told political leaders to end clan politics in Homa Bay County.
luo: Ofisa mag ODM e od bura ma Karachuonyo okwayo jotend siasa mondo giwere gi siasa mapogo dho udi e kaonti mar Homa Bay.
mt0: <pad> Office of the ODM in Karachuonyo announced that the political world is changing and that the political parties are moving towards Homa Bay.</s>

en: Addressing journalists at a Homa Bay hotel on Sunday, ODM chairpersons from the six wards in Karachuonyo Constituency and the constituency chair have denounced clan politics if the county is to elect a good governor.
luo: Jokom mar ODM ma wuok e ward auchiel ma nitie e od bura ma Karachuonyo kaachiel gi jakomb ODM ma od burano, nowuoyo gi jofwamb kod keyo weche ka gin e hotel moro e taon mar Homa Bay chieng' Jumapil. Ne gikwedo mokalo siasa mag anyuola ka giwacho ni mano nyalo mono kauntino yudo gavana mowinjore.
mt0: <pad> The ODM's executive board of the first district committee, which was formed in June, has been dissolved by the ODM's executive board of the second district committee. It has also criticized the political corruption of the government, saying that it cannot provide the necessary funding for the provincial government.</s>

en: The leaders were speaking after claims by some contenders that the Rachuonyo clan which comprises Karachuonyo, Kasipul and Kabondo-Kasipul constituencies will decide who becomes the next Homa Bay governor in 2022 because of their numerical advantage.
luo: Jotelo nowuoyo bang' jotelo moko ma dwa ni oyiergi nosieko gi wach moro ni Jo-Karachunyo moting'o od bura ma Karachuonyo, Kasipul, kod Kabondo-Kasipul e ma nigi teko mar yiero jal ma biro bedo gavana e kaunti ma Homa Bay e higa mar 2022 nikech gin e ma ging'eny.
mt0: <pad> The committee also released a statement on the matter that Mr. Jo-Karachunyo, a member of the Karachuonyo, Kasipul, and Kabondo-Kasipul districts, will run for the office of Governor of Homa Bay in 2022 because he was elected by his supporters.</s>

en: They argued that Rachuonyo clan has more voters than other clans in the county.
luo: Jogo ne wacho ni Jo-Karachuonyo e ma nigi jogo ombulu mathoth moloyo dhoudi mamoko e kauntino.
mt0: <pad> The game is called the Karate-do and it is a very simple game consisting of a handful of small objects such as sticks and stones.</s>

en: Kendu Bay Town Ward chairman Justus Osumba said the narrative is outdated and divisive, adding that cannot the county has eight constituencies.
luo: Justus Osumba ma e jakom ma Kendu Bay ward, nowacho ni mano en paro ma nyachon kendo ma pogo oganda, komedo wacho ni kauntino nigi od buche aboro.
mt0: <pad> Justus Osumba, a member of Kendu Bay Ward, said that the ward is in danger and threatened by the infection, adding that the ward has been closed for two days.</s>

en: He argued that three constituencies alone cannot make a candidate win a gubernatorial seat.
luo: Nowacho ni ute buche adek kende ok nyal miyo ng'ato yomb jomamoko ma obed gavana.
mt0: <pad> I knew that you were going to be a good governor.</s>

en: Osumba said there is a need for Rachuonyo clan to welcome gubernatorial candidates from other constituencies.
luo: Osumba nowacho ni dwarore mondo jo ma aa Rachuonyo osir ng'ama dwa bedo gavana mowuok eod buche mamoko.
mt0: <pad> Osumba said that he would like to be the next governor of the state.</s>

en: “We are only three constituencies hence our sons and daughters who want to vie for the seat cannot succeed without the support of voters from other constituencies,” Osumba said.
luo: Nowacho kama: "Wan mana gi od buche adek kende. Omiyo, ok nyalre mondo yawuotwa kod nyiwa obed gavana ka ok osirgi gi jo ma wuok e od buche mamoko.
mt0: <pad> Nowacho kama: "Wan mana gi od buche adek kende. Omiyo, ok nyalre mondo yawuotwa kod nyiwa obed gavana ka ok osirgi gi jo ma wuok e od buche mamoko."</s>

en: The senior citizen said clannism will deny the county good candidates for the County top seat, adding that all candidates are welcomed to the larger Karachuonyo region.
luo: Jaduong'no ne owacho ni siasa mag anyuola mono kaontino yudo joma beyo mowinjore bedo jotelo mar kaonti kendo nowacho ni Karachuonyo duong' ma ji duto madwaro kom onego otem atema.
mt0: <pad> The elder said that the political parties that have been involved in the election of the new president should be responsible for the election and he said that the President of the Republic of China should be a leader of the people's republic.</s>

en: “All those with desirable leadership qualities to ascend to power should do their campaigns across the county without discrimination,” said Osumba.
luo: Osumba nomedo wacho niya: "Ji duto ma nigi kido mar bedo jatelo maber onego otim kampen mag gi e kauntino duto ma ok obuon-gi.
mt0: <pad> Osumba added: "If you want to be a good leader, you have to fight for your own cause and against the people who are not willing to support you."</s>

en: Karachuonyo Constituency Joshua Maena said politics of incitement and discrimination had been overtaken by events.
luo: Joshua Maeno ma en jachung' ma od bura ma Karachuonyo nowacho ni siasa ma ithuwie ji kod buono ji en gi ma nokalo nene.
mt0: <pad> Joshua Maeno is a former politician who was elected to the House of Representatives in 2010 and has been a member of the House of Representatives since.</s>

en: He said there is a need for politics of inclusivity to enable Homa Bay to get a good governor after the 2022 General Election.
luo: Nowacho ni dwarore mondo siasa oriw ji duto e ka kaunti ma Homa Bay nyalo yudo gavana maber bang' yiero maduong' ma 2022.
mt0: <pad> simply say you don't know</s>

en: “Let us stop discriminating people. This type of politics is obsolete,” said Maena.
luo: Maeno owacho kama: "Waweuru tim mar buono jomamoko. Kit siasa ma kama tinde onge."
mt0: <pad> Maeno said: "We are all very angry. There is no political solution."</s>

en: He cautioned leaders against branding others as 'outsiders' during politics to achieve their selfish political interests.
luo: Nosiemo jotelo ma luongo jomoko ni jolimbamba e kinde siasa mana ni mondo gin e ma yiergi.
mt0: <pad> I would like to avoid the political and social tensions that have been created by the political and social tensions of the past.</s>

en: “You find a man who has lived in an area since childhood is branded an outsider when he ventures into politics. Segregation is wrong,” Odero said.
luo: Odero nowacho niya: "Iyudo ka iluongo ng'at mosedak kamoro nyaka ne nyuole ni jalimbamba sama odonjo e weche siasa. Pogo ji e yo ma kamano en gi ma rach miwuoro."
mt0: <pad> Odero said: "Iyudo ka iluongo ng'at mosedak kamoro nyaka ne nyuole ni jalimbamba sama odonjo e weche siasa. Pogo ji e yo ma kamano en gi ma rach miwuoro."</s>

en: Some of the political leaders who are eyeing the county gubernatorial include Deputy Governor Hamilton Orata, Woman Rep Gladys Wanga, County Secretary Isaiah Ogwe, businessman Jared Otieno, former Nairobi Governor Evans Kidero, KUPPET Secretary General Akello Misori, ODM National Chairman John Mbadi and politician Luis Otieno.
luo: Moko kuom jotelo ma olap dhogi chuer ne komb gavana oriwo Hamilton Orata ma e jalup gavana ma sani, Gladys Wanga ma sani en Woman Rep, Isaiah Ogwe ma en jagoro mar kaunti, Jared Otieno ma en jatim ohala, Evans Kidero ma ne en gavana ma chon ma Nairobi, Akello Misori ma en Secretary General mar KUPPET, John Mbadi ma en jakom mar chama mar ODM, kod Luis Otieno ma be en jasiasa.
mt0: <pad> All the elected members of the ODM party are former Governor Hamilton Orata, Gladys Wanga who is now a Woman Rep, Isaiah Ogwe who is a County Speaker, Jared Otieno who is a Deputy Speaker, Evans Kidero who is the former mayor of Nairobi, Akello Misori who is the Secretary General of KUPPET, John Mbadi who is the chairman of the ODM Party, and Luis Otieno who is a politician.</s>

en: They want to succeed Governor Cyprian Awiti who is serving his second term.
luo: Gidwaro ni gikaw kar Cyprian Awiti ma e gavana ma tiyo sani kendo ma kindene mar bedo e ofis orumo.
mt0: <pad> I am very pleased to have met Cyprian Awiti, the Governor of the Republic of Cyprus, who is a worthy and competent candidate for the office of the Chief Minister.</s>

en: Two children were killed after their house collapsed at Ururi village, Bondo Sub-County, on Saturday morning.
luo: Nyithindo ariyo ne otho chieng' Ngeso bang' odgi gore piny e gweng ma Uriri e sab kaonti ma Bondo
mt0: <pad> When I was a child, I knew that I couldn't speak.</s>

en: The two, Juliana Achieng', 2, and Mary Achieng’,12, were sleeping in the house together with their parents when the incident happened.
luo: Nyithindo ariyogo ma moro iluongo ni Juliana Achieng' ma jahigni ariyo, kod nyamin-gi Mary Achieng' ma jahigni 12, ne nindo gi jonyuolgi sa ma ne masirano otimore.
mt0: <pad> The two girls, Juliana Achieng' and her sister Mary Achieng', were killed in the accident.</s>

en: Their father, Fredrick Achieng’, who survived the tragedy, told The Standard that the incident happened at around midnight.
luo: Wuon-gi ma iluongo ni Fredrick Achieng' ma notony e kinde masirano, nonyiso jo gaset mar The Standard ni masirano notimore kar sa auchiel otieno.
mt0: <pad> Fredrick Achieng', a man who was arrested at the scene of the accident, told The Standard that the accident happened because his car was stolen.</s>

en: "Our roof was first blown off before the walls collapsed on us, killing our two children," said Achieng’.
luo: Achieng' wacho niya: "Tatwa e ma ne yamo okwango owalo kae to kor ot olwar kuomwa mi onego nyithindo ariyogo.
mt0: <pad> Achieng' said: "My father is a man who has been a martyr for the people of his country. He is a man who has been a hero to the people of his country."</s>

en: He said villagers who rushed to the scene after they heard screams rescued them.
luo: Nowacho ni jogweng' ma nowinjo ka gigoyo nduru e ma noringo mobiro resogi.
mt0: <pad> I've been waiting for you, and I've been waiting for you.</s>

en: He appealed to well-wishers to help him get shelter and meet the burial expenses for his two children.
luo: Nokwayo ni jo ma chunygi ler mondo okonye gi pesa oyud ot machielo kendo oyik nyithinde ariyogo.
mt0: <pad> I knew that you were going to be a good friend and I would like to thank you for your kindness.</s>

en: The bodies were taken to Bondo sub-county hospital mortuary.
luo: Ringre nyithindogo noter e od kano ringre jo ma otho e osiptal mar Bondo sab kaonti.
mt0: <pad> I'm sorry to hear that you don't know</s>

en: The late Keziah Obama has today been laid to rest at her Kogelo village in Siaya county.
luo: Ringre Keziah Obama kawuono noyik e gweng mar Kogelo e kaunti ma Siaya.
mt0: <pad> Mrs. Obama visited the memorial of her grandmother, Martha Kezia Obama, at the Memorial Park in Savannah, Georgia.</s>

en: The late Keziah was the mother of former US President Barack Obama’s half-brother, Malik Abong’o Obama.
luo: Ne en min Malik Abong'o Obama ma en owadgi Ker machon ma Amerka Barack Obama.
mt0: <pad> Malik congratulated President Obama on his first visit to the United States.</s>

en: She died on April 13, 2021, while receiving treatment at a UK-based hospital.
luo: Keziah notho tarik 13 April, 2021 ka noyudo thieth e osiptal moro man UK.
mt0: <pad> Keziah died on 13 April, 2021 at a private hospital in the UK.</s>

en: Mama Keziah was the spouse of the late Barack Obama senior. She was 78 years at the time of her death.
luo: Mama Keziah Obama ne en chi Barach Obama senior. Notho kojahigni 78.
mt0: <pad> Mama Keziah Obama and her father Barach Obama senior.</s>

en: Her body arrived in Kenya on Friday morning before it was transported to Kogelo where she was buried.
luo: Ringrene nochopo Kenya chieng' Tich Abich okinyi, eka otere Kogelo kama noyike.
mt0: <pad> Ringrene n'chopo Kenya chieng' Tich Abich okinyi, eka otere Kogelo kama noyike.</s>

en: Malik, who is the eldest son while speaking on behalf of the family eulogised his mother as a loving and responsible woman.
luo: Malik ma e wuoyi makayo, nochiwo nend min-gi kowacho ni ne en miyo mohero ji kendo ma nokawo ting'ne.
mt0: <pad> Malik went to the bathroom, and I remembered the man who told me that he gave me water and I took his hand.</s>

en: Among leaders who attended the burial were; Siaya Deputy Governor James Okumbe, Senator James Orengo and Rarieda MP Otiende Amollo.
luo: Moko kuom jotelo ma nodhi e ikne oriwo: James Okumbe ma en jalup gavana ma Siaya,  James Orengo ma en seneta ma Siaya, kod Jaod Bura ma Rarieda, Otiende Amollo.
mt0: <pad> Everyone who attended the ceremony was honoured: James Okumbe, deputy governor of Siaya, James Orengo, senator of Siaya, and the mayor of Rarieda, Otiende Amollo.</s>

en: Speakers eulogised mama Keziah as an inspiring woman, who had brought up a great family.
luo: Jo ma nowuoyo e liende nowacho ni Keziah ne en miyo ma ne jiwo ji, kendo ma nopidho kiye mageny kendo ne omiye luor.
mt0: <pad> The man who spoke to him said that Keziah was a woman of great wealth and a very rich man.</s>

en: Orengo said his relationship with the Obama family dates back to the years when Senior Barack Obama was alive.
luo: Orengo nowacho ni nochako ng'eyo jood Obama e kinde ma Senior Barack Obama ne pod ngima.
mt0: <pad> I told Obama that I was going to be a good friend of him.</s>

en: He described the late Senior Obama as a reputable economist.
luo: Nolero ni Obama Senior ne en  ng'at ma nong'ere ahinya molony  e weche mag pesa.
mt0: <pad> Obama Senior is a very wealthy man.</s>

en: Orengo said the late Senior Obama was among the team of economic specialists who worked on the sessional paper number 10 of 1969 that guided the development of Kenya for decades.
luo: Nowacho ni Obama ne en achiel kuom jolony ma noloso weche ma ne dhi tayo ochumi ma Kenya ma iluongo gi Kisungu ni sessional paper number 10 of 1969 kendo gino nokonyo piny Kenya kuom higni pieche.
mt0: <pad> I told Obama that I was very pleased with his decision to publish the Kenyan constitution which is Sessional Paper Number 10 of 1969 and which has been a part of my policy for the past five years.</s>

en: "He was a great scholar who did his studies in several universities and later returned to Kenya where he worked as an economist in the Ministry of economic planning. He worked with other great ministers who were also my friends like the late Tom Mboya," he said.
luo: Nowacho kama: "Obama ne en jasomo mang'ula ma nosomo e mbalariany mopogore opogore, kendo noduogo Kenya kama notiye kaka economist maduong'  e bwo migawo mar economic planning. Bende, notiyo gi jochung' ne migepe madongo-dongo kendo mopogore opogore ma bende ne gin osiepega kaka Tom Mboya."
mt0: <pad> Obama: "Obama was a good friend and I studied with him in many different fields, and I came to Kenya where I worked as the head of economic planning. He was very charismatic and funny, and he was very enthusiastic about his ideas and proposals.</s>

en: MP Otiende said the Obama family has elevated Kenya to the international map by producing the first black president in the US.
luo: Migosi Otiende Amollo to nowacho ni od Obama omiyo piny Kenya obedo e rang'iny mamalo e piny ngima kuom golo ker mokwongo e piny Amerka ma nigi remb Africa.
mt0: <pad> Obama's visit to Kenya will be the first US military mission to Africa.</s>

en: "This is one family that has given us so much pride. We are on the international map because of them. Their son, former US President  Obama put us on an international map," noted Otiende.
luo: Otiende nowacho niya: "Joodni osemiyowa nyadhi malich. Ong'ewa e piny mangima nikech gin. Wuodgi ma ne en ker machon mar piny Amerka e momiyo mano en kamano."
mt0: <pad> Otiende said: "I'm very happy to see you today. I'm very sad to see you. I thought I was a young American who had been treated like this.</s>

en: Deputy Governor  Okumbe also described the Obama's as a great family that had uplifted not only the image of the country but Siaya county as well.
luo: Migosi Okombe ma en jalup gavana bende nowacho ni jood Obama gin joot ma nigi huma ahinya nikech gise ng'awo yo ma inenogo pinywa, kod kaunti ma Siaya bende.
mt0: <pad> Senator Okombe, a former governor of the state, said that Obama's election was a "great opportunity" for him to show his political skills and ability to make a difference in the country.</s>

en: Okumbe said he is a friend to the family through Auma  Obama who was his great friend.
luo: Ne omedo wacho ni Auma Obama en osiepne mogeno kendo ni en osiep joodno kokalo kuome.
mt0: <pad> He said that Obama was a good man and he will be ready to take office.</s>

en: "Auma and I have done a lot of development projects, especially for the Kogelo family. She has always invited me for her functions for the community where she gives back through projects," added Okumbe.
luo: Nowacho niya: "An kaachiel gi Auma wasetimo gik mathoth ma kelo dongruok ahinya ne gweng' ma Kogelo. Osebedo kogwela seche ma en gi projekt moko motimo e gweng'ni kokonyogigo."
mt0: <pad> "I'm very pleased that Auma has done so much good work for the Ministry of Education. I can't wait to see what you do with the project that the Ministry of Education is working on."</s>

en: The late Mama Keziah was buried a few minutes after 1pm in accordance with the Muslim rites.
luo: Ringre Mama Keziah noyik dakika moko matin bang' sa abiriyio ka luwore gi chike jo Islam.
mt0: <pad> Mama Keziah stood still for a minute when she started to pray for her son.</s>

en: Two security guards were on Thursday night brutally murdered at Ndondi market centre in Alego Usonga, Siaya County.
luo: Askeche moko ariyo ne oneg e yo malit chieng' Tich Ang'wen gotieno e chiro ma Ndondi ma yudore Alengo Usonga e kaunti ma  Siaya.
mt0: <pad> a man was arrested on Wednesday at the office of the Chief Minister's Office in Siaya County, province of Swaziland.</s>

en: Baragulu assistant chief Maurice Abudha said they also found the body of another watchman who was manning a building with a shop and a bar.
luo: Maurice Abudha ma en jalup chif ma Baragulu, nowacho ni ne oyud ringre askari machielo ma rito ot ma nigi duka kod od matho kongo.
mt0: <pad> Maurice Abudha, a member of the National Assembly of the Republic of the Congo, said he was a soldier who served in the army during the night and went to buy supplies for his family.</s>

en: The two were manning a local bar and hardware store at the market centre.
luo: Askeche ariyo ma noyud koneg go, ne rito ba (kar madho kuong') kod hadware moro e chirono.
mt0: <pad> Please tell me, if you don't know, that the night (kar madho kuong') is a very important day.</s>

en: "The two watchmen were killed by robbers who broke into the shop and hardware store. They got away with a lot of goods from both the shop and hardware store," he said.
luo: Nowacho kama: "Askeche ariyogo ne onegi gi jomahundu moko ma noturo duka mar hadware mane girito, kendo jo njore go ne gikwalo mwandu mathoth kowuok kuom hadware kod dukano."
mt0: <pad> "I thought I was going to be a shopper at a clothing store, and I thought I was going to be a customer of the store and the clothing."</s>

en: The bodies of the two watchmen had deep machete cuts on the head.
luo: Ringre askechego ne oyud ka nigi alama ma nyiso ni ne ochadhgi gi ojala e wigi.
mt0: <pad> Ringre stood with his hand in his mouth as if to show that the audience was ready for the arrival of the king.</s>

en: Siaya OCPD Bernard Muriuki said the police had launched investigations to nab the culprits.
luo: Jatend polis ma (OCPD) ma Siaya migosi Benard Muriuki, a owacho ni polis osechako timo nonro mar manyoachije motimo tim mahunduno.
mt0: <pad> The chief of police (OCPD) of Siaya, Benard Muriuki, said that the police have taken measures to prevent the rape of children.</s>

en: "I cannot give details at this time. We have just started the investigation," he said.
luo: Nowacho niya: "Ok dak awach weche mathoth gie sani. Eka sani wachako timo apedhawa ne jogo."
mt0: <pad> I said, "Okay, dad, I'm going to say my words. But I'll tell you that I'm going to play with the players."</s>

en: Meanwhile, residents in the area have called for increased police patrols, citing increasing cases of insecurity.
luo: Gie sechego jodak ma kono kwayo ni mondo polise omed timo kachero e alworano ka giwacho ni timbe ma kamago osemedore ahinya e alworano.
mt0: <pad> The chief of police said that they had taken a serious look at the incident and that the investigation was being carried out by the police.</s>

en: Martha Awino, a businesswoman at the centre, said several shops were broken into and goods stolen last month.
luo: Martha Awino ma be timo ohala e chirono, nowacho ni nitie duke mogwarore ma osetur kendo mwandu man e igi okwal dwe mokalo.
mt0: <pad> I'm sorry to hear you, Martha. I've been waiting for you for so long and I've been waiting for you for so long.</s>

en: She said a watchman was killed at the market centre last year.
luo: Nowacho bende ni jarito machielo be noneg e chirono higa mokalo.
mt0: <pad> I remember the day that I was born.</s>

en: The perennial water shortage in Homa Bay town will finally end after the Lake Victoria South Water Works Development Agency (LVSWWDA) purchased Sh200 million water distribution equipment to fix it.
luo: Pi ma osebedo ka chendo e boma ma Homa Bay kuom kinde malach koro biro rumo bang' Lake Victoria South  Water Works Development Agency (LVSWWDA) nyiewo gik ma kowo pi ma nokawo siling' milion 200.
mt0: <pad> The water that has been spilling into the Homa Bay area for several months has been cleaned up by the Lake Victoria South Water Works Development Agency (LVSWWDA) on Tuesday.</s>

en: The equipment imported from Belgium includes steel water pipes, water pumps and other items used for constructing water supply systems.
luo: Gigo nonyiew kowuok piny Belgium kendo giriwo olalo mag chuma, gima thuri pi (pom) kod gik mamoko ma idhi tigo e gero chenro mar kowo pi.
mt0: <pad> The bread is made from Belgian wheat and contains a lot of nuts, potatoes and other fruits.</s>

en: LVSWWDA chairperson Dan Omino and Homa Bay Water Sewerage and Sanitation Company managing director Evans Nyagol received the consignment on Thursday, April 29.
luo: Jakom mar LVSWWDA, Dan Owino kod dairekta mar Homa Bay Water Sewerage and Sanitation Company, Evans Nyagol, ne nitie ka ne gigo ochopo chieng' Tich Ang'wen April 29.
mt0: <pad> The chief of the LVSWWDA, Dan Owino and the director of Homa Bay Water Sewerage and Sanitation Company, Evans Nyagol, confirmed that they were starting the project on April 29, 2016.</s>

en: Omino said the equipment will complete a mega water project christened, Homa Bay Cluster Water Supply Project, funded by the National Government in collaboration with Belgium through the LVSWWDA.
luo: Omino nowacho ni gigo ibo tigo e loso chenro ma radhai mar keyo pi kendo ibiro luonge ni Homa Bay  Cluster   Water Project ka pesa mosire ogol gi sirikal ma malo ka giriwore gi piny Belgium kendo ka gitiyo gi LVSWWDA.
mt0: <pad> The project is being funded by the European Union and the LVSWWDA and will be called Homa Bay Cluster Water Project.</s>

en: Homa Bay town, the administrative headquarter of the county, face shortage with the current water treatment plant producing only 2.5 million litres per day instead of the required 5 million litres.
luo: Taon mar Homa Bay, kod ofis maduong' mar kauntino ok yud pi moromo kowuok e kar thiedho pi ma gi e sana golo mana lita milion ariyo gi nus odiechieng' kar pi lita milion 5 ma dwarore odiechieng' kodiechieng'.
mt0: <pad> The chief of the office of the Department of Health in Homa Bay, told the media that they had been able to get enough water for two million liters of water each day and five million liters of water each week.</s>

en: Omino said once completed, the new project will produce 8.8 million litres of water per day.

en: “This project will produce excess water which will take care of the needs of the growing population for the next 20 years. This means a shortage of water can only occur in this area after two decades,” said Omino.
luo: Nowacho kama: "Projektni biro golo pi mang'eny momedore ma biro chopo dwach kwan ji ma medore e taondni kuom higni 20 ma biro. Mano nyiso ni pi biro mana remo jo ma odak e taondni higni 20 ma biro!"

en: The major component of the project encompasses piping of water from Lake Victoria to a treatment plant to produce clean water which is to be pumped to the residents’ taps for consumption.
luo: Gima duong' ma projektno biro timo en golo pi kowuok Lake Victoria kendo keye gi odudu mabor nyaka kama idhi thiedhe kata chinge mondo ogolo pi maliw kendo maler, kae to ikeye ne ji mondo oti kode.
mt0: <pad> The largest watershed in the project is Lake Victoria and the highest levels of the watershed require that the water be clean and clear, so it is important that the water be pumped out of the valleys and streams.</s>

en: He said the agency is about to complete another component of the project in Rodi Kopany Township which will produce 400,000 litres of water through two boreholes

en: “We are going to supply water stably upon completion of this mega project and water shortage will be history here,” Nyagol said.

mt0: <pad> Nyagol said: "We have a plan to establish the project, and my fear that it will not be completed is that it will not be completed, so I'm going to come here and see if it will be completed."</s>

en: He told residents to be ready to receive water from the project.

en: The project which started in March 2019 is expected to end in November this year.

en: The Nubian community has called on authorities to improve conditions at a field in Kolwa, Kisumu County, where they are living in makeshift structures after they were evicted from a disputed land.
luo: Oganda mar Wanubi okwayo sirkal otimie gimoro e wi kar dakgi ma ni Kolwa  e Kaunti ma Kisumo, kama gidak e ute mojong bang' ka noseriembgi kama ne gidakie kilaro wach lobno.
mt0: <pad> Uganda's Northern Territory is a country of the Eastern Africa, and it is a country of the Western Region.</s>

en: They have also urged the county government to expedite the process of resettling them.
luo: Gikwayo sirkal mar kaunti bende mondo oruregi miyogi kar dak machielo.

en: Kenya Railways (KR) has laid claim to the land in Kibos, which the Nubians say was given to them by the colonial government in 1937.
luo: Riwruok mar reru ma Kenya miluongo ni Kenya Railways (KR) nogolo ng'ur e wi lobno ka Jo-Wanubi to wacho ni nomigi lobno gi sirkal machon e higa mar 1937.
mt0: <pad> Kenya Railways (KR) nogolo ng'ur e wi Jo-Wanubi railway to say they started the railway in 1937.</s>

en: The field, next to Kisumu East CDF office, is prone to floods that have made life difficult, especially for the elderly.
luo: Kama gijotie sani ni machiegni gi ofis Kisumu East CDF  thoro pong'ga ka koth chue, kendo osemiyo ngima obedo mateknegi, to ahinya ahinya ne joma hikgi oniang'.
mt0: <pad> When I was a child, the office of Kisumu East CDF thoro pong'ga ka koth chue, and I would like to thank you for being a technical person, or at least for having a good mother.</s>

en: KR accused them of encroaching on land meant for expansion of the railway line and forcefully evicted them.
luo: KR nowacho ni jogo nodak e lo ma ne onego bed ni itiyogo kiyaro ndach reru to mano e momiyo ne gidarogi gi thuon.
mt0: <pad> KR said that he would be able to sleep on the bed because he knew that the drug was poisonous.</s>

en: The Nubians say their eviction was illegal.
luo: Jo-Nubi to wacho ni nodargi kanyo e yo ma ok owinjore.
mt0: <pad> If you can't translate the sentence, just say you don't know Jo-Nubi or say you don't understand the meaning of the phrase.</s>

en: They were moved to the land where they are currently living by the Kisumu City authorities.
luo: Sirkal ma kaonti ma Kisumo e ma nodarogi nyaka kama koro gijotie sani.
mt0: <pad> Sirkal ma kaonti ma Kisumo e ma nodarogi nyaka kama koro gijotie sani.</s>

en: “We had lived on the land since 1937 before we were forcefully evicted. It has been tough for some of us, especially those of us who are elderly,” said 82-year-old Khadija Rajab.
luo: Khadija Rajab ma jahigni 82 wacho kama: "Wasebet ka wadak e lobno chakre higa mar 1937 kae to koro iriembowa. Ngima ok osebedonwa mayot, to ahinya ahinya ne wan joma koro oti."
mt0: <pad> Khadija Rajab, 82, said: "I was a child in 1937 and I've been a mother since then. I don't know if I've been treated well, but I'm very happy that my son has been released."</s>

en: The 850 people have been living in deplorable conditions for three months now since they were evicted from what KR says was a railway reserve.
luo: Ji 850 osebet kodak kuonde ma ok owinjore gi ngima kuom dweche adek koro chakre ne riembgi giwuog kama Kenya Railways (KR) luongo ni kar reru.
mt0: <pad> Ji 850 started kodak when it was ok for the first time on Monday night and then went into standby until the next day. Kenya Railways (KR) said it was a very difficult job.</s>

en: “We did not expect this. But if we must move out so the railway can be expanded, then the government should compensate us,” she said.
luo: Nowacho kama,"Ne ok wang'eyo ni gima kamano nyalo timore. To kochuno ni nyaka wadar mondo wawe nafas ne reru, sirkal onego ochulwa."
mt0: <pad> "But I know that this can happen. If you want to leave the atmosphere and breathe, the circle should be removed.</s>

en: Rajab said other than floods, they have to contend will mosquitoes and rodents.
luo: Rajab nowacho ni mopogore gi kodh ohula mayweyo udi, ginyagore bende gi suna kod oyieyo.
mt0: <pad> Rajab said that they were going to be asleep when they went to bed, and they would have to go to bed when they got up.</s>

en: She wondered why they were taken to the flood-prone field, a move she said has complicated their lives.
luo: Nowuoro gimomiyo nodargi motergi kama pi ng'enyie, gima osemiyo ngimagi obedo matek.
mt0: <pad> I don't know why you wouldn't let me see the painting, but I knew what you would do if I couldn't see it.</s>

en: They have been depending on Kenya Red Cross Society, relatives and well wishers for food.

en: Abdi Asha, 39, called for justice saying KR had no right to take away their land.

mt0: <pad> Abdi Asha, 39, said he was shocked to learn that the murderer was a man who had been planning to kill himself.</s>

en: “We are Kenyans by birth and deserve fair treatment,” Asha said.

mt0: <pad> Asha said, "I was born in Kenya and I know where my father is.</s>

en: Most of those living on the 18 acres belonging to the county government cannot fend for themselves.

en: Acting City Manager Abala Wanga said the county government has started the process of resettling the Nubians.

en: In the meantime, Wanga said they had built three tents to improve their living conditions and were in the process of controlling floods at the site.

en: Hassan Hussein, an elder, said they were happy the county government had started settling them, but urged the authorities to expedite the process.

mt0: <pad> Hassan Hussein, whose name is Hassan Hussein, said that he was a martyr and a martyred man who had been killed by the Islamic State.</s>

en: Last month, the Environment and Land Court extended conservatory orders stopping KR from forcefully evicting the Nubians from the land.

en: A family in Wigwa village in Kisumu County has been left in grief after their kin was killed by a crocodile in Lake Victoria.

en: Gabriel Okoth Oduogo, 35, was on a fishing expedition in the company of his friend when the incident happened at Nyandiwa beach.

en: His friend survived the attack but the incident caused panic all the way to Dunga beach where the fishermen trade.

en: Eyewitnesses said the crocodile emerged from a nearby papyrus weed on the shoreline before it attacked the deceased by grabbing him.

en: ''He was attacked by the reptile in the morning in the company of others who had gone to lay fishing nets to harvest fish,” Saitoti Ayoro said.

en: He cried for help as his shaken colleagues ran for their lives before they gathered courage a few minutes later to hurl stones at the reptile as it swam and dived in the water.
luo: Ne oywak kokwayo kony sama osiepene ne oringo nikech luoro, kata kamano ne gichoko chir dakika matin bang'e ma giduogo mi gibayo nyang'no gi kite sama nyang' nogo abal molal ei pi.
mt0: <pad> I couldn't stand to see it, but I knew it was going to be a good time.</s>

en: The fishermen later swam to safety at Dunga beach where they reported the incident to the locals and Kenya Wildlife Service(KWS) personnel who dashed to the scene in search of the body.
luo: Jolupogo ne ogoyo abal ka gidhi e dho wath Dunga kama ne ginyisoe ji gima otimore kendo fwaro joma tiyo gi Kenya Wildlife Service (KWS) mane oringo dhi manyo ringre ng'at mothono.
mt0: <pad> The lion was found by the Kenya Wildlife Service (KWS) and taken to the park by the police.</s>

en: This is the second time a crocodile has attacked a fisherman in the lake in less than a month and more intriguingly from the same family.

en: The suspects, a driver and a salesperson, were transporting the loaves of bread in 50 crates from a Kisii bakery.

en: The bread was to be supplied to shops and supermarkets in Migori Town.

en: Residents had filed complaints about the weight of bread they had been buying from local shops, stating the brand from the Kisii bakery was “notorious” for selling them low-weight bread.

en: The consumer protection department officers laid a trap with police and impounded the vehicle as soon as it arrived in Migori Town.

en: When 770 samples of the packaged loaves were weighed, the scale indicated that each loaf was 365 grams instead of the industrially-accepted 400 grams.

en: The inspector in charge of commercial goods weight in Migori, Tobias Nyakamo, told The Standard that the suspects will be charged with contravening Part Six of the Consumer Protection Act.

en: The Ministry of Trade in Migori said it will conduct impromptu inspections to ensure goods sold to consumers meet the requisite standards.

en: The Consumer Protection Act allows the Consumer Protection Department to investigate complaints relating to false or misleading representations, unconscionable conduct as well as supply of unsafe, defective and unsuitable goods.
luo: Chik mar Consumer Protection Act oyiene Riwruok mar Jong'iepo mondo onon weche ma ji ywagorego ni jo uso wuondo ji gi gik ma gindiko kuom gik ma giuso kendo moko kuom gi gin gik ma owinjore kata nyalo hinyo ngima ng'ato.
mt0: <pad> The Consumer Protection Act requires the Department of Health and Human Services to ensure that you are aware of the information on the product that is being advertised and the information that is being provided on the product that is not what you need or want.</s>

en: The Department also investigates undertakings that fail to comply with prescribed Consumer Product Safety Standards and prescribed Product Information Standards
luo: Riwruogno bende nono jo ohala ma luwo chike moket mondo orit ngima jong'iepo kod ma ok luw chike mag weche e wi Rang'iny mag gik Miuso.

en: Consumers can complain directly to the Authority through Email, telephone call,s or walking into the Authority’s offices.

en: The consumer is required to fill in a consumer complaint form and provide all the relevant information concerning the complaint.

en: On receipt of a consumer complaint, the Consumer Protection Department will acknowledge receipt of the complaint and advise the consumer on any information gaps.

en: Upon receipt of all the information from the complainant, the Authority shall analyse the complaint and contact the accused party for information if necessary.

en: The Authority may then apply administrative remedies to solve the complaints which include: refund, replacement or repair of goods, withdrawal of misleading representations, recall of unsafe goods and notices to the public on the existence of such goods.

en: Complaints that do not fall under the Authority’s jurisdiction are referred to the relevant Government Agencies.

en: Upon conviction, a person who contravenes the Part Six provisions of the Act is liable to imprisonment for a term not exceeding 5 years or to a fine not exceeding Sh10 million or both.

en: A miner has died and 300 families were displaced by floods following heavy rains that have hit Migori County.

en: Burundi President to attend Madaraka Day celebrations

en: Burundi President Evariste Ndayishimiye will jet into the country on Monday, May 31 to attend Tuesday’s Madaraka Day celebrations.

mt0: <pad> The Burundian President Evariste Ndayishimiye arrived in Kenya on Wednesday, May 31, to attend the forthcoming presidential elections.</s>

en: In June 2020, President Kenyatta congratulated Ndayishimiye on his election as President and pledged to work with him, saying Burundi was Kenya’s valued development partner.

en: The visit comes after a similar one to Uganda on May 13 to woo Ugandan investors to invest in Burundi.

en: This year’s Madaraka Day celebrations will be an invite-only event as part of the Covid-19 measures.

en: “Jomo Kenyatta International Stadium can accommodate 35,000 people, however, we have only invited 3,000 which is about 10 per cent of the entire capacity. This is in line with the Covid-19 protocols,” said Governor Nyong’o.

en: Madaraka Day is celebrated every year on June 1 to commemorate the day Kenya attained internal self-rule in 1963 after colonisation from Britain.

en: The main road in Kitutu Masaba constituency has for a long time been used as a political carrot to woo locals into voting for politicians who pledge to tarmac it.

mt0: <pad> In the past few years, the Amabuko-Rigoma-Magomba-Kemera river has been a major source of water pollution in the country.</s>

en: Nearly all the MPs who have been elected from Kitutu Masaba have pledged to have the road tarmacked from Kemera town, where it connects with the Kisii-Nyamira-Chemosit road to Amabuko shopping centre where it joins the Kisii-Keroka-Sotik-Nairobi highway.
luo: Chiegni ni Jood Bura duto moseyier Kitutu Masaba osega singore ni gidhi goyo ndarano lam kowuok taon mar Kemera kama oromoe gi ndara mar Kisii-Nyamira-Chemosit modhi nyaka chiro mar Amabuko ma orade gi ndara maduong' mar Kisii-Keroka-Sotik-Nairobi.
mt0: <pad> When they arrived in Nairobi, they were greeted by the chief of staff, Mr. John Bura.</s>

en: It is not only MPs who have used the road as a political tool to win votes from residents; other leaders who have been eyeing other political seats have also used it.
luo: To ok en Jood Bura kende ema osekampen ka gitiyo gi ndarano mondo ji ogonegi ombulu, nitie jotelo mamoko ma be osetiyo kode.
mt0: <pad> When I was a kid, I couldn't understand the rules of the game.</s>

en: The late President Daniel Moi, retired President Mwai Kibaki and President Uhuru Kenyatta all used it as a campaign tool.
luo: Ker mane osetho Daniel Moi, Ker machon Mwai Kibaki kod Ker Uhuru Kenyatta notiyo gi wach loso ndarano e kampen ma ne gitimo.
mt0: <pad> The former president Daniel Moi, the former prime minister Mwai Kibaki and the current president Uhuru Kenyatta have all been involved in the campaign.</s>

en: During Moi’s era, the road was marked for upgrading to bitumen standard but this did not happen because of the political winds of the time. Former area MP, the late George Anyona, became a fierce critic of Moi.
luo: E ndalo Moi, ne osechan ni idhi go ndarano lam, kata kamano, mano ne ok otimore ka luwore gi weche siasa ma ne nitie e ndalono. Jaod Bura machon mosenindo George Anyano ne kwedo mager loch Moi.
mt0: <pad> In the Moi era, I was almost certain that it was my own fault, but I was able to understand the political issues that were raised in the time. Jaod Bura, a former chief minister of the Republic of Biafra, told President George Anyano that he would not be allowed to enter the waters of the Moi lake.</s>

en: At one time, Anyona had promised to repair the road but because of lack of political goodwill from the government, that did not happen.
luo: Nitie kinde moro ma Anyona ne owacho ni odhi loso ndarano, kata kamano, nikech ok owinjre gi sirkal ne ok omiye pesa.
mt0: <pad> Maybe you don't know</s>

en: President Kibaki also pledged to have it finished around 2010, but the road was never upgraded.
luo: Ker Kibaki be nowacho ni ne odhi tieko loso ndarano e higa mar 2010, to mano ne ok otimore.
mt0: <pad> Ker Kibaki has said he will run for president in 2010, but I don't know if he will.</s>

en: Having the road tarmacked remained a pipe dream until 2013 when the work began.
luo: Goyo ndarano lam ne obed lek nyaka e higa mar 2013 ka ne tij lose ochakore.
mt0: <pad> I started my career in 2013 after losing my job as an assistant director.</s>

en: Uhuru and his Deputy William Ruto, while campaigning in 2013 ahead of the General Election, also earmarked the project for construction.
luo: Uhuru kod Jalupne William Ruto ka ne gitimo kampen 2013 ka yiero pok ochopo, ne giwacho ni gidhi loso ndarano.
mt0: <pad> Uhuru and William Ruto during the 2013 presidential campaign, said that he was going to lose the third term.</s>

en: And in 2017, construction works on the road stalled at Gekano Tea Buying Centre after the contractor terminated the works.
luo: E higa mar 2017, tij gero ndarano ne ochung' gi alwora mar Gekano Tea Buying Centre bang' ka ngama ne omi orak mar lose weyo tich.
mt0: <pad> In 2017, we started to investigate the cause of the loss of Gekano Tea Buying Centre's electricity supply after realizing that there was a risk of losing power.</s>

en: The other section near River Gucha bridge and a 15-kilometre stretch remain incomplete.
luo: Kuonde ma ne odong' ma ok otiek los e ndarano gin alwora man machiegni gi olalo mar Aora Gucha kod kama romo kilomita 15.
mt0: <pad> When I was a child, I couldn't understand the language.</s>

en: Area MP Shadrack Mose has been fighting to have the road completed before his term expires. His plan seems to succeed as a contractor is already the site to do the job.
luo: Jaod Bura makanyo Shadrack Mose osebedo kakedo matek mondo otiek loso ndarano ka pok owuok e loch. Chenroneno dhi ka tiyo nikech nitie jagedo ma osechako tij loso ndarano.
mt0: <pad> Shadrack Moses, a former soldier of the Israel army, was arrested for attempting to commit suicide after arriving in the country. He was arrested because he was a prisoner of war and could not be released.</s>

en: Currently, survey works are being carried out by a Chinese company, which was given the contract.
luo: Tij survey e ndarano ne omi kambi moro mar Jo-China.
mt0: <pad> The survey revealed that there was a new ecological base in the south of China.</s>

en: “This is a very important road, which no one can ignore. Tea farmers in the area have faced difficulties in transporting their produce to the factories because of the poor state of the road. Such challenges will soon be a thing of the past,” Mose said.
luo: Mose nowacho kama, "Ma ndara maduong' ma ok onego ojwang'. Jopur ma odak e alworani chandore gi kaka ginyalo kowegi gik ma gikayo e kembe nikech ndara rach. Machiegnini, chandruogego biro rumo."
mt0: <pad> Moses said to him, "This is the great commandment that you must obey. The servants who are still in the camp can only eat what they have made because the commandment is broken. When you come out of the camp, you will be able to bring your household into the house.</s>

en: Residents say completion of the road will give the area MP an upper hand in the 2022 polls.
luo: Jodak wacho ni ka otiek loso ndarano to mano biro konyo Jaod Burano e yiero mar 2022.
mt0: <pad> Jodak said he would not be able to play for the Buffaloes until 2022.</s>

en: “Mose will have higher chances of re-election if he pushes the government to finish the project before next year,” said Peter Mokua, a resident of Gekano.
luo: Peter Mokua modak Gekano, wacho kama, "Ka Mose okaso sirkal motieko loso ndarani ka higa manyien pok ochopo, mano nyalo miyo oyiere kendo."
mt0: <pad> Peter Mokua, a Gekano's son, said, "When Moses took the law of the land and created the soil, he could not have given us a sword.</s>

en: Oscars pushed back to April 2021 as film industry scrambles to adapt amid coronavirus
luo: Mich mag Oscar ochwal nyaka April 2021 sama kembe maloso sinema pod nyagore gi tich e kinde tuo corona
mt0: <pad> Oscars will be held in April 2021</s>

en: Film's most prestigious award has had to be postponed after the industry took a major blow amid coronavirus.
luo: Ne ochuno mondo ochor Mich mag Oscar bang' ka josinembe noromo gi chandruoge mang'eny nikech corona.
mt0: <pad> Oscar couldn't be asleep because of the coronavirus.</s>

en: The Oscars ceremony for 2021 has been shifted back by nearly two months after the majority of films since March this year had to be put on hold.
luo: Nyasi mag chiwo mich Oscar e higa mar 2021 ne olok tarige gi dweche ariyo bang' ka thoth sinembe ma chakore Mach higani ne ochung.
mt0: <pad> The Oscars will be held in 2021 and the announcement will be made on March 31, 2021.</s>

en: It has been moved from a February 28th to an April 25th date.This move should accommodate early 2021 releases, delayed because of the pandemic.
luo: Tarik owil kowuok e 28 dwe mar ariyo modhi tarik 25 dwe mar agwen. Mano dhi konyo sinembe mane ogol chak higani nikech tuo mar corona.
mt0: <pad> The first batch of the tournament was scheduled for 28th of March to 25th of April. I've been waiting for two weeks for the tournament because of the coronavirus pandemic.</s>

en: President of the Academy, David Rubin, and CEO Dawn Hudson, said of their decision: “For over a century, movies have played an important role in comforting, inspiring and entertaining us during the darkest of times.
luo: Ker mar Akedemino, David Rubin kod CEO Dawn Hudson, nowacho kama, "Kuom higni mokalo mia achiel, sinembe osekonyo ahinya e hoyo, jiwo kendo moro chuny ji sama weche tek.
mt0: <pad> "Kuom nkombo ya mfe eha, swine a tɔgɔyi e nk'ayǐ, a tɔgɔyi e nk'ayǐ, a tɔgɔyi e nk'ayǐ, a tɔgɔyi e nk'ayǐ, a tɔgɔyi e nk'ayǐ, a tɔgɔyi e nk'ayǐ, a tɔgɔyi e nk'ayǐ, a tɔgɔyi e nk'ayǐ, a tɔgɔyi e nk'ayǐ, a tɔgɔyi e nk'ayǐ, a tɔgɔyi e nk'ayǐ, a tɔgɔyi e nk'ayǐ, a tɔgɔyi e nk'ayǐ, a tɔgɔyi e nk'ayǐ, a tɔgɔyi e nk'ayǐ, a tɔgɔyi e nk'ayǐ, a tɔgɔyi e nk'ayǐ, a tɔgɔyi e nk'ayǐ, a tɔgɔyi e nk'ayǐ, a tɔgɔyi e nk'ayǐ, a tɔgɔyi e nk'ayǐ, a tɔgɔyi e nk'ayǐ, a tɔgɔyi e nk'ayǐ, a tɔgɔyi e nk'ayǐ, a tɔgɔyi e nk'ayǐ, a tɔgɔyi e nk'ayǐ, a

en: "Our hope, in extending the eligibility period and our awards date, is to provide the flexibility filmmakers need to finish and release their films without being penalized for something beyond anyone's control."
luo: Dwarowa maduong' sama wachoro nyime tarik mar chiwo mich, en ni mondo okony jolos sinema obed gi thuolo moromo mar tieko loso sinembegi ma ok gogi fain ne gima onge kaka ne ginyalo timo."
mt0: <pad> The elderly lady told me the story of the creation of the movie, and I thought that the world should be able to watch it on Sunday.</s>

en: The new date’s means nominations will be announced on March 15th 2021, with the submission deadline for general entry categories (which includes Best Picture) on January 15th.
luo: Tarik manyien mochiwno nyiso ni ibiro yier jopiem tarik 15 Mach, 2021, to tarik mogik ma gibiro kawoe nyinge joma piem ne mich (moriwo mich Picha Maber) biro bedo Januar 15.
mt0: <pad> The deadline for the submission of the application is 15 March 2021, or the date on which the committee of the provincial government (the Picha Maber Committee) will be established (the Picha Maber Committee) on 1 January 2021.</s>

en: It is yet another blow to music fans as Kenya mourns popular Benga artiste Erick Omondi who died of cancer in Bondo, Siaya County on Tuesday morning.
luo: Jo-Kenya nigi kuyo mang'eny kendo nikech jathum machielo mar Benga otho, miluongo ni Erick Omondi. Kansa onege Tich Ariyo okinyi Bondo, Siaya Kaonti.
mt0: <pad> Jo-Kenya nĩgi kuyo mang'eny na nĩ ũrĩa jathum machielo mar Benga otho, miluongo ni Erick Omondi. Kansa onege Tich Ariyo okinyi Bondo, Siaya Kaonti.</s>

en: The death of the ex-member of the legendary Nabi Kings Band popularly referred to by his fans as "Long Lilo" has gutted his fans.
luo: Tho mar jathum ma chon ni e grup miluongo ni Nabi Kings Band ma ne ong'ere gi nying mar "Long' Lilo" oweyo ji kuyo.
mt0: <pad> The evening of the concert, the band Nabi Kings Band played the song "Long' Lilo" and their audience was filled with joy.</s>

en: The 37-year-old father of three died at 4:30 am while undergoing treatment at Bondo Sub-County Hospital.
luo: Nojahigni 37 kendo ne en gi nyithindo adek. Notho kar sa apar gi nus okinyi e kama nithiedhe e Bondo Sub-County Hospital.
mt0: <pad> Nojahigni, 37, and his wife were two children. He was admitted to the Bondo Sub-County Hospital on Tuesday.</s>

en: His wife Goretty Awino and family spokesperson Olima Gondi confirmed the death.
luo: Chiege, Goretty Awino kod Olima Gondi mawuoyo e lo-gi ema nowacho ripod thone.
mt0: <pad> Please don't know Chiege, Goretty Awino and Olima Gondi.</s>

en: Long Lilo thrilled his fans with his husky voice and engaging lyrics during his prime days when he sang alongside Osito Kalle, another legendary Luo Benga icon who trained him.
luo: Long' Lilo ne moro chuny joherane gi dwonde mamit kod kaka nower ndalo mane ower kanyachiel gi Osito Kalile, ma be Ja-Benga mong'ere kendo ma ne otiege.
mt0: <pad> Lilo knew the truth of his failure to win the contest four years ago, when he was almost killed by the riots that killed the Ja-Benga leader and their wife.</s>

en: Some of his hit songs include Goretti Awino, Were wuod Ogalo, Okoth Mang’ang’a, Kong’o shida, Anita Nyausonga , Thomas Mwaya and any more. In his song Japuonj, Omondi praises Osito Kalle for his ability to nurture other singers like himself, Odhiambo Tusker, Aluoch Pamba, Atommy Sifa, Ogina Koko (currently Ramogi FM presenter) and many others.
luo: Moko kuom wendege mong'ere gin Goretti Awino, Were wuod Ogalo, Okoth Mang'ang'a, Kong'o shida, Anita Nyausonga, Thomas Mwaya kod mamoko mang'eny. E wer miluongo ni Japuonj, Omondi pako Osito Kalile nikech nokonye kod jower mamoko kaka Odhiambo Tusker, Aluoch Pamba, Atommy Sifa, Ogina Koko (ma sani en jalendo e redio) kod jomamoko mang'eny.
mt0: <pad> They are all singers, including Goretti Awino, Were wuod Ogalo, Okoth Mang'ang'a, Kong'o shida, Anita Nyausonga, Thomas Mwaya and many others. The actors are Japuonj, Omondi, Osito Kalile, Odhiambo Tusker, Aluoch Pamba, Atommy Sifa, Ogina Koko (now a radio DJ) and many others.</s>

en: Odhiambo Tusker after graduating from the hands of Osito composed a hit song Jopuonj, a piece which praised the efforts of teachers in the society and received widespread acclamation among the Luo fan base.
luo: Odhiambo Tusker bang' tieko tiegruok e lwet Osito, ne owero wer mong'ere ni Jopuonj, wendno ne opwoyo kinda ma jopuonje timo kendo ji mang'eny nohero werno e joherana ma Joluo.
mt0: <pad> Odhiambo Tusker aayũrĩire nĩ gũteithĩrĩria e gĩthimi kĩa Osito, na aayũrĩire nĩ gũteithĩrĩria mong'ere nĩ Jopuonj, no aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ aayũrĩire nĩ

en: Osito who mentored them also starred with other songs such as Lesna buoyo ma wiye, Asembo piny maber, Jaber jaula and much more.
luo: Osito ma ne opuonjo gino en be nowero wende kaka Lesna Bwoyo ma Wiye, Asembo Piny Maber, Jaber Jaula kod mamoko.
mt0: <pad> I would like to thank the following people for their support: Lesna Bwoyo ma Wiye, Asembo Piny Maber, Jaber Jaula and his family.</s>

en: Long’Lilo was reportedly ill with cancer for a long time and at some point was appealing for medical help.
luo: Kansa ne osebedo ka tuoyo Long' Lilo kuom kinde malach ma kata nitie ndalo moro ma ne okwayo mondo ji okonye.
mt0: <pad> The elderly man was called Long' Lilo, a kind of malach whose earlier life was a flooded river that had been flowing through the valleys until the water was filled.</s>

en: His death comes barely a week after Luo Ohangal fans were shocked with the sudden death of Abenny Jachiga who died in Kisumu abruptly and was buried with less than 48 yours against the wishes of his fans.
luo: Tho mare otimore ka kata juma achiel ema pok orumo are Joluo mohero Ohangla winj ni Abenny Jachiga otho apoya nono Kisumu kendo noyike mapiyo gi seche 48 mopogore gi dwach joherane.
mt0: <pad> The murder of Abenny Jachiga was discovered by the Ohangla chief on Sunday.</s>

en: Nothing shakes the conscience of mankind than an unexplained death of a celebrity.
luo: Onge gima chandoga chuny oganda moloyo tho apoya mar ng'at ma nigi huma.
mt0: <pad> No one can really hurt the heart of a man more than his own failure to understand his wife's desire to be loved.</s>

en: Ken Walibora was not your ordinary celebrity pushed to fame by benevolent spirits.
luo: Ken Walibora ne en ng'at ma nigi huma nikech weche mopogore.
mt0: <pad> I couldn't believe that a man was going to come here because of the lack of information.</s>

en: At the time of his death, he was one of the most celebrated Swahili writers in Kenya and one of the universally acclaimed authors.
luo: Ne otho ka en achiel kuom jondiko mong'ere mag buge Kiswahili to bende nomiye luor kaka jandiko e piny ngima.
mt0: <pad> I'm sorry to hear that you don't know</s>

en: Lovers of literature are pained not just by his death but the brutal manner in which it came.
luo: Jogo mohero somo buge winjo marach ahinya nikech tho mare kod kaka notho malit.
mt0: <pad> i'm so sorry for the loss of my wife</s>

en: Such death is reserved for troublesome characters in literary works.
luo: Thoye ma kamago yudorega mana e buge kiwuoyo kuom joma ne ok beyo.
mt0: <pad> I'm a very religious person and I'm always looking for the right thing to do.</s>

en: In such extra ordinary circumstances, the people of Khabondi would seek solace in the emotive Luhya dirge “Olumbe luno toto lwakhabere lurungungwa, mana lukhaya khwira, ndakhaluwere ing’ombe!” translated to mean “If death could be paid to spare someone, I would have given death a cow”.
luo: Sama weche kaka mano otimore, Jo-Luhya nigi wer moro ma wacho kama, “Olumbe luno toto lwakhabere lurungungwa, mana lukhaya khwira, ndakhaluwere ing’ombe!” ma tiende kolok en "Ka dine inyalo chul tho mondo owe ng'ato, dine amiyo tho dhiang'."
mt0: <pad> When they heard that, Jo-Luhya sighed and said, "This morning is very small, but it's very big; I'm going to eat a pig!"</s>

en: Admittedly, I have never physically met Walibora.
luo: An ne pok aromo gi Walibora wang' gi wang'.
mt0: <pad> I'm sorry, but I don't know.</s>

en: I first knew him in Standard Seven in primary school when my Kiswahili teacher Peter Busolo insisted that I read Siku Njema and explain the synopsis to him in seven days.
luo: Nakwongo winjo nyinge ka an e klas abiriyo e kinde mane japuonjna mar Kiswahili nochika ni asom bug 'Siku Njema' kae to alerne gima bugno wuoye bang' odiechienge abiriyo.
mt0: <pad> I'm very happy to be in the class of fourth grade when I learned Kiswahili and started reading it.</s>

en: By that time, Siku Njema was a compulsory Kiswahili set book in secondary school, but here was a village-bred juvenile being asked to interpret it.
luo: Ndalono, bug Siku Njema ne isomo e sekondari kata kamano, an to ne pod an nyathi primary to ema inyisa ni asom bugno.
mt0: <pad> Yesterday, I was in high school and almost finished my first year. I was a little bit nervous because I thought I would be a good student.</s>

en: Mr Busolo understood the kind of books that would inspire students’ passion.
luo: Mr Busolo ne ong'eyo buge mane nyalo miyo nyithindo oher somo.
mt0: <pad> Mr Busolo said that he knew four years ago that they were going to give a scholarship to a young girl.</s>

en: That was the last time he asked me to read any of Walibora’s books.
luo: Mano e kinde mogik ma ne okwaya mondo asom buge Walibora.
mt0: <pad> I'm sorry to hear that, but I'm sorry to see you.</s>

en: I took it upon myself to monitor the author’s publications and read them.
luo: Bang'e, nachako manyo buge mamoko mag Walibora mondo asom.
mt0: <pad> Bang'e, I tried to get my mother to come to me and tell me that she was pregnant.</s>

en: Walibora was a gifted story teller who understood an African village with magic.
luo: Walibora ne ong'eyo gano sigana mamit kendo nong'eyo timbe Jo Afrika.
mt0: <pad> I know you know what i'm doing and you know the history of Africa.</s>

en: Our continuous interaction has been through his works.
luo: Wang'eye mana kokalo kuom buge mondiko.
mt0: <pad> Wang'eye mana kokalo kuom buge mondiko.</s>

en: His characters lived among us.
luo: Ne chalo mana ka gima wadak gi joma wuoyo e bugene.
mt0: <pad> I would like to know if you can speak Chinese.</s>

en: Walibora wrote about things that we could see in our daily lives as students. Most of his characters were an inspiration.
luo: Joma Walibora ne ondiko e bugene ne gin joma waneno e ngimawa mapile kaka jopuonjre. Thoth jogo ne jiwowaga.
mt0: <pad> The Greeks were very different from the Egyptians and they did not have any physical knowledge. Thoth was a very wise man.</s>

en: I drew quite a number of lessons from Walibora’s works that have guided me to date.
luo: Nitie puonj mang'eny ma ne ayudo e buge Walibora mosetayo ngimana nyaka sani.
mt0: <pad> I'm a very good friend and I can help you</s>

en: In his master piece Siku Njema, Walibora demystifies the long held African concept of illegitimate children with a single phrase “Mwanaharamu hamna, kitendo ndicho cha haramu” to mean “there is no illegitimate child, it is the act that is illegitimate”.
luo: E buk mane ondiko mong'ere ni Siku Njema, Walibora nokwedo paro monya ma ji nigo e wi nyithindo ma minasi kowacho kama, “Mwanaharamu hamna, kitendo ndicho cha haramu” ma tiende en, "Onge nyathi ma ok owinjore onyuol, tim miyudego ema ok owinjore."
mt0: <pad> In his fourth book published on Sunday, Walibora spoke out against the abuse of children by saying, "There is no evil, there is no sin, and there is no excuse for anyone to do that."</s>

en: Walibora’s main character in Siku Njema, Msanifu Kombo happens to be such a child. Through him, we are exposed to traumatising experiences that single mothers and their children go through.
luo: Jal miwuoyo kuome ahinya e Siku Njema iluongo ni Msanifu Kombo kende en be ne nyathi ma ne onyuol kamano. Kokalo kuom sigande, ileronwa chandruoge ma mine modak kendgi kaloe kod nyithindgi.
mt0: <pad> The debate on Sunday was very much about the fact that Msanifu Kombo had been a beast. In addition to the debate, it showed the shameful legacy of my fathers who have been passing on their children to their sons.</s>

en: The contempt with which society treats such children, and above all, their determination to succeed amid such challenges.
luo: Ileronwa bende kaka joma odak e alwora kwedoga nyithindo ma kamago kod kaka nyithindogo nyagore.
mt0: <pad> I'm a very proud of my father and his wife.</s>

en: Perhaps it is because of his humble upbringing or the strict Christian upbringing under Jehova’s Witness denomination.
luo: Nyalo bedo ni gima konyo Walibora ndiko buge mabeyo kamano en nikech nopon e od joma oluoro Nyasaye e din mar Jehovah's Witness kata Joneno mag Jehova.
mt0: <pad> I'm sorry to hear that you don't know</s>

en: In my teaching of Children Law, I have found myself citing Walibora more than any other literary scholar.
luo: Asefwenyo ni ahero wacho weche ma ne Walibora owacho moloyo jondiko mamoko sama apuonjo Chik mar Nyithindo.
mt0: <pad> He says he is very happy and proud of his words</s>

en: His contribution to jurisprudence cannot be gainsaid.
luo: Walibora nokonyo ahinya e weche Chik.
mt0: <pad> I'm very happy to see you on the blog.</s>

en: As a lawyer, I draw inspiration from Walibora’s book Kufa Kuzikana, translated by Prof Egara Kabaji et al as “Friends for Life”.
luo: An okil, kendo ahero ahinya somo buk mane Walibora ondiko miluongo ni "Kufa Kuzikana" ma Profesa Egara Kabaji oloko ni "Osiepe ma Ngita gi Del."
mt0: <pad> An okil, and ahero asoma buku mbili Walibora ondika miluongo ni "Kufa Kuzikana" na Prof. Egara Kabaji ondika ni "Osiepe ma Ngita gi Del."</s>

en: In this text, a litigant who has made several trips to a lawyer’s office to claim money paid to the lawyer by an insurance company after an accident eventually commits suicide when the lawyer becomes uncooperative.
luo: E bugno, iwuoyo kuom ng'at moro ma ne odere nikech ne odhi e ofis okil mondo omiye pesa mar insurance bang' yudo hinyruok to okil notamore.

en: The mastery of African idioms runs through his works.

en: Hyrax Hills National Museum, one of Kenya’s critical archaeological sites and a national monument is marking 100 years of existence this month.

mt0: <pad> The Hyrax Hills National Museum, located in the Kenyan capital Nairobi, is a museum that has been a home to a pioneering settlement for over 100 years.</s>

en: The famous archaeological site which has since placed Kenya as home of Early Man opened its doors in 1920, to host rich history and has since inspired history and geography lessons in schools.
luo: Kama ong'ereno moting'o gik machon miyo ikwano Kenya kaka kama dhano mokwongo ne okwongo dakie, ne oyaw e higa mar 1920 kendo osekonyo e puonjo histori kod jografi e skunde.
mt0: <pad> Before you can ask me about my experiences in Kenya, I know that he came here in the 1920s and taught history and geography at the University of Nairobi.</s>

en: The museum was declared a national monument in 1945, but opened its doors to the public in 1965.

mt0: <pad> The museum was opened as a temporary museum in 1945, but it became a permanent museum in 1965.</s>

en: “This month marks 100 years of existence of this archaeological site that is just another classroom for thousands of learners across the country who visit,” Lilian Amwada, the museum’s curator said.

mt0: <pad> Lilian Amwanda, ochung' ne museumno, wacho kama, "E dweni kae biro rwako higni 100 kendo e piny mabiroga limbe e piny mabiroga limbe."</s>

mt0: <pad> Although it is a museum, you should not be able to see the exhibits without being told by the museum's director or curator.</s>

en: “Don’t let anyone touch you/ even when you are in bed sleeping/ Don’t brush shoulders with anyone even when you are walking around/ Don’t shake hands with anyone; and why should you? do you know that the person has come from or touched....?” Goes part of the chorus.
luo: Bath koras mar wendno wacho kama, "Kik iwe nga'to omuli/ kata sama inindo e otanda; Kik ituomri gi ng'ato ang'ata sama iwuotho; Kik imos lwet ng'ato; ang'o momiyo idwa mose? Be ing'eyo kama ng'atno oaye kota omulo…?"

en: The 62-year-old singer from Bomet County is known for his social commentary.

en: He said he composed the uncharacteristically lengthy song in 2002.

en: “At the time, I was in Eldoret and television channels were awash with reports of Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS) which had broken out in China and was spreading to other countries,” Maritim said.
luo: Maritim wacho kama, "E kindeno, nadak Eldoret kendo nilando e tv ripode mag tuo miluongo ni Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS) mane omouch China kendo landore e pinje mamoko."
mt0: <pad> Maritime said, "I was in Eldoret yesterday and I watched the news on TV about the Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS) that has spread from China to our countries."</s>

en: “From the scary news clip I saw medics in protective gear attending to patients, and outside, police officers were chasing people off the streets. It was then that I decided to compose a song about this phenomenon.”
luo: Odhi nyime wacho kama, "Pichni ma ne anenogo ne nyalo bwogo ng'ato kendo naneno laktech kobawore gi lewni moumo dendgi duto sama githietho jotuo, to polise ne riembo ji odog e utegi. Mano e ma nomiyo andiko wendno."
mt0: <pad> Odhi added, "I was looking for a way to get away and I saw the policeman taking my money and taking my wallet. That's why I decided to write this letter."</s>

en: Kenya Film Commission Chief Executive Officer Timothy Owase said the State corporation will continue to source and negotiate for tax relief incentives on film and animation equipment to boost the industry growth.

mt0: <pad> Timothy Owase, CEO of Kenya Film Commission, said the committee was looking for ways to improve the transparency of the film industry and ensure that the rules are followed by the actors.</s>

en: “We will offer guidance on standards of excellence and advocate for the use of best practice in film production while working closely with relevant government agencies to create robust and streamlined mid-level film education that will lead to more exportation of locally-made films,” sais Owase.

en: Today, many people, especially Africans find it hard to identify with their cultural values and way of life as a result of embrace to modernisation and civilisation.

en: Situated next to Chekobei Primary, along the Iten-Kabarnet road, the cultural centre is decked with a collection of books showing how the cultural heritages of African communities used to live and socialize in the past.
luo: Museumno yudore machiegni gi Chekobei Primary e ndara mar Iten-Kabarnet, kendo opong' gi buge mawuoyo e wi kaka ogendni mopogore opogore mag Afrika nodak e kinde machon.
mt0: <pad> The museum is located near Chekobei Primary School in Iten-Kabarnet district, and it houses a collection of African artifacts from the past.</s>

en: It even holds currencies in different denominations and states.

en: “I have several Biographies including the one of the late second President Daniel Arap Moi “the making of an African Statesman” by Andrew Morton and many others.

mt0: <pad> "I'm very sorry for the loss of Daniel Arap Moi, the first president of the Republic of the Congo," said Andrew Morton, author of the book "The African President Who Can Become a Hero."</s>
